title: Finca for sale in Marratxí
description: Surrounded by agricultural land, we find this large mansion house of a typical Majorcan style known as a ´possessiò´ which dates back to the XV century. It stands on elevated land which gives it visual domain over the surroundings with huge agricultural fields and mountains in the background. The main façade of the building has a frontispiece with lintel carved in stone and crowned with a coat of arms of the family; this gives access to an immense stoned patio around which the main part of the construction has been built. To the right of the entrance and integrated as part of the building, we can find the chapel which, together with the stables which are situated on the outside of the main building, are both protected, in terms of construction. This property has an independent area for the people that work on the estate; allotment; orchard; several terraces with balustrades and balconies with really splendid views; apartment for guests; stables; storehouses; a bell tower… All these are to be found standing in land which measures about 803.000m2, of which the constructed area amounts to an approximate 5.500m2 in all.

title: Architectural gem in Art Nouveau style in Santa Catalina
description:
Spectacular townhouse named Can Pujol in the heart of Santa Catalina in Palma de Mallorca. A true gem built in 1904 which has recently been carefully and completely renovated. A timeless beauty of approximately 550 sqm with a large sunny roof terrace with wonderful views. A stunning family home, which can also be divided into flats and a commercial space. 

The main entrance of the house has a welcoming hall of around 20 sqm with a lift all the way up to the penthouse, as well as a staircase connecting all the units. 

The first and second floors offer two almost identical flats of approximately 150 sqm each, both with amazing original details. Here you will find beautiful floor tiles that have been preserved and renovated, decorative pillars with lovely ornaments and features, high ceilings, fire places, wooden doors and more. Each detail of this unique building has been carefully restored and renovated, under the supervision of the Patrimonio of Palma for historical heritage purposes. The flats have beautiful balconies facing the street and luminous bedrooms, facing the back, with a smaller terrace on each level. The bathrooms are done in contemporary style which fits perfectly with the original Art Nouveau style. 

The top floor offers an amazing opportunity to form your own perfect penthouse loft apartment. There is already a building project of a one bedroom, one bathroom flat; completion is included and can be done according to your own preferences. High ceilings with visible beams and lots of light!

Next to the main entrance on the street level, you will find an open plan space with high ceilings and approximately 130 sqm that can be used as a lovely commercial space or maybe a garage. Here you will also find a small terrace area of around 10 sqm. 

Finally, this amazing building offers a sunny 45 sqm roof terrace, with views of the Cathedral and the Bellver Castle, perfect for cocktail parties, late night dinners or just relaxing in the sun.

This is a must see property, sold exclusively by Buy a Home Mallorca. Please contact us for more information and private viewings. 

Furnished by: Knox Design
Art by: Vivian Borsani
Photos by: FToNIK
features: Lift,Terrace,Sea Views,Penthouse,High End Selection,Shower,A/C,Heating,Fireplace,Balcony,Storage

title: Villa Miguel · San Miguel
description:

You will enjoy a magnificent panoramic view to the untouched surrounding forest. The village of San Miguel is at less than three minutes drive, and Ibiza town is at only 15 minutes away. The villa has nine bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, heated swimming pool, spa with gym, massage room, sauna and Jacuzzi. Also many chill out areas with Balinese temples and gardens. ENTRANCE:
Gated entrance with a nice and short walkway that reaches to the security door.  Beautiful main furnished entrance with fishponds, cascades, fountains, day beds, white pebbles and manicured gardens.
MAIN HOUSE:
Living room: Great living room with fireplace, plasma TV, international satellite, music equipment with iPod input, office corner with wireless internet, scanner and printer.  Direct access to a splendid porch terrace that turns into a superb lounge area with fishponds.
Kitchen:
Fully equipped kitchen with direct access to a huge Balinese temple that turns into a summer dining area.
Room 1: Double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, dressing room, safe, and its complete bathroom en suite. It has two small balconies with view to the valley and court yard.
Room 2: Double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe, and has a complete bathroom en suite with double sink and dressing room. It has a large balcony and an open terrace with exterior shower, both offers a stunning panoramic view.
Room 3: Double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe, and a complete bathroom en suite. Direct access to a large balcony and a stunning private porch/chill-out area, both have a stunning panoramic view.
Room 4: Double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe and it has a complete bathroom en-suite, with double sink and a large dressing area. Direct access to the different exterior lounges and deck in front of the pool.
Room 5: Double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe and his complete bathroom en-suite with double sink.
Room 6 and 7 (Annex, completely independend and with access from the garden): Vast private terrace turns into a living area with a huge splendid Balinese temple. This annex has two large rooms in suite. One double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe, dressing room, office corner, and has a complete bathroom with double sink in suite. It also boasts an outside bathroom and tropical garden with private terraces and chill out. One double bedroom with matrimonial bed, plasma TV with international satellite, iPod, safe and his complete shower room en suite. Room 9: Separate totally independent cottage that can be used for caretaker accommodation.
SPA:  Superb 100m² spa composed of a gymnasium, massage room, sauna, Jacuzzi, and a complete shower room. Direct access to a marble terrace and chill out area.
SURROUNDINGS:
Marvelous Mediterranean-tropical style garden surrounded by an untouched forest.  Several superb furnished terraces with fishponds, cascades, three Balinese temples, and many private chill-out areas.  Heated swimming pool of 8x3m with beach entrance.  Huge wooden elevated terrace of 180m². Large lawns  exterior living and dining areas.

title: Villa Montana · Morna Valley
description:
This quality luxury villa is tastefully decorated with the best materials and finishes, with Balinese furniture and Porcelanosa bathrooms and kitchen.
There is a large living area with open kitchen downstairs and a smaller TV lounge upstairs. The kitchen has two fridges, a freezer (plus a chest freezer), two ovens/steam oven and Krion/Corian top. There are two beautiful large master bedrooms upstairs both with en-suite bathrooms and access to very big terraces with a view of the Morna Valley. Along a corridor on the ground level you will find three further bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms. One of these bedrooms is a a large family room with two sleeping areas. One with double bed and the other with a fold out sleeping sofa.
Downstairs in the basement is a very nice private cinema with comfortable sofas, the latest projector, surround sound and HD DVD player. The guest house has a double bedroom, bathroom and a small kitchen and lounge. Outside there are many chill-out areas both upstairs on the large terraces but also around the garden and pool area. The pool is 100m², and on the green lawn there are a big Balinese gazebo day bed and a double Balinese gazebo dinning area  – all with curtains. The property also has a built-in outside barbecue.
The property is close to many popular beaches and very close to the popular Azaro hotel and the famous La Paloma restaurant. There is only about a 20 minutes drive to Ibiza town.

title: Apartment Luxury apartment with beautiful view on Cala Llenya for sale in Platja Cala Llenya - Balearic Code  A183907
description: Beautiful luxury apartment overlooking Cala Llenya. Located in a quiet area northeast of Ibiza, in the urbanization “La Joya”, designed by the architect Don Juan Rios Coello of Portugal. From the balcony or terrace you can enjoy a spectacular view of the sea and the pine area. It has a large living-dining room, kitchen, 1 suite bedroom with in suit bathroom, 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a wide terrace with jacuzzi, storage room and one parking slot in the garage. It has 190 m2 built surface, a terrace of 45.80 m2,  Storage of  approx. 13 m2, one parking garage. The foundations and structure, walls and roof, insulation, electrical installation, painting, siding, exterior and interior carpentry built with materials of the highest quality. Common areas include garden, 2 swimming pools and 2 paddle courts. Direct access to Cala Llenya which is at 3 minute walk and close to Cala Nova which is at 10 minutes walk.

title: Villa Moderno · San Agustin
description:
Luxury modern villa near San Agustin with a nice pool and an a exotic garden – with nice sunsets. The villa is in the outskirts of San Antonio and has five king size bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and TV.
The living area is like a huge loft with window walls, plasma TV, DVD player, full Hi-Fi, base box, Wi-Fi, design furniture and a ten person dining table.
The American style kitchen is overviewing the pool and garden, and is fully equipped with washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, microwave, fridge/freezer, drinks fridge, cooker and oven.
The property also features a very comfortable chill out, with three big sofas, and tables for 10-12 people.
Outside there is a 700m² exotic garden and polished cement terraces, a 20x5m pool with changing color led pool lighting, chill out with dining tables and lounge with three big sofas.
Distances
5 min to San Antonio and San Agustin.
10 min to San Jose, San Rafael, Sta Gertrudis.
15 mn to Ibiza Town and the airport.

 This 800 square meter villa features 6 bedrooms all with ensuite bathrooms and is situated on a 22.000 square meter plot high on the hills only 1,3 km from the beach of Sestanyol and Talamanca beach.
There is a large living area and kitchen. There is air conditioning in the whole house.
The large pool area enjoys a jacuzzi, bathroom with shower.
There is also a sauna, a gym, a private garden with 180 degrees sea view.

title: Villa Roca · Ibiza KM4
description:
Villa Roca is considered to be the most exclusive rental villa in Ibiza. Services of a five-star Hotel, with the privacy of a private villa. Chefs prepare a selection of local organic ingredients and locally caught fish, and butlers cater to you every wish.
There are a full selection of spa services available as well. Villa Roca has a Michelin standard Head Chef, sous chef, four butlers, poolbarman, housekeeper and maids when required, complete privacy when not (12 personal staff…24 hour service/security). The Villa has eight double suites (max 16 guests). But is also perfect for just a couple.
RENT PER WEEK:
September – June:  45,000€
July: 50,000€
August: 70,000€
(Price includes nine full-time staff: concierge service, four butlers, personal chef, sous chef, night butler, housekeeper and maids when required, complete privacy when not  (nine full time personal staff) and taxes).

title: Apartment for sale in Puerto de Pollensa
description: A spacious apartment on the modern Bellresguard complex, just to the rear of the exclusive ‘Pine Walk’. Standing in beautiful landscaped gardens, the complex features a large three-tier swimming pool and sun terrace. The property is on the first floor and is ideal for family holidays. It is less than 100m from the beach and is conveniently located for the restaurants and shops of Puerto Pollensa. The apartment’s kitchen and two bathrooms have been modernised recently. The apartment is well-presented, spacious, air-conditioned and heated throughout. The large lounge/dining room has ample space for all the family to relax on holiday. From the lounge the patio doors lead onto the balcony with table and chairs for dining al fresco. The kitchen is fully fitted and open plan. A separate utility room with a washing machine and drying area is located through the kitchen. Off the hall are three bedrooms, all of which have fitted wardrobes. There are two double bedrooms, one master with a double bed and one twin bedded room. The third has bunk beds. A bathroom en suite serves the master bedroom and the other rooms have a separate walking shower room with W.C.

title: Nice penthouse with large roof terrace in the Old Town

It is also walking distance to great shopping areas, such as the popular Corte Inglés. There are also trendy hotels such as Palma Suites in the neighbourhood. Walking distance to the Palma Beach with a nice beachclub.

The property was renovated in 2002 and is in good condition. Two bedrooms and one bathroom on the first floor and a living room, bathroom with shower and the kitchen on the second floor. And above that there is a large private roof terrace of 45 sqm. The flat is located in the building on levels three and four.

description:

title: Homes for sale on the seafront in Cala Gamba
description: Homes for sale on the seafront in Cala Gamba - Palma de Mallorca, Three house building completely renovated in 2008, with exquisite design, superb location in pedestrian area, only 10 meters away from the sea. A façade of 25 linear meters facing the sea; Houses with separate entrances and terraces. This is the only stretch of coastline of this area of Palma where there is no road traffic between the buildings and the sea. Facing the south, with direct sun from morning till evening with spectacular sunsets.Common qualities to the three homes: Due to its proximity to the sea, the building was renovated with excellent qualities. The treatment, design and exterior building materials are common to all three houses, but on the inside, the three houses have a different style. Anodized aluminium frames with Schüco brand, thermal break and double glazing glass with a high thermal performance. Electric shutters made of anodized aluminium with anti-theft system lock, and opening by remote control. Fully isolated exterior walls with air chamber and thermal isolation. Floor in contact with the land perfectly isolated with a ventilated foundation system to avoid dampness. Fully isolated roofs. The composition of the façades is comprised of superb quality coated natural stone from Santanyí, coating stripes and premium paint stripes. Outdoor decking made of natural wood of Ipe.House 1. 92 sqm duplex apartment on the ground floor and 67 sqm on the first floor; distributed in a large and bright living room with large windows from which you can enjoy excellent sea views, a fantastic kitchen with high end appliances. The kitchen is made of white lacquered wood and a white Silestone countertop. Direct access to large laundry room - pantry. Wooden beams in different areas of the house. Large terrace facing the sea with porch awning covers with dual-wind, external speakers connected to stereo. Three double bedrooms with possibility of four, all exterior. The principal bedroom boasts a wonderful terrace on the first floor with sea views. Parquet flooring, made of natural cherry wood, floor heating on the ground floor. Two large bathrooms with mixer Dorn-bracht, recessed cisterns. Heating ducts throughout the house. Satellite dish. Solar panels for hot water. Alarm system with motion detector video. Housing equipped with every comfort.House 2. 100 sqm house, distributed in a large and bright living room with double height, a fantastic kitchen, white wooden furniture with white stone worktop with induction installed therein. Porcelain floor. Access from lounge to a large terrace with stunning sea views, outdoor hot shower, fantastic porch awning. Three double bedrooms, all of them exterior, and one with en suite bathroom. One of the bedrooms has a loft with large storage capacity. Master bedroom with direct access to the porch with direct sea views. Two bathrooms. Air conditioning ducts, Daikin heating and electric radiators in all rooms.These two houses have an outdoor parking area and a storage room of 25 sqm, where you can store bikes, canoes, tackle, etc. And all the installations of the building are here. It also has a wine cellar in the basement.House 3. 75 sqm house, with an open kitchen in the living room, two bedrooms and a bathroom. Split air conditioning Daikin in each room. Outdoor shower with hot water. It has a laundry room with outside access, 20 sqm with a bathroom.Building with spectacular views, located on Paseo de Cala Gamba, next to the Nautical Club of Cala Gamba. Enjoy living in one of the most touristic and demanded areas of Mallorca, where some of the best beaches and coves are. Area with loads of restaurants and seafood restaurants. Close to all services. Possibility of acquiring mooring post at the yacht club.
features: Balcony,Garage INCLUIDO,Double Garage,Phone line,Terrace,Fitted Wardrobes,Storage room,Armored Door,Furniture,Heating,Air conditioning,Frontline,Light,Water,Alarm,Game Room,Gazebo,Parking INCLUIDO,Exterior,T.V.,Trees,Buses,COLEGIOS,Coastal Area,HOSPITALES,View to sea

description: Third floor without lift in Rafal Vell, Palma. 84m 2, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom. Living room 18m2, balcony with clear views 2.5m2. 3 bedrooms (13m2, 12m2 and 10m2), 2 wardrobes, furnished and equipped kitchen 8m2, laundry 3m2, bathroom 3.5m2 with shower and a bidet. Air conditioning in living room, aluminum windows, tile floors. Renewed electricity, plumbing, flooring and bathroom in 2006, and kitchen in 2004. Furnished and equipped. Community fees €70 per month including water. Good connections to public transport (5 minutes from downtown and 10 minutes from the hospital Son Llàtzer). title: Precious rural house, in one very comfortable ground floor, in Sencelles. 119m2 in 1740m2 land
description: Precious rural house, in one very comfortable ground floor, no steps. In Sencelles, 30km from Palma city. 119m2 on land of 1.740m2, pool, garden, water well, barbecue, and fruit trees.Cozy beamed ceiling. A perfect place to relax, front porch of 19m2, spacious 26m2 living room with fireplace, 3 bedrooms (13m2, 10m2 and 8m2), 1 dressing room of 3m2, huge 20m2 kitchen, 3 bathrooms (1 en suite) and 1 outdoor bathroom with shower. 6m2 wine cellar in the basement.Communal water well, very cheap. 6,000 litre tank. Grama grass. Automatic sprinklers. Barbecue and wood place (9m2). Store room 10m2. Renovated, half in 1996, half in 2015.Fruit trees: mandarin, orange, lemon, fig, almond, cherry, apricot, plum. Oak. Garden with roses, carnations, rosemary, laurel, aloe vera, etc. Paved access. 1.5 kilometres from Costitx and 3 kilometers from Inca. REF. VJ723R.E.

title: House on one floor, 106m2 plus 102m2 upper terrace plus 89m2 of outdoor buildings in land of 2,200m2
description: House on one floor, 106m2 plus 102m2 upper terrace plus 89m2 of outdoor buildings in land of 2,200m2. Near Son Sardina and Indioteria (Palma de Mallorca).House padded with rustic stone, on one floor and elevated a meter above the ground for greater comfort and less humidity. Hall 19m2, with Andalusian tile. Living room of 28m2, 3 double rooms (14m2 and two of 8m2) and a study of 8m2, 4 fitted wardrobes, 17m2 kitchen. 2 bathrooms (indoor 5m2, and 7m2 outdoors), and 1 toilet. Double glazed imitation teak exterior carpentry. Mosquito nets. Electricity network, heating and diesel oil water heater. Cozy beams. Purple stucco in the corridors.Rear porch 23m 2 and front porch 46m2.External buildings: warehouse, workshop and storeroom, total 43m2; kitchen 25m2, fireplace. This building has a roof with forexpan insulation and could easily be used as guest House because it already has electricity, water, fireplace...Other external buildings: barbecue (5m2), boiler and diesel oil tank room (5m2), pool machines and tools (3m2).Pool 17m2 (5x3.5).Outdoors with palm trees, lawn (about 75m2), with water fountain and fruit trees: orange, pomegranate, fig, peach, plum, grapefruit, apricots, olives, cherry.12,000 liter tank. Community well water, so water is very economical. MUST SEE.REF. VJ721R. E

title: Palma Centre. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, small terrace + balcony
description: Second floor with 2 lifts in Eusebio Estada Street. 129m2 with small terrace and balcony, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms.IT IS NOT A NORMAL RENTAL. For sale or rent with purchase option, mandatory downpayment of minimum 10,000€. 129m2, 26m2 living & dining room with exit to 6m2 terrace, 3 bedrooms (15m2, 12m2 and 9.6m2), 2 wardrobes, furnished and equipped kitchen 9m2, 2 bathrooms (5m2 and 6m2), both with large shower dish. Laundry room with balcony. Air conditioning. Community around 90 including water. Close to all amenities (pharmacy, supermarkets, schools, health centre, restaurants...) and with good connections to public transport (near bus stops and fast access to main roads). Certified Energy letter E. Ref. VJ711T. E.

title: Fabulous frontline apartment in Nova Santa Ponsa
description: Would you like to feel a slice of sky and sea in your house? Fall in love every day of the spectacular seaviews! Fabulous frontline apartment in Nova Santa Ponsa with 2 direct accesses to the beach.164m2 penthouse with a wonderful terrace to enjoy the sunset everyday. 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, sunny lounge, nicely sized kitchen...Good building materials and equipment: Air conditioning and heating in the bedrooms, elevator in the building. It has 3 communal swimming pools. A communal parking with assigned space. Beautiful community mediterranean garden. Close to all amenities (supermarket, restaurants, etc.): Port Adriano (Puerto Adriano), the new super-yacht marina, with numerous restaurants, cafes and bars, and El Toro village, are only at 15 minute walk away.Several golf-courses and the centre of Santa Ponsa are only a few minutes away by car.There are superb hiking-and biking-routes in the area – a great place to live all year or for holidays!

title: Villa for sale in Inca
description: Espectacular chalet de estilo modernista, de unos 350m2 en un terreno de unos 715 m2 a la salida de la ciudad de Inca. La casa consta de 300m2 de vivienda y 50 m2 de casa de invitados con barbacoa. La planta baja consta de una amplia entrada, dormitorio, oficina, comedor separado, salon, cocina-comedor amplio con una dispense muy espaciosa, un baño y un aseo. La planta piso consta de 2 dormitorios dobles con armarios emprotados, aire condicionado, un baño, se puede hacer un dormitorio más según las necesidades de las personas. La casa principal cuenta también con una Torre con buenas vistas a la Tramuntana. La casa esta rodeada de amplias terrazas, cubiertas tal como abiertas, piscina, solarium y un amlio garaje para 3 coches con puerta automatica.

title: Finca for sale in Sineu
description: This country house is a genuine oasis, atop a hill in the pretty and peaceful counrtyside of Sineu, enjoying clear and panoramic views of the mountains and the village. 8.400 m2 of completely fenced agicultural land, with a house of approx. 220 m2, covered terraces of 66 m2 and open terraces of 260 m2. 3 double bedrooms plus a loft of approximately 16 m2, a complete bathroom with bath, a hidromasage shower & toilet, completely furnished and fully equipped kitchen, dining room, lounge. Finishings include tiled floor of porcelain sandstone, traditional open wooden beams, a sturdy spruce wooden staircase, imported aluminium framed double-glazing and pre-installation for air conditioning. The pretty garden of approx. 1.000 m2 is replete with carob-trees, olive trees, evergreen oaks, jasmines etc. There is a garage of 50 m2, a swimming pool with a 45m waterfall, a barbecue, a wood oven, an auxiliary building of 36 m2 and many more extras. It has an alarm system, a well with drinking water, 2 water tanks (rain water 7.000 litres and a well of 14.000 litres), electricity from solar panels with converter and electric-generator. Ideal for peace and quiet. You will never want to leave home…

title: Apartment Infinity · Cala Carbo
description:
Impressive modern four bedroom apartment near the cosy beach of Cala Carbo. The perfect holiday home. This high quality modern 160m² and four-bedroom apartment enjoys its own infinity pool, breathtaking sea views and view of Es Vedra.
The apartment is divided in two levels. The top level has the main terrace, the infinity pool, the living area, the kitchen, two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them being en-suite to the master bedroom. The master also enjoys the amazing Es Vedra view. The second level has two bedrooms and a bathroom. One of the bedrooms is being turned into a lounge and TV room during the day. There is also a small private court yard that also holds the stairs between the levels.
The owners in the community has access to a modern gym and the duplex has its own private parking. This great location allows you to reach several beautiful beaches in a matter of minutes.

title: First line seafront ground floor apartment in Molinar
description: A unique opportunity to purchase a front line property in the highly demanded area of Portixol/ Molinar. This ground floor has some 105 sqm living space plus an extraordinary 25 sqm terrace that faces the sea, so the views are incredible. It comprises of three large bedrooms, one bathroom and a guest toilet, the living room and the kitchen are connected, and there is an easy option to have an open space area between them, eliminating a wall. The sales price includes a large storeroom next to the kitchen and a private car garage space. The property is in some need of renovation, but its location makes it a win-win proposition for anybody who wishes to enjoy living in this area just outside of Palma. Sold exclusively by Buy a Home Mallorca. Please contact us for more information and private viewings.

title: Villa Lluis · Jesus
description:
Large villa in Jesus with a fenced garden, located close to Ibiza town and Talamanca beach. 
This quality villa on tree floors features four double bedrooms and one single bedroom.
On the ground floor there is a small TV lounge,  a single bedroom and tree double bedrooms and  2 bathrooms with showers.  From this level there is direct access to the pool area.
  
On the main floor you find the large living area with fireplace, TV and access to the terrace,  a spacious and fully equipped kitchen with TV, gas stove, electric oven, microwave, refrigerator etc, the  dining area, a  guest toilet, and the utility room with washing machine.
On the top floor there is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and views to Dal’t Vila. There is also the gym.
The outside area features a large pool, a  covered barbecue area with dining table and a large garden. 
There is air conditioning throughout the house except in the single bedroom.

description: Penthouse newly renovated with a large roof terrace facing the sea,  in the charming neighborhood of Sant Agustin. There are several beaches within walking distance , the port of Cala Nova is in front, a bakery below, supermarkets nearby, Palma center  5 km away, Puerto Portals 5 mint away….The roof terrace is over 240 m2 with several sitting areas, chill out , dining area and a BBQ, so you can  spend your lovely evenings in Mallorca entertaining your family and friends.You also have a shower on the roof terrace and a WC. The laundry room is located on the same floor as the roof terrace and there is possibility to make an outdoor kitchen.On the ground floor you have an open plan kitchen and a living room, guest WC and a small terrace.Downstairs there  are the two bedrooms both with on suite bathrooms.

title: nan
description:
Property Description
            A very nice one bedroom apartment in the popular area of Cala Coral and only a few minutes walk from the small harbour and beautiful white sandy beach of Cala Tarida.

This apartment comes with free unlimited water and nil garbage collection costs as they are all included in the annual one off community payment. The apartment would benefit with a cosmetic make over making it a perfect holiday pad for anyone wishing to have a property with beautiful sea and sunset views.

There are two large communal swimming pools with a large sun terrace and a bar and restaurant available to the apartment owners. 

This property would be a great investment for a first time buyer wishing to start   their first overseas project. The owner is happy to negotiate on the price for a quick sale.           **Please note the information on our website is intended as a guide and based upon details supplied by the property owner.This information is subject to errors, omissions, change of price or withdrawal from market without prior notice.

title: Apartment Flat with garden for sale in Santa Eulària des Riu - Balearic Code  A206106
description: Nice apartment with garden, located in a quiet area of Santa Eulalia at 20 metre from the beach of punta Sa Caleta (Babylon Beach) at 5 min walk from Santa Eulalia. The apartment is located in a luxury residential complex with a large common swimming pool. It is located on the ground floor with a very nice garden and terrace of 60 square metres (30 m2 the garden and 30 m2 the terrace) and has a built area of 80 square meters, with 2 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one in suite), a independent kitchen with laundry room and a large living-dining room. From the living room there is the access to the terrace and garden where there is also the possibility to enjoy a al fresco dining. The flat is finished with excellent quality materials and includes also a parking slot for one car and a storage room. A unique opportunity for a nice holiday home just in front of the beach, very close to Santa Eulalia, very well served by bars, shops and restaurants (at 2 min walking distance from the Mercadona supermarket).

title: Light, style and sea views in Santa Catalina
description: Beautiful and stylish townhouse located in the heart of Santa Catalina. Recently renovated with taste, this 115 sqm property is distributed on two floors and comprises of two bedrooms, each with bathroom en suite on the first floor. On the higher level, you have an bright and open plan living room connecting with the kitchen, all with visible wooden beams, and a guest toilet. If you go further up the stairs, you enter the 18 sqm roof terrace with fantastic sea views across the port of Palma. Hydraulic floor tiles, A/C and double glazing windows, a perfect blend of light and modern style, keeping the Mallorca traditional spirit.
features: Terrace,Sea Views,Penthouse,Shower,Bathtub,A/C

title: Great Townhouse with large terraces close to the beach in Molinar
description: A ready to move in townhouse of approximately 100 sqm. On the entrance level there is a spacious living room with dining room area, guest toilet and kitchen (with washing room) that has direct access to the large terrace of approximately 45 sqm. There is also a small garden of approximately 15 sqm. On the first floor there are three bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom and an additional bathroom. On the upper level there is the sunny roof terrace of approximately 35 sqm. From the entrance level you have access to the basement where the garage and storage room is. The house has A/C and double glazed windows. Great value for money in a popular area.
features: Parking,Terrace,Beach,Shower,Bathtub,A/C,Garden,Storage

title: Spacious flat close to the Congress Palace of Palma de Mallorca
description: Spacious flat (107 m2), 3 bedrooms (2 double-sized, 1 simple sized), 2 bathrooms with bathtube, furnished kitchen with a spacious living- and dining room with a direct acces to a balcony. The building has recently be renovated and has the advantages of an restored facade, a new lift, a handicapped ramp, and a spacious community terrace. Close to the Congress Palace in the souther quartier of Palma Foners - full of Spanish character and just 500 metres from the Can Pere Antoni sandy beach and the yacht harbour and beach of Portixol. Close to the Old Town and the beautiful city park Krekovic. Close to all amenities as restaurants, cafeterías, bars, public transport, colleges, pharmacies, health centers, banks, etc.

The bedrooms are large and bright and have fitted wardrobes. The kitchen and living room are in an open plan design and are spacious. title: Newly built house with private garage in Santa Catalina
description: Stunning house of approximately 192 sqm located on a quiet street of Santa Catalina. The modern estate is distributed on four floors. Entry level; Modern hallway enclosed to a private garage, separate laundry room and a small storage. A private elevator provides comfortable access to all four levels as well as the modern stairs with integrated lights. The first floor consists of the main living area with a bright open plan kitchen with island, exit to a balcony of approximately four sqm and a guest WC. On the second floor there are two bedrooms, both with built in wardrobes and exit to another balcony of four sqm and a bathroom with shower. The top floor offers a bright master bedroom with built in wardrobes, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a stunning roof terrace with Jacuzzi.

title: La Zagaleta, Superbly Located Grand Residence in La Zagaleta
description:
A Personal Comment from Pia Arrieta 
When first approaching the property I started to understand why the owner gave it its name, "Palazzo delle Lucce" or "Palace of Light". The property is ideal for someone looking for something representative with ample gardens and panoramic views of the coast. The Palazzo has been well designed for the entertaining of guests and of its owners: A cinema for up to 10 guests, a library, and a wellness area with gymnasium and Turkish bath for 8 people make this a country retreat which is hard to get away from! Its location in La Zagaleta is certainly important in that the owner of this property can enjoy golf, tennis, hiking and riding. For those looking for a secure environment, la Zagaleta has only 2 gated entrances to the estate both of which have 24 hour strict security. The administration at the estate also provides red carpet services for the property owners.
  Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Quality and luxury has driven the building of this spectacular mansion situated in Europe’s most exclusive estate La Zagaleta, offering two golf courses, a private equestrian club, and 24-hour security.  Enjoying unobstructed views of the coast, the sea and the surrounding hills and woods, the south facing residence was designed by a well known leading architect, using only the most precious materials for its construction: fine handmade blown crystal glass by Marieux and ceiling mouldings, different kinds of high quality marble such as Carrara, Onyx, Red Alicante, Brown Emperador and Pink Portuguese.  The oak panelled library can store 2500 volumes, and the carpeted home-cinema equipped according to latest technical standards seats 10 people. The spacious kitchen with a dumb waiter and a fireplace is a culinary delight. Formal dining and entertaining rooms complement equally large bedrooms and a spa with gymnasium and changing rooms. Staff self-contained accommodation in basement.  No expense has been spared in creating what is truly one of the most spectacular homes in the area. description:
Impressive front line villa in Arabic style close to the Guadalmina Hotel, located in a complex with 24-hour security and enjoying panoramic views of the sea and coastline, mountains and the Guadalmina South golf course.

	This villa, with marble flooring with mosaic details and silk tapestry work on the walls comprises: spacious entrance hall with double sweeping stair case with Versace designed hand railing and featured hand carved ceiling; large open plan sitting room leading to a large office/TV room and dining area; fully equipped kitchen; 3 guest bathrooms; 4 principal bedrooms with 4 bathrooms en suite and a separate two bedroom two bathroom en suite apartment with own sitting room, kitchen and independent entrance. 

	The basement (472m2) consists of separate a apartment, large entertainment room and access to the underground garage with parking space for 4 cars. Basement staff quarters with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, sitting area and kitchenette. 

	Outside facilities include large heated swimming pool with electric pool cover, Jacuzzi, sauna, changing rooms and toilet/shower area. Moreover, you can access directly to the beach via gate and steps down large lawned area and sun terrace.
features: Air conditioning, Alarm, Covered terrace, Dining room, Front line beach, Gated community, Golf view, Good condition, Guest room, Guest toilet, Heated pool, Jacuzzi, Living room, Marble floors, Pool view, Private terrace, Sauna, Sea view, Security service 24h, Separate apartment

title: La Cerquilla, Contemporary comfort in La Cerquilla
description: Villa for sale in La Cerquilla, Nueva Andalucia Outstanding design and high quality materials highlight this exclusive villa with sea views, situated in La Cerquilla, a marvellous and peaceful area. An automated metal gate decorated with a rusty effect provides access to the parking area and 2-car garage, welcoming visitors to this comfortable home that has undergone a complete refurbishment.  This three storey property boasts a gorgeous lounge with different ambiences for chatting, watching TV or just sitting around with friends enjoying the relaxing garden views. Here you can also find an office that could be converted into another bedroom, a guest toilet with adjacent shower, a dining area and a fully fitted kitchen with top quality appliances. On the top floor, accessed by a staircase with metal panel balustrade, there is a spacious bedroom with bathroom and shower, and a large office with two desks. On the ground level, to the right of the entrance door there are 3 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms, all of them with direct access to the garden. One of the bedrooms has a bathroom, another one has a south-west facing terrace, a jacuzzi and two showers, and the master bedroom boasts high vaulted ceilings, a spacious dressing area and a private south-east facing terrace. The semi-basement of the house is divided into two separate areas with independent entrances. One of them includes the laundry room, machinery room, a gust toilet with shower and staff accommodation comprising one bedroom with en-suite bathroom and kitchenette. The other area is used for fitness and entertainment, with a gymnasium, Turkish bath, sauna, shower room, cinema room and bar. The property features home automation system, heated and salt water swimming pool, video entry phone, fireplace and underfloor heating with solar panels throughout the house. title: Ventura del Mar, Marbella - Puerto Banus. Penthouse for sale in Ventura del Mar, Marbella - Puerto Banus
description:
The Penthouse boasts 560 m2 over two floors, 410 m2 inside and terraces totalling 150 m2 in idyllic surroundings that stretch to the sea. Consisting of 5 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a large living area of 130 m2 and 4 terraces from which to enjoy stunning coastal views.
The Penthouse is very well laid out with a spacious and airy living room and large terrace, a fully fitted kitchen, wine room, gym, storage room and 3 underground parking spaces.
The large master en-suite bedroom is situated on the top floor with a high vaulted wooden ceiling and spectacular views from its own terrace. A further 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms are available, fitted out to a luxury specification.

title: Los Altos de los Monteros, Luxury Villa with Impressive Panoramic Views
description: Villa for sale in Los Altos de los Monteros, Marbella East This south east facing villa is built in 2006 with the highest quality specifications, offering the owner complete privacy and stunning views over the Mediterranean and African Coast and the mountains. Located at about a 15min drive from Marbella town centre and all its services and 10min from the beaches east of Marbella. The villa consists of an entrance hall with guest toilet, a bedroom with en suite shower room on the right hand side, with exit to the garden and a terrace with panoramic sea and mountain views. The dining and living areas are separated by a working fireplace. There is a separate study room. The living-dining area and study have exit to the private east facing garden with a heated swimming pool and covered terraces enjoying stunning views. Further on from the entrance hall there is a storage room, a guest apartment with bathroom next to the laundry room and a fully fitted kitchen with centre island and dining / breakfast area with Siemens appliances and also with exit to the garden and a covered terrace ideal for outside dining. On the upper floor, connected via a private lift or staircase, there is a spacious master bedroom with dressing area, walk in wardrobe, private south facing terrace and a fireplace. An office and the fourth bedroom with a bathroom complete this level. The basement offers a large garage with space for about 4-6 cars, a machinery room and toilet. The property also includes illuminated and heated swimming pool, a landscaped and illuminated garden with automatic irrigation system, central vacuum cleaner in all rooms, automatic system for all electrical appliances, safe, cream marble flooring throughout except kitchen and guest toilets, satellite T.V, video intercom, alarm system, air conditioning, a private lift, under floor heating in the whole house, electric awnings and shutters. title: Villa for sale in Nagüeles, Marbella Golden Mile. The luxury of a garden with views in Nagueles
description:
Settled in the very top of Nagueles, full of privacy and with panoramic sea views, lies this secret villa full of the charm of the Golden Mile. The private lane – full mature greenery -, leads into an ample double ceiling hall flanked by a classic stairway in marble and wood, that give us the first glimpse of the double living room and eight services dining room; all with the warm feeling of a proper home that fully recreates a way of life: solid, comfortable, and full of light.

	From the French windows of the living room and the breakfast room, we access to two areas covered terraces providing two exterior seating areas and exterior dining room just in the edge of the big mature lawn and the pool with the sea views framed by the bougainvilleas.

	In the low part of the garden we find the independent guest apartment comprising living room, bathroom and kitchen and its own private terrace leading to the fruit garden.

	The villa is southeast-facing is distributed in two levels: on the entrance level we find the hal, the spacious living room, separate dining room, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast area, separate laundry area, and access to the garden; staff en-suite bedroom with access to the kitchen; 2 guest ensuite bedrooms and the guest toilet. In the second floor, the master ensuite bedroom with a south-facing private terrace with sea views; further ensuite bedroom currently used as a study. The property has a garage for three cars. 

	You will enjoy a top view and spacious garden, in a privileged location, surrounded by Mediterranean greenery and only five minute from Puente Romano and the beach, and with all the amenities Marbella can offer at your hand.

	Indulge you with the real luxury the Golden Mile.

description: Villa for sale in Las Lomas del Marbella Club, Marbella Golden Mile South facing villa in an excellent location that comprises on the ground floor an entrance hall with cathedral height ceiling, a fully equipped kitchen, a cloakroom, a double drawing room with high ceilings, a dining room, two bedrooms ensuite and a porch. The master bedroom suite occupies the entire upper floor. The garden level includes two bedroom suites and the basement has a staff bedroom, a guest toilet, a large room and a garage for two cars. Wooden double glazed windows, under floor heating throughout the house, air conditioning (hot and cold), video intercom, automatic entrance gate are also included in this offering. title: Villa for sale in Las Lomas del Marbella Club, Marbella Golden Mile. Your private oasis in Las Lomas del Marbella Club
description:
Beauty and white are timeless; this can be the motto of this splendid villa set in Las Lomas del Marbella Club, where comfort and space live together.

	Designed in a classic Mediterranean style, with La Concha view as background, elegance and balance are in the heart of its design.  

	The property combines the essence of the Spanish traditional architecture with a modern layout, providing a soft and easy going ambiance.

	Distributed in two stories plus and semi–basement with views to a wood park, the villa has had thorough planning, with the aim of preserving all the advantages its location at the top of a hill and the existing environment.

	After arriving through a pebble private lane to the main entrance, – crowned Andalusian wall fountain with a bushy pink bougainvillea -, the double wooden doors will give us access to a warm hall with timbered celling and natural beige stone flooring, leading us to the ample living room which enjoys a special light and comfortable ambiance, with a panoramic window over a reading corner and superb fire place.

	Through the triple French windows, we step out onto the covered terrace with an exterior dining – for 8 guests – and lounge area; the open garden is bathed by the south – west sun where you will be able to relax in the long sunny afternoons.

	If you enjoy a busy social life, the villa provides a splendid double island kitchen with top devices – including a cava – and a big breakfast area.

	In this floor we also find two double bedrooms with the bathroom en-suite and the no less impressive Iroko wood stairs that ascend to the master bedroom area with its own private terrace, double dressing room, bathroom en suite and a breath taking view.

	The semi-basement has two ample double bedrooms with lovely terraces with views to the wood park. Here we also find the independent service quarters with the bathroom en suite and all purpose room.

	The villa has space for 5 cars in the garage, under floor heating, double-glazing by Quero and a top security Paradox system inside and outside.

	Come and enjoy this paradise of privacy and comfort in the one of the best locations in the Golden Mile.

title: Apartment for sale in Don Gonzalo, Marbella. Luxury Metropolitan Style apartment beachside in Marbella centre
description:
This high-style ultramodern apartment has been transformed from a 4 bedroom classic apartment to a spacious 2 bedroom contemporary flat with south orientation and sea views located in an exclusive residential complex steps away from Marbella.

	The apartment consists of an entrance hall, generous dinning/living room with movie cinema system, direct access to private and covered terrace with relaxing zone and sea views. The kitchen is open plan style, very modern, with Gaggenau appliances. Every corner of this home has been designed “á la mode” with very exquisite accessories and the latest home made finishings. Both bedrooms have en suite bedrooms styled with a famous designer touch.

	The complex has a marvellous position, just few minutes walking to the centre of Marbella, just 5 minutes from the beach and offers luxurious gardens, gated security system and communal pool.

	This property is destined to contemporary style lovers.

title: Marbella Centro, Apartment in Marbella Centre
description:
Apartment for sale in Marbella Centro, Marbella Town Located in Don Gonzalo, a luxury building with private lush floodlit gardens with walk ways and Arabian waterways and two swimming pools, sun beds and sunshades for the use of the residents.  High security and sophisticated surveillance system with individual alarms connected to the security house located by the only entrance to the building. 24 hour reception service.  The whole ground floor of the building has glassed lobbies with lifts.  All façades of the building are covered with rough marble.  South west orientated apartment, on the 5th floor, completely renovated in 2006 with top modern qualities, consists of an elegant entrance hall with guest W/C,  fully fitted new Poggen Pohl kitchen on the left hand side with Gaggenau and Subzero fittings, with an adjoining laundry area also with wooden floors. Spacious and bright living – dining room with exit to the south west facing covered terrace also with wooden flooring, with a beautiful views over the garden and pool towards the sea and Gibraltar. 
The living room can be turned into a cinema home. Originally a 4 bedroom and 4 bathroom apartment it has been completely renovated in 2006 with luxuriously finishes and top materials, and now offers two spacious bedrooms, each with built-in wardrobes and two separate bathrooms. The master bedroom has a dressing room and an en suite bathroom with jacuzzi bath and marble shower, accessed through a sliding door.  The property also features air conditioning, white aluminium double glazed windows and satellite T.V., oak wooden Schottenhanse floors, Bang & Olufsen music system, automatic doors and shutters and a garage space for one car. All conveniently situated in the heart of Marbella within walking distance of many shops, restaurants and the beach. title: A Unique Property
description:
More images   Villa for sale in Benahavis This estate is only 1300 meters away from the cosy village of Benahavis, and 6 km’s from the beach.
A mountain and countryside property on more than 12.000 square meters of land, about 275 meters above sea-level overlooking the mountains, the Mediterranean sea, the bay of Marbella and Puerto Banus. Det in a truly unique, one of a kind, location. With an incomparable combination of views and privacy at the same time. 
From the gate up, the long drive-way leads up to an oasis, a country  atmosphere, combined with all modern comfort. title: Villa for sale in Balcones de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile. Exclusive Villa for sale in the Golden Mile.
description:
Fantastic lordly and very elegant Villa located on the prestigious Sierra Blanca Urbanization at only a few minutes from Marbella centre and all its amenities, as well as the beaches. Bright and boasting beautiful panoramic sea and La Concha mountain views. Garage with capacity for 3 vehicles, mature gardens and swimming pool filled with salt water.
The Villa layout consist: very bright and spacious, on the main floor the entrance hall that leads to the living areas with chimney and by separated an elegant dining room with direct access to the covered terraces overlooking the gardens and pool area. Fully fitted and equipped kitchen with a breakfast area and access to the garden. In this level marble flooring.
On the upper floor: there is the main master bedroom with sitting areas and bathroom en-suite, direct access to a private terrace with panoramic sea views.
Furthermore, 2 bedrooms sharing a bathroom and a reading area. In this level wood flooring.
On the higher level, 60 sqm actually used as a lounge-living-sitting area that could be easily converted into a bedroom with its bathroom en-suite. 
Big basement area with garage space and storage area, 1 double bedroom with bathroom en-suite for the domestic service as well as the laundry area. 
Other features: Iroko carpentry with “climalit”, central heating by underfloor heating, air conditioning, water tank with 5000lts capacity, marble flooring on the main entrance level and wood flooring on the upper floor. All bathrooms are elegant and modern design.
features: Air conditioning, Alarm, Amenities near, Central heating, Dining room, Fireplace, Fully fitted kitchen, Kitchen equipped, Living room, Mountainside, Separate apartment, Storage room

title: Balcones de Sierra Blanca, Exceptional Villa with Sea Views
description: Villa for sale in Balcones de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile A fantastic property built with a real eye for design and attention to detail. A quality location situated just above Marbella town and a short drive to the beach and town centre. Andalucian beauty is the characteristic of this extraordinary home. The entrance hall with a guest toilet leads the way to an ample living room which is connected to the dining room and is next to the cosy kitchen with its breakfast corner and exit to the garden. An en-suite guest bedroom completes this level. On the first floor there is a library corner and 3 bedrooms: the spacious master bedroom suite and two other bedrooms that share a bathroom. The 60 m2 attic could be easily converted into another bedroom (prepared for the installation of another bath), and is presently used as a home office, T.V/games room.  Highest qualities have been used throughout, some worth mentioning are: air-conditioning in all rooms (hot & cold), under floor heating, ‘‘iroko’‘ teak windows with ‘‘climalit’‘ double glazing, marble floors on the entire lower level and wooden floors on the upper level of the house, water deposit of 5000 liters. The mature garden holds a swimming pool filled with salt water. Huge basement for garaging and storage. Full staff bedroom suite and additional w.c. Laundry area. title: Villa for sale in El Herrojo, Benahavis. Villa in El Herrojo
description:
A recently South facing built contemporary villa with modern design,  with fantastic views to the sea and La Quinta golf valley. 
Located in a gated very peaceful and tranquil residential community including 24 hours security. 
This four bed villa is built with open spaces and distributed in two levels. On the main level of this property is the large lounge and dining area with fireplace and access to the terraces to the infinity heated pool from you can enjoy panoramic views to the sea. 
The fully fitted kitchen is German and well equipped. There is also storage space and a guest toilet. 
It features: marble travertino floor, underfloor heating hot and cold plus ceiling fans, electric blinds and awnings, water decalcification system for all the house and lift pre installation among others. Located just 5 minutes walk from the 5* Hotel La Quinta in the heart of the golf valley, the Golf Club, restaurants and within a short drive to Puerto Banús.

title: Villa for sale in Los Arqueros, Benahavis. Amazing villa in Los Arqueros Golf, Benahavis
description:
This stunning villa is situated in Los Arqueros Golf within one of the most exclusive private areas in Marbella. Los Arqueros Golf is gated community with 24 hour security. It has it’s own 18 hole golf course.

	The villa is located in a cul-de-sac and enjoys a prized site in an elevated position with partial views of the golf course and the sea. The villa stands on a plot of 1775 m2 of which 690 m2 is the total built area and 112 m2 is in terraces.
The property was built in 2003, has some beautiful and user friendly design features. The arquitect was Manuel Burgos. 

	The property has a big hall; dinning are with direct access to a big terrace East facing. Separate there is a living room with fire place. The kitchen is fully fited with high appliances. On the same level there is one bedroom en suite with a nice terrace.

	On the first floor there ar 3 bedrooms en suite with their private terraces.
The master suite has a large walk in closet and a large terrace with views to the golf course and sea and a jacuzzi. 

	On the basment there are 2 bedrooms en suite, one of them is used as a home cinema; there is a living area with direct access to the swimming area where you have a large area with a kitchen appliances.

	Access to the AP7 toll highway is 5 minutes. Malaga and Gibraltar airports are a 40 minute drive, with Puerto Banús and Marbella being 8 and 12 minutes respectively. The beautiful village of Benahavis, dubbed the ‘gastronomic village of Andalucia’ is a 10 minute drive.

title: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Alicate Playa, Marbella East. Duplex Penthouse in Alicate Playa
description:
Within the exclusive beach complex of Alicate Playa, we have a three bedroom duplex penthouse on the community of Monte de Alicate which is located the nearest to the beach , and enjoys only 18 properties . This penthouse opens its views directly on to the beach and has direct access to it from the communal swimming pool and garden.

	Perfect as a permanent residence and enjoying all the attractions and advantages desired for a vacation property . Five minutes from Marbella and next to the beach with tropical gardens , has 24 hour security service . Views directly to the sea, to the mountains and to Marbella. Oriented South , West and North that surround this property with three external fronts .

	Completing this property, in addition to the required air conditioning h / c, alarm, oak flooring , home automation system , Bang Olufsen theater system , zoned underfloor heating, electric kitchen equipped with all basic and also with dryer, fridge-freezer and extractor. It also has accessory bedroom for the help and a library area which completes the upper floor with the master bedroom , plus large garage and storage room in the basement.

title: Las Chapas, Duplex Penthouse in First Line Beach Complex
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Las Chapas, Marbella East The definition of charm, this exquisite penthouse duplex is a true rarity in Marbella east. The residence boasts amazing light and attractive views from its position on a south west corner with three exposures. Located on the first phase of a first line beach complex, in a consolidated area a few minutes’ drive from the town centre.  The entrance hall leads to a spacious living room in L shape with dining area and exit to three terraces, two of them covered. A bedroom suite on this level has exit to a private south facing terrace and to one of the terraces of the living room. The fully equipped kitchen is conveniently connected to the dining room and has a window facing the north terrace which is used as a serving hatch. Adjoining the kitchen is the laundry area and a maid’s bedroom with shower room. Taking advantage of the space the landing on the upper floor is currently used as an office-library. Bathed in southern and western light, the master bedroom has been totally redecorated offering  an integrated bathroom with built-in bathtub, separate shower space, two hand wash basins, separate toilet and dressing areas. There is a further bedroom suite with one window facing south. Additional features of the property are a garage space for one car and off street parking,  alarm system, air conditioning, satellite T.V., lighting by Lutron, under floor heating throughout, domotic system, parquet flooring throughout except kitchen and terraces, and double glazed windows. title: La Trinidad, Luxury Apartment in Sought After Complex on the Golden Mile
description: Apartment for sale in La Trinidad, Marbella Golden Mile Located in the sought after private and gated development of La Trinidad, which is located in the heart of the Golden Mile, at a 2minute drive into Puerto Banus and 4 minutes into Marbella centre.  The complex offers security, extensive manicured gardens, 2 outdoor pools, indoor complex with a heated pool, gymnasium and sauna. The property comprises three spacious en-suite bedrooms, a large kitchen with breakfast area and adjoining laundry room, guest toilet and living and dining area with access onto the east facing terrace, with views over the communal gardens and the sea in the distance.  The property is beautifully presented and maintained and also includes parking for 2 cars as well as a storage room. title: Lagomar, Completely renovated villa in the heart of the Golf Valley
description: Villa for sale in Lagomar, Nueva Andalucia Beautiful villa with southwest orientation in the heart of the Golf Valley of Nueva Andalucia.  This is the perfect setting for families with children, at just a 2 minute drive from Aloha College and also ideal for golfers, close to Aloha Golf Club and within walking distance to both Las Brisas and Los Naranjos golf clubs.  The houses in this complex were built in 1985 and that same year they were awarded with the National Architecture prize and are therefore ‘protected’. This property has been refurbished entirely to the highest specifications. The ground floor of this two storey house comprises a large living room with two separate areas, one of them with fireplace that leads onto the swimming pool terrace and garden, a fully-equipped open plan kitchen with first class appliances, a bedroom suite and a guest toilet.  The modern design staircase leads to the first floor where we can find the master suite with built-in cupboards and a modern bathroom, two further double bedrooms sharing a bathroom and a study with access to the roof terrace.  This amazing property has a driveway with parking and patterned central courtyard with a heated swimming pool.  Features include gas fired under floor heating throughout, A/C, wooden flooring in bedrooms, alarm system, automatic gates, satellite T.V. and mature landscaped gardens. title: Guadalmina Baja, Elegant Beachside House
description:
A Personal Comment from Pia Arrieta 

My mother, Diana, tells me that she visited the house for the first time some years ago when it belonged to its previous owners and she thought that its Mediterranean-style architecture, with soft rooflines and large windows was timeless. She always says that good architecture withstands the test of time. And this is what I have seen recently while visiting this house. Spacious and bright rooms, covered and sheltered terraces that are an extension of the living and dining areas of the house. The chill-out thatched roof gazebo next to the paddle court, and the large swimming pool and Jacuzzi surrounded by a garden with tall mature trees, are the delight of both the family and their visitors as well as guests.
The entrance to the house through an elegant palm tree lined driveway is the announcement of the pleasure one feels upon entering the hall of the house and getting a glimpse of the terraces, the garden and swimming pool in the background. The house is ideal for families with young children or elderly people as it is all laid out on one floor. This also adds to its privacy and integration with the surrounding gardens.  Villa for sale in Guadalmina Baja, San Pedro de Alcantara Lovely one storey villa immersed in the greenery of palms, trees and shrubs, within Guadalmina Baja, walking distance to the beach and commercial centre of Guadalmina with a variety of services including banking facilities, restaurants, decoration shops, a supermarket and playground. Private school, 4 star hotel and two 18 hole golf courses within the estate. Enjoying the quiet atmosphere of the local area this recently renovated home is accessed along a driveway of pebble stones and lined with palm trees on both sides. The interior begins with a welcoming reception area leading two steps down to a lounge separated into two sitting areas, a library with a fireplace and dining room with exit to the covered terrace. By the lounge is the master bedroom with plenty of wardrobes, additional dressing room and large en-suite bathroom with bathtub and separate shower cubicle. The laundry, the pantry and a modern recently installed fully fitted kitchen with electric appliances are in the western wing of the house, as well as the staff accommodation including two bedrooms with two bathrooms and a living room with separate entrance. On the eastern side three further bedroom suites share a living room with exit to the terrace and garden. A cloakroom and lots of wardrobes complete this area. The property boasts mature and well maintained gardens with a swimming pool and poolside gazebo with sitting and dining area. Nearby there is a paddle court and gymnasium with sauna, Jacuzzi, changing rooms and showers. Carport for 1 car, garage for 2 cars, staff accommodation, alarm system, aluminium carpentry with double glazing, electric blinds in some rooms, water tank and water well, video entry phone, underfloor water heating by gasoil, marble bathrooms and marble flooring. title: La Cerquilla, Elegant Villa in the Heart of the Golf Valley
description: Villa for sale in La Cerquilla, Nueva Andalucia This East facing property is located in La Cerquilla, a sought after residential within Nueva Andalucía area. It features magnificent views of the garden and surrounding greenery, La Concha mountain and parcial sea views. Puerto Banus and the beach are at a 5 minute drive. Marbella town is only 10 minute drive away. There are several golf courses within 3 minute drive. The villa is built on three levels. The main entrance level consists of the hall with high ceiling that leads to the spacious living room with different seating areas, access to the covered terrace with summer dining area and a seating area with fireplace.  From the entrance hall and living room there is access to an interior courtyard. The separate dining room with 12 seats has direct access to the modern kitchen with pantry and breakfast area. Adjoined is the laundry room. This floor also boasts a TV and study room with fireplace, a guest cloakroom, and the master bedroom with fireplace, two walk in closets and en suite bathroom. The upper level offers three large bedrooms with en suite bathroom and access to an ample terrace with mountain and sea views. On the lowest level at garden level is the fifth bedroom with en suite bathroom, a garage for four cars, a storage room and a cellar. This villa enjoys a large private swimming pool surrounded by a mature garden which is is mainly characterized by the presence of numerous palm trees. title: Guadalmina Baja, Beachside Estate
description: More images   Villa for sale in Guadalmina Baja, San Pedro de Alcantara Superbly situated within a prestigious estate complete with two golf courses and just a short drive from San Pedro, this spacious villa with south orientation, is surrounded by manicured garden with automatic irrigation. There is a tennis court, a large swimming pool, and a pool house with changing rooms, bar, terrace and a 135 m² two-bedroom guest’s bungalow next to the ample driveway. Built in 1987 with high specifications such as marble floors and columns, piped music throughout, and pink Portuguese marble in upper level bathrooms. The property is completely enclosed with an alarm system and the villa consists of, on the main floor, an entrance hall (22.08 m²) with a cloakroom on the left and a closet to the right. Two steps down to the living room (62.53 m²) flanked by four columns, a dining room, and a sitting room. All the reception rooms open onto an eight marble column 82m²covered terrace. There is a laundry room and a Staff suite, off the eat-in kitchen, which is fully equipped. Two bedrooms sharing a bathroom complete this level. On the upper floor is the master bedroom (37.76 m²) with a bathroom ensuite with a bathtub and a separate shower cubicle and a dressing room, and another south facing bedroom suite.  Both suites open onto an open terrace (93.63 m²). At roof level, there is a terrace with solar panels and satellite T.V. and on the basement, there is a wine cellar. title: Guadalmina Alta, Modern and Bright Villa in Guadalmina Alta
description:
More images   Villa for sale in Guadalmina Alta, San Pedro de Alcantara This modern villa is situated in the prestigious area of Guadalmina Alta and right by the Guadalmina golf course. Located at about a 5min drive into San Pedro town centre, 10min from Puerto Banus and 15 min from Marbella. Located in a very tranquil area, making it a perfect family home, yet only a ten minute walk from the secluded parts of Guadalmina Beach and within five minutes walk of a substantial commercial centre with restaurants. Also at walking distance are several International schools.  The property welcomes you with a spacious entrance hall which leads into the bright living area with fireplace and a separate dining room, both with beautiful views over the garden and the pool. The fully fitted kitchen is spacious and very functional with breakfast area.
On the left wing there are two double bedrooms, both with en suite bathrooms one with direct access to the pool area. The master bedroom is on the first floor and features a dressing room, an office space and a large, modern and luxurious bathroom with two sinks and jacuzzi bath. There is a vaulted ceiling sitting room on the same floor. The fourth bedroom has a bathroom en suite with access to the patio on the basement level and is ideal for maids quarter and laundry room. Further features include parking spaces for 2-3 cars, marble floors, under floor heating, vaulted ceiling, windows with Iroko wood and alarm system. The well kept garden hast two outside dining areas and swimming pool, ideal to enjoy the summer months. title: Cascada de Camojan, Magnificent Villa in Cascada de Camoján
description:
Villa for sale in Cascada de Camojan, Marbella Golden Mile Charming villa in the prestigious residential area of Cascada de Camoján, with 24 hour security and at just 2,4km from the centre of Marbella. The property lies within beautiful Victorian gardens with a private swimming pool and has been built on three levels. The main level comprises an elegant entrance hall with double height ceiling, a living room with separate dining room, a lounge with fireplace, fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and pantry and an additional small dining area. On this floor we will also find an ensuite bedroom, a study and a guest toilet.
The upper level offers the master ensuite bedroom with dressing room and two guest ensuite bedrooms, one of them with a walk-in wardrobe. The top floor offers beautiful views of the sea and mountains. The basement consists of a garage with space for 6 cars and a self-contained apartment for the staff, with and ensuite bedroom, living room and kitchen. The is also a machinery room, a tavern with wooden stove, kitchen and toilet, wine cellar and a raw large room that could be used as a gymnasium, sauna and cinema room. Features include partial under-floor heating, wooden floors in dining room and lounge, A/C and marble floors amongst many others. title: Villa for sale in El Colorado, Nueva Andalucia. Modern Villa in La Quinta
description:
Fantastic vila for sale in La Quinta, Benahavis, located at the heart of the golf valley and surrounded by golf courses, at only a few minutes drive from the beaches of San Pedro de Alcantara.

	With private garden and swimming pool, this 6 bedroom property comprises on the ground floor: entrance hall; fully equipped kitchen with central island, light-filled living room with independent dining area and direct access to the porch with nice sitting and relaxing areas, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one en suite).

	The upper level is divided in a master en suite bedroom with jacuzzi bath and shower, a large walk-in wardrobe and 2 bedrooms sharing a family shower room.

title: Marbella Centro, Conveniently Located Villa near Town Centre and Beach
description: Villa for sale in Marbella Centro, Marbella Town Elegant and comfortable villa within approximately 950m from the beaches of Marbella and 500m from its urban centre with wide range of services, leisure and sport facilities. A number of private and public schools are also nearby. The property with 3,50 meters high ceilings and spacious rooms is cleverly distributed between three levels. The ground floor comprises an entrance hall, a guest toilet, a lounge with a log fire place, formal dining room, two bedroom suites and a fully fitted kitchen with informal dining area.  The upper floor consists of two bedrooms sharing a bathroom, which are used as offices at the moment, both have open terraces, and a huge master wing encompassing a sitting room with a gas fire place, an open terrace,  marble bathroom with a bath tub and a separate shower and a bedroom with sea views. The master bedroom and one of the double bedrooms share a large semi-covered terrace with sea views. The green and mature outdoor area spans over 1500m2 and comprises covered terraces, private swimming pool, fruit trees and a lovely fountain at the entrance door. In the basement there is a pre-installed room for sauna and shower, a laundry with drying area, a garage for 4 cars and lots of space for storage. description:
This Modern villa is located between the sea and mountains in Nagüeles – one of the most prestigious districts in Marbella. The complex includes only 16 houses surrounded by Mediterranean garden. 

	There is a big swimming pool and BBQ zone. The house has an excellent planning and spectacular panoramic view to the sea. South orientation of the house allows you to be delighted with the sunlight all over the day. 

	The house has 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, fully fitted kitchen, large living room with a fire place and dining area, office, gym, laundry, services room and storeroom; it also has 1 apartment for service or guest with 1 bedroom and 1 bath and living room. 

	Heating floors over the house, sun panels, security system and a garage for 2 cars. You can reach by foot to the prestigious private school Swans and Nagüeles Natural Park. 

	The proximity to Marbella and Puerto Banús makes this urbanization very attractive for living. It is 5-minutes´ drive from Marbella and Puerto Banus.

title: Marbella Club Golf Resort, Villa with Impressive Views in Marbella Club Golf Resort
description:
Villa for sale in Marbella Club Golf Resort, Benahavis This beautiful villa is situated in the well-known and luxurious urbanization of Marbella Club Golf Resort in Benahavís. The plot is unique for its fabulous position  enjoying impressive views over the golf course to the sea, Gibraltar and Africa.
The construction of this house was finished in 2002, built over 3 levels, all connected by a private lift and stairways. The main entrance is on the middle level, accessible via a large front courtyard with a small roundabout and a decorative wall fountain. In addition to the remote controlled car entrance gate, there is a separate pedestrian gate. The villa welcomes you with a double high entrance area leading on to the main living room with fireplace, formal dining area, both leading out to a covered south facing terrace with stunning views. Sitting room with a fireplace, a fully fitted kitchen with breakfast area enjoying beautiful views over the sea and mountains, library/ study area and the master bedroom with en suite bathroom and wardrobe. The upper level consists of three spacious bedrooms all en suite and with access to terraces. There is a large sitting and TV area and a computer room, which could be converted into a large bedroom suite, with a south facing terrace. The lower ground floor has a large sitting / play area, a bodega dining area with wine cellar, a laundry room, a kitchen leading out to a protected covered terrace and the private swimming pool and garden. On this floor there is a 3 car garage, a machinery room and a fully equipped changing room with shower and space for a sauna. In addition there is a completely independent staff apartment. The garden slopes down from the entrance area around the house in Southern direction towards the private garden in front of the house with an oval infinity swimming pool on the lower ground floor level. Below this garden is a further lower garden with a fishpond.  The house has under floor heating in all rooms, A/C hot and cold, automatic sprinkler system, a sophisticated security system, indirect LED light fittings, cream marble floors, electric shutters in some of the windows and video entry. title: Atalaya de Rio Verde, Villa Close to Puerto Banus
description: Villa for sale in Atalaya de Rio Verde, Nueva Andalucia Absolutely charming villa situated in the area of Atalaya de Rio Verde, between Nueva Andalucia and Puerto Banus at approximately 10 kms from Marbella and 2kms from Puerto Banus. The property is located on a plot of 1000 sqm and surrounded by a mature old grown garden which gives the property maximum privacy. The accommodation features a guest toilet in the entrance hall, a lounge with handicraft fireplace, dining area, fully fitted kitchen with breakfast corner and exit to the outdoor covered porch with dining table and further on to the orchard. A master bedroom with a fireplace, en-suite bathroom with bath tub, separate shower and fabulous view of the swimming pool complete the ground level. Due to the architectural design of the house one of the bedroom suites of the upper floor lead out both to the garden and a courtyard with a fountain. The third bedroom has en-suite bathroom and built-in cupboards. The house also boasts semi basement level with a lounge and a fourth bedroom with separate shower room, machinery room and a water tank. The roof terrace has space and pre installation for the development of a fifth bedroom with en-suite bathroom. The garage can easily hold two cars. Central heating with radiators via water and oil, air conditioning with heat pump, alarm system, home automation system, wood imitating aluminum carpentry and marble flooring. title: Villa for sale in Guadalmina Alta, San Pedro de Alcantara. Villa at Guadalmina Alta
description:
In this property, there are 3 levels – the semi-basement, ground floor and first floor. There is also parking, the garden and a private pool. 
On the ground floor you will find a spacious hall with high ceilings, an integrated kitchen which is completely equipped with appliances of Miele and Neff. There is a large living area and dining room with a fireplace and it also has access to the terrace that surrounds the entire floor. On this same floor, there are also 3 double bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms, laundry room which is equipped with appliances Miele and a machinery room – like another bathroom for the communal areas. 
Multipurpose area on the ground floor with pre-installation so that you have a choice of what you would like to install in that area of the property. 
On the first floor, you have a spacious master suite with an impressive walk in wardrobe. 
The semi-basement has the function of a garage and has space to park 2 cars in. 
This wonderful area enjoys a garden and a private pool and all next to the golf course. It is ideal for those who are looking for a tranquil and safe area but also very near to everything.
