title: Las Lomas del Marbella Club, Villa in Privileged Location on the Golden Mile
description: Villa for sale in Las Lomas del Marbella Club, Marbella Golden Mile Beautifully decorated villa, built in 2004, in an excellent location in the best area of the Golden Mile. The property comprises on the ground floor, an entrance hall with double height ceilings, a spacious living room with fireplace with access to a covered glassed in terrace and an uncovered terrace,  a separate dining room with adjoining small Moroccan style tea salon. The kitchen is fully fitted with two windows and has an adjoining storeroom with separate entrance and access to the dining room. There is also a guest toilet  and a guest bedroom with en suite bathroom with exit out to the pool and garden and a separate maid’s bedroom with shower room. On the upper floor there are three double bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms with natural light, the main one with a large open terrace and the other two with balconies. All bedrooms have built-in cupboards and sea views. The basement consists of an attractive wine bodega, a TV/ cinema room, a garage for two cars, a workshop, a laundry room, a guest toilet, a large walk-in closet, an office with natural light, a storage room and a small gymnasium with natural light and a Jacuzzi room with sauna, shower and fantastic views towards the ‘La Concha’ mountain. The mature garden with beautiful plants features a fish pond with waterfall, a private pool and large exterior entertainment area – with a covered pergola for barbecue, a large log oven and a complete rustic kitchen.  White aluminium double glazed windows, air conditioning (hot and cold) throughout the house via three heat pumps, video intercom, alarm system with cameras, automatic entrance gate are also included in this offering. title: Linda Vista Alta, Nice Family Home
description: More images   Villa for sale in Linda Vista Alta, San Pedro de Alcantara Beautiful house, just outside the centre of the town, within walking distance from the Guadalmina golf course with its great offer of shops and restaurants.  This charming property, totally refurbished to German quality standards, consists of 2 symmetric villas connected by a gallery that could be easily modified.  Each villa includes a spacious L-shaped living room with incorporated dining area and fireplace, fully fitted kitchen with laundry room and guest cloakroom. The main villa offers an extra office as well as a sauna with shower room. Both villas enjoy 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms on the ground floor, a large master suite on the first floor with dressing room, office and access to the communal solarium terrace with sea views.  For year-round entertainment, this double villa offers a lovely BBQ area under the covered terrace, a heated swimming pool, manicured garden, long covered terrace as well as a garage for one car with various storage rooms.  Finished to fine quality standards and tiled in a combination of marble and terracotta, this villa is fitted with air conditioning hot and cold in some bedrooms, central gas heating and electric under floor heating, satellite television, ADSL telephone line as well as a private water well and water tank.  The property is ideal as a joint purchase for business partners or family with growing kids. description: Villa for sale in Monte Mayor Golf, Benahavis Built in 2002 this south facing rustic villa enjoys very peaceful surroundings and is situated in close proximity of the Marbella Club Golf Resort within Monte Mayor area boasting spectacular views to the Mediterranean Coast. The property also includes mature garden with a heated and salt water swimming pool (50 m2), a gazebo, a BBQ area for lounging and relaxation with outdoor kitchen. Air conditioning with heating, under floor heating (oil), marble floors, alarm system, B&O system, automatic irrigation system, satellite T.V. are some other features. title: 4 Bedroom Villa | Benahavis, Costa Del Sol, Spain
description:
Exclusive new modern villa located in one of the most exclusive gated community in the Costa del Sol, in Capanes Sur in Benahavis, with south facing views of the mountains and the sea.

The villa was built in 2007 and has been recently refurbished, combining traditional and natural building materials. It has extensive use of natural stone throughout and boasts all marbled bathrooms and wooden white washed ceiling beams. 

The villa is distributed over two floors and comprises on the ground floor a spacious living, a fully fitted Balthaup kitchen with Neff appliances, separate dining and laundry areas, a guest toilet and one of the bedroom suites. The master bedroom suite and two further en suite bedrooms are located on the first floor. 

Outside is the garden which can be accessed through large patio doors from the living area, with its swimming pool and terraces.

Other features include air conditioning, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, double glazing, alarm and video entrance. It is close to all amenities and only 5 to 10 minutes drive to the beach and Puerto Banus.

title: El Almendro, Villa in Gated Community
description:
Villa for sale in El Almendro, Benahavis Classic style villa with wonderful views to the coast, the sea and the mountains.  Set on a plot of land mainly orientated to the south west to capitalize on the splendid views of the beautifully designed outdoor area, swimming pool and out to sea this property has been built on two levels with various covered and uncovered terraces all around, and a bar with kitchen and BBQ area. 
With southwest orientation the villa was built in 2000 and has been kept in pristine condition with a large entrance hall, a lounge with dining area, a fireplace and high ceilings. The fully fitted kitchen has a with breakfast corner. On the main level there is also the master bedroom suite and two guest bedrooms suite. This level has direct access to the heated pool and garden from the reception area. The lower floor has Staff or guest apartment, fully fitted with separate bedroom/bathroom and two garages. The villa is fitted with A/C split units with heating, gas fired central heating, under floor heating in master suite and guest bathrooms.  Located in a gated urbanization, the villa is close to all amenities, 5 to 10 minutes drive to the beach, Puerto Banus and Marbella centre. description:
Magnificent villa, in Capellania Hill Club, one of the most luxurious heights of Marbella, Golden Mile, between the centre of Marbella and Puerto Banus, with the most exclusive boutiques and nightspots nearby. 

	It offers the most breathtaking views to both the mountains and the Mediterranean. 

	The Villa has 600 m2 built, in “Condominium” style (garden areas, private jogging lane, king-size summer and heated winter swimming pools, pool house, maintained by the community). Distributed on three floors with individual lift. Bedrooms with bathrooms in-suite on all floors. Spacious living room and dinning area. Large fully equipped kitchen. Very large basement, with office and living area, cinema room and additional room. A very large underground garage, fitting 4-5 cars, with private access. 

	Exceptional qualities, finishings and exclusive materials.

title: Ancon Sierra, Three Bedroom Villa in Private Community on the Golden Mile
description: Villa for sale in Ancon Sierra, Marbella Golden Mile Charming villa in the peaceful and private urbanization of Ancon Sierra, on the Golden Mile of Marbella. This property offers all the comforts of the private living of a villa, but at the same time all the convenient services that one enjoys whilst belonging to a community of houses. It is situated at just a 3kms from Marbella Town and Puerto Banús and offers beautiful views to the sea and mountains from upstairs. A large entrance hall welcomes you to this cozy house, leading you through to the split level living/dining room. Both have access out to the large garden with private swimming pool and covered terrace. Furthermore, the ground level has a guest toilet, an ensuite bedroom that is currently being used as a study/library and a long fully fitted kitchen that connects directly with the dining area and a back patio. The upper level hosts two ensuite double bedrooms sharing a south facing terrace looking down to the private garden and pool with sea views, and one of them with an additional terrace on the east side of the room with mountain views. This property features marble floors, A/C (hot and cold), fireplace in the living room and a double height skylight on the staircase permitting natural light into the house all day through. title: Fuente del Espanto, Secluded And Tranquil
description: Villa for sale in Fuente del Espanto, San Pedro de Alcantara Being totally secluded and tranquil, this spacious and very private south east facing villa is resting amid 1.046 sqm of greenery within San Pedro de Alcantara’s district Fuente del Espanto. Though built more than 3 decades ago, it was carefully maintained and meticulously repaired during all these years and now has an immaculate appearance. The property features an entrance hall leading on to the kitchen and adjoining laundry on its right hand side. Moving further there is a lounge with a fire place, dining room, a guest toilet and three bedroom suites. Both the lounge and the dining room are connected to a covered porch which leads out to a poolside area. On the upper floor the master bedroom with wall to wall carpet is situated. It comprises a shower room, built-in cupboards and open terrace with countryside views and the sea in between. The property is surrounded by mature gardens with impeccable lawns and well maintained flowerbeds. Alarm system, BBQ area, fountain, one-car carport, double glazed aluminium windows, marble flooring are some other features. title: La Cerquilla, Fantastic Luxury Duplex Penthouse
description:
Penthouse for sale in La Cerquilla, Nueva Andalucia Luminous and very luxurious duplex penthouse set in Nueva Andalucia offering superb views over the golf valley, the Mediterranean sea and the Marbella mountains. Southwest and East facing penthouse, consisting of an entrance hall leading to a fully-fitted kitchen with attractive breakfast area and a laundry room to the left and to the right to a spacious living room with fireplace and separate dining area both with exit to a half covered terrace with views to the sea and mountain. There is one bedroom with en suite bathroom, a guest cloakroom and a storage room also on this level.  Upstairs you find 2 bedrooms, which have been creatively redesigned to create a substantial en suite master bedroom with an open walk through office with a large sunny south east facing terrace, a dressing room, en suite bathroom with Jacuzzi bath and power shower and a private south west facing terrace. Set in a beautiful secured, gated and quiet complex with numerous service facilities, such as five community pools with one indoor heated pool with sauna and fitness area and beautiful mature gardens. The apartment features, A/C hot/cold and under floor heating in bathrooms, fitted wardrobes, double glazing, electric shutters, home automation system, 2 parking spaces, two storage rooms, 24 hour security and concierge service.
Low community fees of only 390€ / month. description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Los Granados Playa, Estepona Serenity and elegance can be found in this luxurious top-floor south facing duplex penthouse located in Los Granados Playa. A hallway from the entrance hall leads to two bedrooms (one used at present as a dressing room) sharing a bathroom with shower, and at the end of this hallway is the master bedroom with bathroom ensuite, a separate toilet, a cosy sitting area opening to the terrace shared with the lounge and to a small and private one. The living room also has been extended and has a dining area. There is a further bedroom with an interior private bathroom which includes a bathtub, a w.c., and a two hand wash basins, while the third bedroom with an exit to the terrace, faces south. There is a spacious kitchen with ceramic tiled flooring, breakfast area, Siemens appliances and Silestone worktops.  A guest toilet completes this offering. description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Monte Paraiso Country Club, Marbella Golden Mile Wonderful ground floor apartment situated in one of the most sought-after complexes in Marbella, Monte Paraiso Country Club. The Country Club has a short 9-hole golf course and a Club House with fitness centre and heated swimming pool. The west facing property boasts a large lounge /dining room with a fireplace leading onto a large covered terrace decorated with flower beds and exit to the communal gardens. After meticulous refurbishing the kitchen was opened up to the lounge and is currently equipped with top of the range Siemens appliances and features a breakfast table and a separate laundry. Great comfort is assured by the excellent quality of finishes, imaginative interiors, spacious rooms and well-planned layout comprising of an entrance hall with a cloakroom and 3 bedrooms, each with private bathrooms and wardrobes. The master bedroom shares the terrace with the lounge and includes a bathroom with Jacuzzi and a shower. The property features carefully selected marble flooring, electrically operated blinds, double glazing with fire-proof timber joinery, under-floor heating throughout, a/c cold and hot, alarm system in the entire apartment, video entry phone, two parking spaces and a store room. description:
This front line urbanization with landscaped gardens has swimming pool by the sea and the seafront promenade, indoor SPA and heated pool It features luxury apartments, with spacious terraces and it’s conveniently situated.

	Spacious 2-bedroom ground floor apartment with private garden of 25m2, direct access to the pool and the beach. Overlooking the sea depending on the orientation. 

	All apartments have the following technical specifications: marble floors, fully fitted kitchens, central heating, UFH, automation, fitted wardrobes, bath tub with hydro massage, 24-hour surveillance service. Security service with controlled access that guarantees privacy. It features a private underground parking with one parking space and one storage room included.

	Mar Azul residential complex is only 5-mintue drive from Estepona’s city center.

	Ideally located in the “New Golden Mile”, it allows you to enjoy all the amenities within minutes: schools, hospitals, shopping areas, Puerto Banús, 
Leisure areas. Moreover, important golf courses are nearby, like Los Flamingos and Finca Cortesin.

description:
Elegant townhouse in one of the best residential areas of the Golden Mile, close to all amenities, just minutes from the Hotel Puente Romano and the beach.

	Distributed on three levels plus basement, the property comprises: large living/dining room with fireplace and glass sliding doors leading onto a partly covered terrace and private garden, guest toilet, fully fitted and equipped kitchen with laundry patio. Upstairs: master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and private terrace, 2 bedrooms sharing a bathroom. A further en-suite bedroom is on the top level. Large basement ideal for storage area and access from there to the two underground parking spaces. Central heating by community gas. 

	The property is in inmaculate condition, in a secure and quite location inside the complex.

	Ideal as a family home in Marbella.

title: Penthouse for sale in Nueva Andalucia. Andalusian style detached house in Nueva Andalucía, Marbella.
description:
Beautiful duplex penthouse with rustic and Andalusian style located in the Nueva Andalucia valley. It is an 8 properties community, one pool and a few minutes drive from Puerto Banús and very close from all type of amenities as shops, restaurants as well as surrounded by golf courses.

	On the entrance there is the entrance hall, 1 guest toilet, large living room divided in two spaces, sitting area with fireplace, as well as a dining area. 
It has direct access to a big terrace with two levels boasting spectacular Las Brisas golf views. The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped. On the upper level, there is a bedroom of incredible views that it is currently used as offices with a space for a bed on the side. Furthermore, two more bedrooms with bathrooms en-suite. On the same level a small room used as laundry area.

	On the exterior of the community, there is another andalusian terrace with a barbecue and sourrounded by beautiful gardes, as well as an area to be used as storage. The property has a private garage with capacity for two vehicles.

title: Beach Side Golden Mile, Stunning Property in Prime Location
description: Semi Detached Villa for sale in Beach Side Golden Mile, Marbella Golden Mile Newly refurbished property located on a beautiful second line beach position in the sought after area of Puente Romano,right in the heart of the Golden Mile. Designed by Pedro Peña, one of Marbella’s most renowned interior design companies. The villa is one of the 6 houses built over the plot of 2525sq m. It has been refurbished to the highest standards and boasts the latest high-tech equipment and installations including Home Automation system throughout, iPad controlled underfloor heating, a/c, lighting, audio and TV, ceiling speakers and double glazed frameless glass curtains among others. The ground floor features three guest bedrooms, all en suite with Villeroy & Boch, Catalano, AXOR from Hans Grohe and Alape sanitaryware.  A hydraulic lift connects all floors and leads up to an attractive open plan Gaggenau kitchen on the first floor, looking out onto a lovely terrace with pool and partial sea views. Curtains and blinds in the living/dining room are controlled by a Vantage system. The second floor comprises a spacious master suite with a private terrace, a dressing room, a reading corner and a pull down screen with projector. The master bathroom includes Aquavision TV within the mirror, bath jets, rain shower and shower jets. At semi-basement level, the villa enjoys a lovely SPA area with sauna and rain shower, a Tv/Cinema room, with HD/Blu-Ray projector, a bar area and exterior BBQ area. The garage features a revolving car platform and a laundry area with Miele appliances. title: Cascada de Camojan, Stunning Contemporary Jewel
description:
A Personal Comment from Pia Arrieta 
This is one of Marbella's most unique villas and is one of those properties that you remember throughout the years. Its original design, choice of materials and the quality of the build, which one can appreciate immediately are features which make it a real eye catcher. Our whole team is very fond of the villa and it is always a pleasure to show clients around and get to see their positive reactions as we walk through each room. We can't stop talking about the views this villa enjoys, overlooking tree tops down the valley all the way to the sea and a 180 degree panorama. You will find it hard to find a modern home with these views in the area!  Villa for sale in Cascada de Camojan, Marbella Golden Mile Featuring airy and light-filled living spaces, the visually stunning residence offers a lifestyle of exceptional style and comfort. No expense was spared in the design of the indoor and outdoor areas. The home affords spacious luxury in an open floor plan. Expansive windows flood the interior with gorgeous views and abundant light, which beautifully offsets its sleek lines. 
A huge pivot entry door opens to the living spaces, featuring a great entrance hall with soaring ceiling with a Swarovski chandelier that leads to a magnificent terrace looking out to the swimming pool and the sea. The living room is designed in split level and has exit to the terrace. The truly stunning Poggenpohl kitchen with dining area and a bar offers two fridges and a wine cellar. A large laundry room and a guest toilet adjoin. 
The landing with a bar on the upper floor leads to the gym and relax area surrounded by a terrace with electric awnings and superb sea views. The master suite features a wall of windows, a dressing room behind the Vi-Spring bed (the queen of luxury bock spring beds), a make-up room, and a lavish bathroom featuring dual vanities, windows with special darkening system, a sunken black marbled bath tub with water fall, a separate Dornbracht shower with light effects and aroma choices and exit to an eastern facing open terrace with wooden deck.  Both the master suite and the gym have vaulted beamed ceilings. There is a further bedroom suite on this level with an office, a terrace, a bedroom and a shower room.
The guest or staff duplex apartment adjacent to the main house, but totally independent, consists of a living room with open plan kitchen, a guest toilet, two bedrooms, one with dressing room, sharing a bathroom. 
Among further delights are two heated swimming pools, a lake with cascade and two pool houses, a lift to all floors, Lutron system, a stucco walled hammam area, furniture by Lamborghini and Fendi in many rooms, a fireplace in the lounge, air conditioning and under floor heating by gasoil on ground and first floors. Superb garden with some spectacular trees like huge olive and Australian black trunk palm trees. title: Los Picos, Exceptional Home at Foothills of Sierra Blanca
description:
A Personal Comment from Roberto Quintana 
Ideal home for those looking for privacy and seclusion yet only a few minutes drive from the beach and all amenities. A private and gated community comprised of just a few luxury villas set at the foothills of La Concha mountain and within the background of a green protected area. Traditional on the outside, the interior of the villa is of modern design and it has a very functional layout that will appeal to a family with children. It has a fabulous cinema room and no doubt it is one of the best I have seen in a private home.  Villa for sale in Los Picos, Marbella Golden Mile Impressive luxury villa nestled within a peaceful location of the secure and gated urbanisation of Los Picos in Marbella, situated  at 3, 7 km. to the beach, 4,7 km. to Marbella’s Old town, 54 km. to Malaga International Airport  and 8 km. to  Puerto Banus with its shops and restaurants. Completed in 2003, this tempting estate fulfills all expectations of what a luxury property should be, comprising a double-height entrance hall completed with a coat room/wardrobe and a guest toilet and leading to the south facing lounge / dining room with a fireplace and exit to a covered terrace and the beautiful immaculate garden with a swimming pool and gazebo. On the right hand side of the corridor there is a fully fitted kitchen with breakfast area and direct access to the terrace with a big dining table, water supply and BBQ perfect for summer dining. On the left hand side of the corridor there is an office with plenty of shelves and space for books and magazines, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wooden wardrobes and en suite marble bathrooms, one of them facing the entrance patio with lemon trees and neatly trimmed shrubs, and the other one facing the garden with access through a sliding door on to the covered terrace.  The upper level, connected via a gorgeous marble staircase, offers the master suite area with a cozy foyer facing the courtyard and leading to the walk-in wardrobe with sky light, to the ample marble bathroom with a bath tub, and shower cubicle, as well as to the sizeable bedroom with a private terrace overlooking the garden and the sea. On the same floor there is a guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in wardrobe. In the basement there is a spacious cinema room with windows and electric shutters, guest toilet, laundry room with washing machine and tumble dryer, a generous garage for more than 4 cars, machinery room, lots of storage space, pantry and gym with stairs ascending to the garden level and leading directly to the pool. Staff accommodation with exterior windows consisting of a living room, one large bedroom with en suite marble bathroom and a kitchen is also situated in the basement level and could be used like an independent apartment. It is worth mentioning that all the rooms in the villa are exterior and therefore have natural light during the day. Additional features include a swimming pool with pre-installation for heating, air-conditioning with heat pump, gas-oil under floor heating in the entrance hall, kitchen, lounge/dining room and corridors, and radiator heaters in the rest of the house; marble flooring throughout the house, double glazing, “Iroko” teak carpentry, automatic sprinklers in the garden, alarm system, water tank, gas-oil tank for 3.000 litres and water softener. title: Rocio de Nagüeles, Modern villa in the heart of the Golden Mile with sea views
description:
Villa for sale in Rocio de Nagüeles, Marbella Golden Mile Contemporary style, original layout and open spaces with sea views highlight this extraordinary family house with south west orientation situated within the well known urbanization of Rocío de Nagüeles in the heart of the Golden Mile with easy access to the main road which takes you to Marbella centre and the nearest sandy beach.  The property was built to the highest standards and specifications. The ground floor comprises a lovely entrance area, a master bedroom with bathroom and private terrace and two more bedrooms sharing the shower room and the terrace with sea views. There is a west facing terrace with pre-installed underfloor heating which could be enclosed and used as an office or additional living space. The upper floor hosts a large living room with dining area, a fitted kitchen with central island and exit to the open private terrace with table ideal for breakfast. There is an extra bedroom suite on this level. All the rooms offer spectacular sea views of the Mediterranean coast, African Atlas and Gibraltar.
From this level a spiral staircase takes you to the spacious roof terrace with pre-installation for BBQ. On the ground level you can find two separate living areas, one with two bedrooms which share a shower room and the other one with an en-suite bedroom, both of them with separate entrance from the garden. The laundry area, Turkish bath and machinery room are also found on this level. The villa also features ceramic flooring, alarm system, surveillance cameras, security glass, electrical shutters in bedrooms, A/C heat and cold, electric underfloor heating in bathrooms and water under floor heating in the rest of the areas on the ground and first floor, aluminum carpentry, sound system, pre-installation for the elevator, 2 water tanks, water softener and parking for 4-5 cars. title: Villa for sale in Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile. Villa Campanella, a new view of contemporary luxury in Sierra Blanca
description:
Elegant volumes and clean surfaces, combined to provide a sense of visual harmony, that’s the essence of this exquisite contemporary villa.

	Settle in the hills of Sierra Blanca – with splendid sea and mountain views – the interaction between the exterior and the interior has been design to extend the possibilities of the leisure areas to it’s maximum.

	We are received by the sound of a pool fountain and an original structural pergola that provide intimacy and shade to the main entrance, where a double height door gives access to travertine marble hall, flanked by the wooden areal staircase and the welcoming minimal interior fountain.

	The light coming from the impressive double height panoramic windows of the interior garden – with views to La Concha mountain -, will guide us to the magnificent living area – also of double height – completely open to both interior and exterior gardens with the infinity pool and the sea view as perfect background.
The living area has an open concept and is distributed in four different ambiances: the main central lounge and the secondary lounge that share a double façade chimney, a musical corner by the interior garden French window and the dinning area placed next to the formal open kitchen – with service kitchen at the back – and the breakfast island with direct access to the exterior dinning area.

	For its dimensions and structure, this villa is perfect for entertaining large parties all year round.

	Also in this floor, we find two double bedrooms with bathrooms en suite and dressing areas with direct access to the front garden and a guest powder room.

	When we access to the second floor, we will find ourselves in an areal passage that lead to the two independent wings, one with three double bedrooms with bathrooms en suite and dressing areas, all of them with direct access to the terrace that once open the French window will be completely integrated in the room.

	Just across the areal passage, we access to the master bedroom area that comprises a living room with a spectacular view, a double dressing room and a resting area looking onto the sea and with direct access to the terrace. The bathroom deserves special attention; it has an iconic bathtub looking over the panoramic window, double vanities with exquisite modern finishing’s and double walking shower all surrounded by glass courtains.

	The villa is completed with a luxurious SPA – Turkish bath and sauna – a gym and a covered heated pool located in the basement. Also in this floor, we find the independent staff quarters with an open patio, laundry and storage rooms, kitchen service lift, machinery room and a garage with porcelanic titled floor with capacity for 8 cars.

	The gardens are the perfect complement for the spacious interiors, providing a sense of intimacy and relax atmosphere that connects with the spirit and invites to enjoy under the sun.

	The villa has been constructed with first quality materials and developed by a prestigious company with more than 30 years of experience.

	FLOORING AND TILING

	• Travertine marble flooring inside the home.

	• In machine room, storage room 4, garage and covered access to garage Porcelanosa
porcelain tile model Urbatek Town Arena Nature.

	• Travertine marble on terraces and outside porches.

	• Travertine marble lining in bathrooms.

	• Sand-blasted travertine marble shower plates.

	• Stamped concrete in parking and garage access.

	JOINERY

	• Exterior joinery is made of lacquered aluminium, TECHNAL brand, series SOLEAL
FY,SOLEAL FY65 and LUMEAL GA. Double glazing Climalit with air chamber, or
laminated.

	• Exterior railings EASY GLASS SLIM by Q-RAILING, glazing with clear laminated
glass.

	• Entrance door to the home with phenolic core lined in Iroko wood on both faces,
with three-point safety lock and chromed fittings.

	• Inside doors measuring 2.75 m and 50 mm thick, with Iroko lining panel similar to
model VT-6, varnished, with top quality chromed fittings.

	• Wardrobe fronts with sliding doors lined in Iroko wood matching the inside doors,
22 mm thick, lined and finished with shelving inside, drawer cabinets with metal
guides, chromed hanging-rod and double-rod shoe rack.

	• Straight washbasin counters made of Iroko wood, 4.5 cm thick.

	• Sliding shutters with Iroko slats on bedroom porches on top floor and bedroom
porches on ground floor.

	SAFETY AND PROTECTION ELEMENTS

	• Pedestrian sliding door to access the plot lined on both sides with Iroko wood,
with automatic opening mechanism activated by remote control.

	• Garage door, sliding single panel motorised with automatic opening mechanism
activated by remote control.

	ELECTRICITY

	• Electricity mechanisms brand JUNG.

	• Pre-installation of home cinema system in living room.

	• High quality ambience music.

	• LED light fixtures in the ceiling.

	• Video intercom Mobotix.

	• Alarm installation Paradox

	DOMOTICS

	• Installation of domotics system KNX and Creston.

	• Domotics controlled by iPad.

	BATHROOM FIXTURES AND TAPS 

	• Brand Villeroy & Boch series Subway 2.0 and Venticello.

	• Surface-mounted washbasins, series Architectura and
Venticello.

	• Villeroy & Boch bathtubs taps and fittings

	• Brand Hansgrohe series Citterio E and Starck X

	AIR CONDITIONING, HEATING AND HOT WATER

	• DAIKIN brand inverter heat/cold air conditioning system.

	• Water-heated radiant floor heating system in every room.

	• Hot water heated by solar energy and heat pump.

	OTHER INSTALLATIONS

	• Bioethanol fireplace in main living room and in sitting room 2.

	• Electric lift, brand OTIS GEN2 400Kg

	• Service lift OTIS ZD 100Kg

	EXTERIOR

	• Automatic watering system in garden.

	• Garden finished with grass and garden soil.

	• Controlled lighting in parking area.

	• Outside swimming pool made with H-25 concrete, lined with 2.5×2.5 cm tiles, with pre-installation for heat pump and lighting by underwater spotlights

	Square distribution by floor:

	GROUND FLOOR (464,76m2): Entrance hall with double height and with transparent staircase, lift, service lift for clothes, guest toilet, wardrobe for visitors, large kitchen with dining room, double height living room, two bedrooms en suite and large porch.

	FIRST FLOOR (384,48m2): Three bedrooms en suite with access to common terrace, living room with fireplace and large master suite with dressing room and private terrace. Common upper terrace.

	BASEMENT FLOOR (859,80m2): Apartment for guests or staff, heated pool and Jacuzzi, small garden, laundry, drying room, machine room, a large multipurpose room, garage for at least 8 cars + outdoor parking for 3 cars.

title: Los Altos de los Monteros, Exquisite Design and Magnificent Views
description:
Villa for sale in Los Altos de los Monteros, Marbella East Top of the line villa in one of the most sought after residential areas famous for its unmatched panoramic views of the coast, and African Atlas Mountains.
The property is 8 km from Marbella town and 15 km from Puerto Banus(distances are approximate). The property was designed by well known local architects in a modern and contemporary style using a combination of decorative stones, wood and glass. The interiors distributed with care comprise an entrance hall, open plan kitchen with central island and Miele electric appliances, adjoining laundry and spacious lounge with a gas fireplace, dining area and with huge solar control windows offering WOW factor to the residents providing unrivalled south west coastal views and the infinity edge swimming pool. Two bedroom suites with built-in cupboards and toilet complete the entrance level. The garden level accessed via wide marble stairs is distributed into two more bedrooms with en-suite shower rooms and lounge. All the rooms lead out to the garden and large saline chlorination pool with chill-out area and toilet in the garden.  The roof terrace with spectacular views offers possibilities for development.
In addition the property features GIRA home automation system, gas under floor heating, air conditioning throughout the villa, alarm, 2 car garage and outdoor parking for 3 cars. description: Villa for sale in Santa Clara, Marbella East Ultra modern villa in Marbella East, in the stunning area of Santa Clara Golf, offering a perfect combination between the tranquility and privacy of the outskirts with beautiful views to the sea and the mountains, and the convenient proximity to the town of Marbella with all sorts of services. This villa will be equipped with pre-installations of home automation, alarm and lift, security safe, air conditioning and Silestone work tops and Siemens appliances in the kitchen. The property will consist of spacious and bright living areas and a basement with garage for 2 cars. The private garden will be landscaped with a saltwater swimming pool. Facilities nearby: a golf course within the urbanization, 3 km. to Royal Tennis Club and La Cabane Beach club at 3,5 km. title: Villa for sale in Santa Clara, Marbella East. Villa in Santa Clara Golf, Marbella
description:
This is an exceptional and exclusive lifestyle project located in East Marbella.

	The designs explore the dynamics of space to produce a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living using clean architectural lines, luxury interiors, the highest quality materials and inspirational landscaping to deliver a superb finish in a privileged setting with views to the sea, mountains and golf course.

	“Icon” derived from Iconic will offer Limited Edition Living for a privileged few as there will be only 20 signature villas within the Project.

	ICON Signature Villas is the realisation of six distinguished architects who have come together to create a lifestyle sensation: a landmark project offering unique architectural designs that harmonise with the natural surroundings.

	Rodolfo Amieva Jacobson, Eduardo Oria, Hugo Torrico, Manuel Burgos, José Muñoz Campos and Patrick Murphy bring to this exclusive project the individual qualities that have given their exquisite work international recognition.

	This resort is not about uniformity: Its all about Living & Lifestyle, Unique Signature Villas that are true works of art.

title: Los Granados Golf, Frontline golf duplex penthouse
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Los Granados Golf, Nueva Andalucia In a fine golf course location within mature tropical gardens, Los Granados Golf offers luxurious living in the utmost privacy and security. This exclusive complex of only 55 apartments offers 24 hour security, beautifully manicured gardens, communal pool, interior heated pool, gymnasium, his and hers saunas, changing rooms, events room and Jacuzzi. Positioned at approximately 10km drive to Puerto Banus and to Marbella town centre and only a short stroll to Las Brisas Golf Club, this is an ideal spot for golf enthusiasts. This corner duplex-penthouse with south orientation and views down to the golf and the sea features on its ground level an extensive lounge and 4 bedroom suites. Currently one of them is used as an office, with all the plumbings in place. Upstairs floor is distributed into a lounge, toilet and terrace with a swimming pool. 2 garage spaces, space for buggy, large storage, air conditioning with heating pump and video entry phone are also included in the offering. title: Nagüeles, Splendid duplex penthouse with sea views
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Nagüeles, Marbella Golden Mile The complex is set in tranquil grounds, located in the well-established residential area of Nagüeles. It consists of only two buildings with a total of 16 apartments, 4 of which are penthouses. This large three bedroom contemporary, uncluttered home is cleverly designed to blend in with the surrounding environment. The apartment has southwest orientation and boasts panoramic views to the sea, Puerto Banús and Gibraltar.  The property overlooks lush gardens with a communal pool. Qualities are of the highest specifications including wooden floors in top quality oak, both covered and open terraces in ivory cream marble, interior doors of 2,4m, fully fitted top of the range Italian kitchen with stainless steel surfaces and appliances by Siemens with adjacent laundry room, hydro-massage bathtub with spacious walk-in shower in bathrooms, alarm system, independent A/C units, safe, two garage spaces and storage facilities, amongst others. The apartment consists of an ample entrance hall with a guest toilet, spacious living-dining room, fully fitted kitchen and two bedroom suites with sea view on the main level.  On the upper level is the master suite featuring has vaulted ceilings, an ample dressing room with skylight(could be used as a study) and a large terrace with spectacular views. title: Hacienda las Chapas, Modern house in East Marbella
description: Villa for sale in Hacienda las Chapas, Marbella East This elegant property is set East of Marbella in the residential area of Hacienda Las Chapas, a secure and quiet urbanisation near the Port of Cabopino and just a short drive to the beach and several golf courses. This modern style villa is set on a large flat plot of 1956m2 with a private pool and well kept mature garden. The property comprises on the garden level of an entrance hall with guest cloakroom, continuing on to a spacious living and dining room of 85m2, modern Italian kitchen with working island and two bedrooms sharing one bathroom. A studio, currently being used as a games room and office complete this level. On the upper floor is the master bedroom with en suite bathroom and walk in wardrobe and a south facing terrace from where you can enjoy lovely views over the garden towards the sea. The fourth bedroom comes with an en suite bathroom, wardrobe and private terrace. The basement consists of a private gym, machinery room, wine cellar, games room, two bathrooms, a garage for two cars and a storage room  Other features of the property include (hot and cold) air-conditioning, diesel heated radiators, a private 4 × 8 mts pool and a vegetable garden. description: Penthouse for sale in Guadalmina Baja, San Pedro de Alcantara A fantastic beachfront penthouse situated in Guadalmina boasting incredible uninterrupted sea and coastline views. Located just a short drive from San Pedro and Puerto Banús and close to two golf courses. This south facing penthouse is located in Guadalmina Beach, a prestigious beachfront block of apartments meticulously and lovingly maintained. The property offers a large covered terrace with sun blinds overlooking the beach, the private beach club and the sea. The interior is bathed with natural light, which filters through aluminium windows with electric shutters. The apartment consists of an entrance hall leading straight ahead to the L-shape living room with dining area and a fireplace. The ceramic-floored new kitchen is located to the right of the entrance hall. Opposite the kitchen there is an en-suite bedroom. There are another two bedrooms off the living room, all with en-suite bathrooms. Also included there is a parking space for a car in the lower level garage. The property features fibre optic, air conditioning with heat pump, marble flooring and electric shutters. title: Condado de Sierra Blanca, Charming Top Floor Property
description: Penthouse for sale in Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile Fantastic south facing penthouse situated in Condado de Sierra Blanca on the hill of the iconic La Concha Mountain in Marbella, enjoying the natural surroundings and breathtaking sea views over Gibraltar and the coast of Africa in bright days. The complex nestles within mature communal gardens offering 2 magnificent swimming pools; one with rectangular shape for swimming and the other recreating a tropical beach for relax. The property occupies the entire top floor of the three storey building and features an entrance foyer with columns, leading to a lounge, to the fully fitted kitchen on the right and to the sleeping area on the left hand side.  The lounge has direct access to the sunny terrace with pergola boasting open panoramic views of the pine area and the sea in the distance. The kitchen is totally equipped with state-of-the-art German appliances and features a covered laundry and ironing area with mountain views. In the eastern wing of the penthouse there are 2 double bedrooms sharing a bathroom and featuring built-in wardrobes and enclosed terraces with mountain views. The master bedroom features a private bathroom with a bath tub and a south facing terrace with sea views. Marble floors throughout except terrace and kitchen, under floor heating in bathrooms, cold and hot central air conditioning, double glazed windows, electric shutters, alarm system, Lutron lighting control in living room, parking space and a storage are some of the features of this attractive three bedroom penthouse. title: Apartment for sale in Atrium, Marbella. Apartment in Atrium
description:
Spacious apartment for sale in one of the best areas of Marbella centre, in a second line beach complex in the Atrium Building, an exclusive urbanization with 24 hours security, beautiful tropical gardens and swimming pool. It’s therefore a place that offers security and privacy as well as location, being in Marbella centre, in one of its best areas next to the promenade and the beach.
This luxurious property consists of a bright living-dining room with a big south-east facing terrace surrounding the whole apartment, a fully equipped kitchen with utility room, three bedrooms and three bathrooms (two en suite). From the terrace you can enjoy sea and garden views. It also has a garage and a storage in the same building.
This beautiful and spacious apartment located in Marbella centre is finished to the highest standards and it’s an excellent property for those who want to live in the centre, close to everything, but with the features of a luxury complex.

title: Los Monteros, Sea Front Estate
description: Villa for sale in Los Monteros, Marbella East Fabulous palatial front line beach residence in the sought after Los Monteros private estate, a well established residential area elegantly settled by one of the best beaches of Marbella boasting charming homes, magnificent beachfront estates and luxury apartments. The property is situated in the vicinity of the Costa del Sol hospital, near several golf courses and a short drive to Marbella town and shopping facilities. Its proximity to Los Monteros 5-star Hotel provides 24-hour security service and car guard circulating during the night. This property with exceptionally wide beach frontage is mainly laid out on one floor and around an interior marble floored courtyard decorated in Arabesque style with palm trees and covered gallery. The yard separates all estate into two parts, the southern one with the main house and guest quarters in its northern part. The main villa features an entrance hall with a guest toilet, fully fitted and equipped gourmet kitchen, a sumptuous living room and separate formal and informal dining rooms open on to the fabulous covered terrace that leads to the tropical gardens and swimming pool.  The delight of the main part of the villa is its indoor heated swimming pool adjacent to the cinema room and master bedroom suite. The latter comprises a lounge, a TV room, a bedroom with a fire place, a dressing room and spa area with sauna, massage room, hammam and luxurious bathroom facing the garden and sea.  Around the courtyard there are 2 bedroom suites, plus two bedrooms sharing a bathroom plus a self contained apartment for staff with a lounge, bedroom, bathroom, laundry and kitchen. A further guest suite is located in the tower with a private terrace with fabulous views of the sea. Outdoor facilities include several leisure areas, a gazebo by the beach, large pool, thatched roof cabana by the swimming pool with BBQ, sitting and dining areas. The villa benefits from the direct access to beach and is a few steps away from the famous beachclub.  Private driveway with parking for 3 cars and a garage for one car, gymnasium, under floor heating in dining room, surveillance cameras, gas heated water, air conditioning with heat pump, and alarm system are some other facilities included. title: Villa for sale in Los Monteros Playa, Marbella East. Unique & Exquisite Property on  Los Monteros Beachfront
description:
This unique beachfront property is located next to Los Monteros 5* Hotel, that highlights luxurious architectural details and offers an oriental alluring design.
This sophisticated villa is constructed almost completely on one floor with the best-refined style within a special plan distribution in an oval form that provides intimacy and privacy.
One of the most spectacular parts of the house is the private Arabic style SPA area, Turkish Hammam – communal bathhouse, sauna, massage room and last generation gymnasium. This villa offers spacious accommodation, private garden house, entertainment areas by the pool and direct access to the beach.
Most of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, there are several sitting rooms, cinema theatre, indoor heated pool, fully fitted kitchen, and additional chill-out terrace of 494m2 which almost surrounds the house. 
Up in the tower there is another fantastic and private suite bedroom with marvellous sea views.
One of the advantages of the location of this villa is the security that Los Monteros guarantees, and, the closeness to amenities, shopping and famous beach clubs.

title: Los Monteros, Contemporary Beachfront Jewel
description:
A Personal Comment from Pia Arrieta 
Architect Milet has done a great job. He has created an amazing contemporary style villa with skylight windows and interior patios that bring light to every corner of the house whilst he has remained faithful to the original architecture of the first house built on this site. Back in the 80's I visited the house that was only one storey high and had also the curved line on the southern façade that Milet has so wonderfully recreated. A unique site for this wonderful villa.  Villa for sale in Los Monteros, Marbella East Vary rarely does a property like this one come on the market. Not only because of its modernist design but mostly because of its unique front line beach position which makes this villa one of very limited number of properties which enjoy direct access to the beach in the area. Situated within the exclusive residential area of Los Monteros, a tranquil community located just East of Marbella and at a 7 minute drive into the town centre and 15 minutes to Puerto Banus. The area offers 24 hour security, the 5 star Los Monteros hotel and the renowned La Cabane beach club. Completed in 2011, the property has been built to the highest standards and with exquisite attention to detail. The villa has been designed and constructed to include all the features typical of a contemporary luxury home. The expansive split-level living room leads off the entrance hall into to the formal dining room beyond. This area of the house is a superb entertaining area since, besides the generous scale of the living and dining rooms, both lead on to a spacious covered terrace with external fireplace which offers stunning views of the sea.  The large family kitchen has been fully fitted with Silestone work surfaces and equipped with Bosch Appliances and features a central island. A laundry room and staff bedroom with bathroom with independent access complete this wing of the property. Additionally on the ground floor are three bedroom suites – one of which is connected to the main south facing terrace. The interior gardens ensure this cleverly designed home is flooded with daylight in all areas. The infinity pool with its own cascade is lit beautifully during the evening and has its own chill-out area ideal for a sunset cocktail. On the first floor there is a guest bedroom suite and the master bedroom with dressing area and en-suite bathroom. Both bedrooms share a lovely terrace overlooking the pool, garden and the sea. Beautiful sliding doors separate the rooms and interior patios add light and space to the interior of the property. Recessed skirtings and beautiful polished cement floors throughout. Aluminum double glazed windows. Garden with Bermuda grass, perimeter alarm, a/c hot and cold and underfloor heating throughout (underfloor heating is via water except for bathrooms where it is electrical), Lutron ceiling lighting, electric shutters throughout, automatic lights with sensors in staircase and toilet. “Intelligent home” with sophisticated home automation system. Carport for 2 cars. Possibility to further extend the house. Furniture available through separate negotiation. title: Villa for sale in Los Monteros Playa, Marbella East. Impressive beach front Villa in Los Monteros, Marbella
description:
This stunning villa on the sea front of this desirable residential area of Marbella, Los Monteros, is near the luxury social beach club of the area.
The property boasts private beach access and has been built with high quality and exquisite attention to detail.
This “Smart House”, which includes a sophisticated home automation system, also comprises of an entrance hall, guest toilet, a large and spacious living area divided on two levels and an adjoining formal dining room; fully fitted kitchen with Silestone counter-tops, Bosch appliances in a centre island and an attached laundry area. The kitchen has access to the terrace and garden. This level also includes a fabulous covered terrace with an outdoor fireplace giving access to the pool, garden and the beach which is only a few meters away. The garden features a lounging area perfect for reading and relaxing.  
To complete this floor, there are 3 bedrooms that all have their own en-suite. There is also the personnel department on this level and all have their own independent access to the main terrace. With there being interior gardens, there is a reassurance of natural light in all areas. 
On the first floor there is the master bedroom with en-suite and dressing room and also a guest bedroom. The two rooms share a terrace overlooking the pool, the garden and the sea.
The infinity pool has been set with spectacular lights to enjoy in the evening while relaxing in its own chill-out area ideal for a cocktail at sunset.
The garage has space for 2 cars and there is the possibility of further extending the house.
features: Air conditioning, Alarm, Barbeque, Beachside, Brand new, Central heating, Covered terrace, Dining room, Fireplace, Fitted wardrobes, Front line beach, Gated community, Guest room, Guest toilet, Satellite TV, Sea view, Security service 24h, Video entrance

title: Las Terrazas, Spacious Apartment in the Golden Mile
description:
Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Las Terrazas, Marbella Golden Mile Impressive, very spacious ground floor apartment with extensive terraces situated in a gated urbanisation with 24 hours security. Within the exclusive area of Las Lomas de Marbella Club, located on Marbella’s Golden Mile and within a 2 minute drive to the centre, Puerto Banus and the beach. The community offers security, a beautiful swimming pool and green area from where you can enjoy panoramic views over Marbella, towards the sea, the mountains, Africa and Gibraltar. Access to this splendid apartment is through an entrance hall which leads to the generous living room with a dining area, sitting area and a fully fitted and newly fitted kitchen with Fagor and Siemens appliances. On the right hand side is the master bedroom, with fitted wardrobes an en-suite bathroom and private terrace with Jacuzzi. Off the entrance hall to the left are two bedrooms, one with en-suite bathroom and exit to the master terrace, the other one with a separate bathroom and exit to a terrace surrounding the apartment. Both bedrooms have fitted wardrobes. The apartment enjoys a very big terrace, with a bar and several dining and sitting.
Marble floors throughout, electric shutters, electric awnings, air conditioning, double glazed aluminium windows, a store room a staff room with shower and parking space for 2 cars in the garage complement this exceptional apartment. title: Sierra Blanca, Large Property in Exclusive Marbella Sierra Blanca Estate
description: Villa for sale in Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile Large bespoken residence built with high specifications and materials within a luxurious development of Sierra Blanca, short driving distance to the centre of Marbella and the beach. Accessed through the security controlled gate the villa consists of an entrance hall designed like an Andalusian courtyard, leading on to a south facing lounge highlighted with wooden beamed ceilings featuring exit to the terrace and the garden. To the left of the foyer there is a 24-28 seats dining room with adjoining cloakroom and fully fitted “Alno” kitchen equipped with Miele and Siemens electric appliances including coffee machine and plate warmer. Two bedroom suites and an office complete the ground level. On the upper floor there are 6 bedroom suites. Two of them are south facing master bedrooms equipped with built-in wardrobes and bathrooms with jacuzzi and shower cubicles. Four other bedrooms feature marble shower rooms. Basement consists of 12 staff bedrooms including one apartment with kitchen, shower rooms, lounge, storage and garage for eight cars.    Totally independent from the main house there is a kitchen pavilion with a large industrial kitchen with adjoining cold rooms, preparation and cooking areas, a switchboard room. There is the possibility of converting the industrial kitchen area into a guest house. Virtual photos of different decoration alternatives or façades changes are available on request. title: La Reserva de Alcuzcuz, Modernist Architecture
description:
More images   Villa for sale in La Reserva de Alcuzcuz, Benahavis Outstanding south-facing villa built in a modernist design and set inside a verdant neighbourhood in the folds of a slope between San Pedro Alcántara and the foothills of the Serranía de Ronda. The property boasts beautiful sea views and combines modern aesthetics with innovative features and cutting-edge technologies. This impressive residence enjoys double height ceilings and huge floor-to-ceiling and wall-to-wall windows in the living and dining area that flood the spaces with natural light. On the same entrance level there is a fully fitted kitchen equipped with Gaggenau appliances, laundry and pantry, as well as a guest toilet and home cinema.
Double height ceilings provide enough space for a mezzanine housing the living room with a fire place and TV area, with a large window overlooking the garden. On the second floor we find the master bedroom with his and her dressing rooms and an integrated open bathroom including the bath tub and a shower. There are also 4 double bedrooms with bathtubs and washbasins inside the bedrooms and additionally each room has separate toilets. The master suite and 3 further bedrooms share an extensive and broad terrace with sea views.  On the third floor there is an office and a bedroom with installation for a bathroom but actually used as a games room. Additionally, in the basement at the bottom of the garden, the residents can benefit from a wine cellar with a big table for wine-tasting, fitness room, Finnish sauna, shower and toilet. Entering the basement from the other side there is a spacious garage for 6 cars, boiler/machinery room, water deposit and staff quarters including a small kitchenette and a bathroom. On the east wing of the house, there is a detached bedroom with a bathroom and a kitchenette used like an independent office or apartment with separate entrance. From the opposite street there is a separate access to the plot with an unfinished structure of a guest house with a garage (400m2). The property is surrounded by water cascades, green lawns and terraces. Heated swimming pool (solar or heat pump) Electric Venetian blinds, stone-tile flooring, 6 car garage, underfloor heating and cooling, 24 solar panels, water tank, water well, interior and exterior perimeter alarm system with surveillance cameras, staff quarters, double glazed aluminium Schucco carpentry and home automation system are among the many other remarkable facilities.
Furniture not included in price. title: Las Dunas Park, Frontline Beach Ultra Luxury Apartment
description: Apartment for sale in Las Dunas Park, Estepona Stunning south west facing apartment completely refurbished and enlarged, joining 2 units into a very spacious 3 bedroom property with fabulous sea and garden views. Situated on the first floor of a beachfront exclusive and secure development of classic design, Las Dunas Park, between Estepona and Marbella. 15,5 km. to Puerto Banus. 23 km. to Marbella town centre.  This delightfully decorated residence welcomes us with an ample hall with wooden beams on the ceiling leading onto the enormous lounge with various ambiences including a sitting area with a fireplace, a living zone with a movie screen and a film projector, a bar, an open plan kitchen with eating area and fitted with Gaggenau and Siemens appliances. There is also an independent dining room with a wine cellar and access to the terrace and a small study with a guest toilet, which could be easily transformed into a fourth bedroom with a bathroom. This current distribution of 3 bedrooms will be converted into the original 4 bedrooms if requested by the new owner. In the eastern wing there is a guest bedroom suite with wooden flooring and lots of built-in wardrobes and a large bathroom with a double sink marble top, whirlpool bathtub and shower cubicle. In the western side there are two additional bedroom suites with ceramic flooring. A master one boasts an anteroom with plenty of built-in wardrobes, a technical room, a fully equipped bathroom with whirlpool bathtub and shower, and exit to the terrace. The other bedroom also enjoys its en-suite shower room, fitted wardrobes and a terrace with sea views. It is worth mentioning that all the bedrooms and a lounge have direct access to the covered glazed terrace adorned with white balustrade and overlooking manicured gardens and a heated swimming pool. Exceptionally high quality specifications include marble vanity tops in bathrooms, slate flooring, stained glass windows in the bathrooms, central air conditioning with 7 additional separate units, under floor heating, electric shutters and awnings, glazed covered terraces, alarm system, Technal double glazed aluminium windows, 1 garage space and 1 storage room. title: Apartment for sale in Nueva Alcantara, San Pedro de Alcantara. Apartment at Casablanca Beach
description:
This unique property is a 4 bedroom apartment in one level, with 4 bathrooms (3 en-suite), spacious living / dining room with open fireplace.
Both living /dining room and main master suite open out to the south facing terrace, with fantastic views towards the Mediterranean Sea. 
The second suite has a private terrace enjoying the late afternoon sun and views over the tropical garden and pool. A large refurbished, modern kitchen also has a private terrace overlooking the garden. A/C (hot/cold) throughout. Private underground garage space and storage room. 
The property is part of a very well kept community, with a beautiful garden area. Concierge and night security guard. Minutes walk down to the 3.5 km beach promenade, where one can either walk or cycle down to Puerto Banus and Marbella town center. Close to one of the most important Padel & Tennis Clubs in the area, with gymnasium, beauty center, and restaurant. Also walking distance to the new Bulevard and San Pedro town center where one can enjoy shopping and eating out in a vast selection of fantastic restaurants and typical “tapas” bar.

title: Semi Detached Villa for sale in Oasis de Marbella, Marbella Golden Mile. Villa in Oasis de Marbella
description:
Located on ‘The Golden Mile’, (between ‘Oasis Business Center’ and ‘El Oasis de Marbella’), four minutes walk to the beach! With sea views, easy walking distance to all amenities and great access to all of the surrounding coastal areas, this promotion is already proving to be the ‘talk of the town’.

	Entering the property there is a spacious lounge / dining room with direct access to a private terrace where the private pool is. The kitchen is fully fitted equipped with high quality appliances; and also has a guest toilet. On the first floor there are two bedrooms en suite, each one with their private terrace. The property has a private garage.
Ready to move in!!

title: La Zagaleta, Tropical Retreat in La Zagaleta
description:
Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Among the luxurious residential areas and private enclaves of sophistication that compete for your attention in Marbella, La Zagaleta stands out as the most exclusive and private of all. The drive up to La Zagaleta is reminiscent of the LA hills or the Côte d’Azur, with sprawling villas spilling over the hillside in absolute seclusion, but turn around and let your gaze slide down the golf course towards the sea and up to Gibraltar, and you will instantly be reminded of where you are – on the southern tip of Europe overlooking the Straits and the African shoreline.  La Zagaleta Country Club is a very self-contained haven of peace and exclusivity built on a principle of affinity between its residents.
This affinity is founded on an ability to enjoy the finer things in life, coupled with the need for privacy, security and discretion – all things at which La Zagaleta excels. The result of this is the fact that its wonderful facilities, from the scenic golf courses and horse-riding centre to the elegant clubhouse, with its restaurant, pool area, bar, lounge, billiards room and heliport, are all private. Nestled within a totally fenced plot amid a tranquil expanse of greenery in Marbella’s most highly sought-after residential estate, this stylish villa looks south towards an open expanse of Mediterranean Sea, taking in views across Marbella’s coastal region all the way to Gibraltar and North Africa. The property was designed by the renowned architect Melvin Villaroel and built to the highest standards, with thoroughly planned grounds comprising grassy lawns, decorative hedges, mature trees and palms. The villa is graced with contemporary design inside and comprises an entrance hall with a spiral staircase leading up to an office on the first floor. Further distribution includes a guest toilet, a master bedroom highlighted with vaulted ceilings and with an adjoining lounge with a fire place which could be transformed into an extra bedroom. The master bedroom leads through a dressing area towards a large marble bathroom with a bath tub, shower and double vanity unit.  Lounge dining room with wooden beams and fireplace has direct access to the covered terrace with outdoor BBQ area with a large dining set. The lounge flows to a separate dining room enhanced by the double-height wood ceiling, adjacent brand new kitchen with Miele electric appliances and laundry area. Stairs in the eastern wing lead up to the multi-purpose space which currently has installed a sauna and shower and could easily become an additional guest bedroom.  The western wing is formed by a guest house attached to the main one. It features wooden vaulted ceilings, lounge with open plan kitchen and bathroom on the entrance level. Downstairs there is a guest suite with living room and exit to the garden, and the upstairs level offers one more bedroom suite with lounge.  The property can be easily extended from 3 to 7 bedroom suites. The villa has terracotta floors, air conditioning, built-in wardrobes, water and gas oil deposit, electric underfloor heating in bathrooms, sauna, shower, air conditioning in the master bedroom, arched windows, BBQ area, wooden carpentry, double glazing and wine cellar. More images available on request. title: Los Naranjos Golf, Modern Villa for sale near Los Naranjos Golf course
description:
Villa for sale in Los Naranjos Golf, Nueva Andalucia Modern high quality villa under construction  next to Los Naranjos Golf Course.
The course is one of the most popular in the area, its green carpet rolling across gentle undulations in an otherwise reasonably level parcours. In its meanderings, the green fairways fan out towards the residential areas, where they offer the occupants of villas wonderful views of tree-lined greenery framed by the majestic rise of Marbella’s iconic La Concha mountain.  Nearby is a small commercial centre, with larger clusters of shops, banks, restaurants, bars and cafés extending eastwards and southwards towards Marbella. The sea and Puerto Banús are approximately five minutes away, with the centre of Marbella reachable in little more than ten minutes.  The distribution of the property is as follows:

title: Villa for sale in La Cerquilla, Nueva Andalucia. Comfortable and Open Modern Villa
description:
Nueva Andalucia has many beautiful spots and above all of them is the prestigious area of La Cerquilla well renowned for its splendid villas and estate mansion and also for the tranquil atmosphere and its views.

	This project of modern villa exemplifies, all the experience and know how of the study of architecture NOK, specialized in the design of contemporary developments.
This two stories villa comprises – plus fully equipped basement – includes a total of 5 bedrooms with bathrooms en suite and dressing rooms with private terraces in a configuration that unifies privacy and transparence allowing all of them to have lovely views.

	Also we find a double master room with private terrace with a water channel incorporated from the main pool.

	The first floor provides 2 full guest rooms and another master bedroom all of them with private terraces.

	In the basement, we can enjoy a full range of activities in the several dependences: cinema room, gym and SPA with a full bathroom all illuminated by the interior garden glass wall.

	Also we find the service area with a complete room with natural light, two storage rooms and a laundry room.

	Complementing this practical and confortable interiors we will find a very pleasant terrace with exterior dinging area next to the barbecue and a sofas area looking onto the pool all in the covered zone.

	Come and discover with us this project in an unique position and with an impressive design.

title: Vega del Colorado, Stunning villa in the Golf Valley with sea views
description: Villa for sale in Vega del Colorado, Benahavis This lovely newly refurbished villa is situated in Vega Colorado, one of the most prestigious gated communities with 24 hours security service in the Golf Valley. The property, which is distributed over three levels is delightfully decorated and boasts generous accommodation throughout. The main level comprises a spacious entrance hall, a guest toilet, a large living/dining room with gas fireplace, a fully fitted kitchen with Miele appliances and adjacent enclosed terrace with TV set ideal for morning breakfast with the family and three bedroom suites. The lounge area opens onto a covered south facing terrace leading out to the beautifully manicured garden with a swimming pool and a gazebo including a kitchen, a bar and BBQ. The entire upper floor is occupied by the master bedroom with a small library/office area, a large bathroom with shower and Jacuzzi, and a private terrace enjoying spectacular sea open sea views.  The semi-basement consists of two further bedroom suites – one of them with a fully equipped kitchen – which share a courtyard with stairs up to the garden, a guest toilet, a cinema room, a wine cellar and a garage for two cars. Features include under floor heating throughout, Daikin A/C, Lutron lighting system, home automation system, integrated Sonos music system, CCTV security system and double glazed windows, amongst many others. title: Casasola, Charming beachside villa in Casasola
description: Bungalow for sale in Casasola, Estepona This beachside bungalow villa is situated in a quiet area of Casasola, next to Guadalmina and within walking distance to the beach, Paddle tennis club and the Guadalmina shopping centre with shops, cafes, boutiques, restaurants and professional services such as doctors, lawyers and interior designers. Just a short distance from a good range of services such as a prestigious private school, 5km from Marbella and Puerto Banús and 7km from the centre of Estepona. Spanning over the large beautiful mature gardens with swimming pool the villa features a large entrance hall with a guest toilet, a living room boasting a fireplace and wooden beam ceilings, extensive dining room with a fireplace, a fully fitted kitchen connected with a backside courtyard and staff quarters including one bedroom suite. Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a TV room and large study complete the accommodation. Off lounge covered terrace leads to the swimming pool and lawned garden. Other features of the property include solar panels for under floor heating, 3-car garage and also additional parking facilities. title: Los Altos de los Monteros, Amazing Panoramic Views
description: Villa for sale in Los Altos de los Monteros, Marbella East Brand new contemporary villa with breathtaking views of the sea and coastline all the way to Gibraltar. Due to its elevated south east position the property enjoys a privileged location with sun all day long and uninterrupted coastal views 330 degrees. This spectacular panoramic view is one of a kind. Furthermore, the villa is built beside a Protected Green Zone, which guarantees that the property will always enjoy a feeling of space and tranquillity surrounded by nature. Offers complete privacy yet is only 5 minutes from La Canada shopping centre and a short drive of 10 minutes away from Marbella and its best beaches. An elegant property recently completed and never occupied, which is built on three levels,  is privately located at the end of a dead end road.  The main level comprises an entrance hall with stairs to the first floor and direct access to a spacious lounge with a fireplace, a separate dining room area with direct access to the fully equipped open plan kitchen.  All rooms,except one bedroom, enjoy panoramic sea views.  The master suite is on the upper level and includes a bathroom and a walk in closet. There are two further bedrooms, one with south orientation and interior bathroom ensuite, the other a one windowed one has also a bathroom. The master and the second bedroom has access to the ample terrace with pergola. In the basement there is a large room suitable for cinema room, a further room that can be used as a bedroom with a toilet, a store room and a 2-car garage.  Finished with excellent technical installations such as air conditioning (hot and cold), and white aluminium double glazed windows. Cream marble flooring  and ceramic tiles in bathrooms and kitchen. The garden has a swimming pool. title: Contemporary Living in the Golf Valley
description:
Villa for sale in Nueva Andalucia A great opportunity to purchase a modern home, within a secure and gated community in the Golf Valley, Marbella.  With its exceptional location in Nueva Andalucia this new gated development of modern high quality villas offers fashionable living with sea and mountain views close to such trendy places as Puerto Banus with numerous leisure and marine activities, boutiques for fine shopping, pubs, restaurants and even department stores. The villas will be built by an experienced developer to the highest standards with south-west orientation, beautiful gardens and featuring soaring ceilings, large windows and atractive views. The development will combine the best of modern/contemporary architecture, high quality finishes and materials. Payment conditions:
•	30.000 euros initial reservation, 
•	25% upon signing of private purchase contract (-€30.000 reservation)
•	25% when construction work reaches 50% (demonstrated with pertaining certificate from the technical director)
•	25% upon completion of enclosing, covering and exterior plastering of the property (also demonstrated with certificates)
•	25% paid on completion, when public deed is signed. 
Different types of villas are available to choose from. title: Monte Paraiso, Golden Mile Duplex Penthouse
description: More images   Duplex Penthouse for sale in Monte Paraiso, Marbella Golden Mile Huge apartment located in one of the best and most luxurious urbanisations in Marbella’s Golden Mile. The property offers tranquillity and privacy, facing South/East-West and enjoying mature and landscaped community gardens and four swimming pools (one heated). Top quality building specifications, spacious accommodation with a nice covered terrace. Marbella Centre and Puerto Banus are very nearby. The apartment comprises of an entrance hall, large living room, separate dining area next to the fully equipped kitchen with a laundry and a pantry, and an ensuite bedroom. An ample covered and uncovered terrace with marble and terracotta inlays is ideal for summer dining or entertaining. On the upper floor there are two bedroom suites, one with terrace in each side.There are fine details like wooden ceilings on the top floor, Jacuzzi in master bathroom or marble floors through the apartment. The apartment has been decorated by Pedro Peña and is sold fully furnished, except for personal belongings. title: Los Naranjos Golf, Total Privacy and Seclusion
description: Villa for sale in Los Naranjos Golf, Nueva Andalucia Totally secluded property within the prestigious golf community of Los Naranjos, built over 3 levels with spectacular views of the lake and greenery of the golf course. Situated just a short drive to Nueva Andalucia area with all kind of commercial services, sport and leisure facilities and schools. The cosy entrance hall with a guest toilet leads out to the lounge highlighted with the double hight ceilings, a fireplace and with direct access to the covered terrace with stairs down to the heated pool and Jacuzzi. To the right of the entrance hall there is a fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances, breakfast zone and exit to the back yard with BBQ gazebo. The lounge is connected with the dining room. On the left hand side a master bedroom suite is situated. It features access to the terrace shared with lounge and dressing area, and a bathroom with shower and Jacuzzi. The upper floor houses 3 more bedroom suites. Two of them are in the western wing and are equipped with shower rooms and the third one is in the eastern wing and comprises a complete bathroom with a bath tub and shower. From its terraces you can enjoy spectacular far reaching views of the golf and surroundings. The basement is big enough to house a staff apartment, garage for 4 cars, large games room with pre installation for cinema and kitchen, finnish sauna, and laundry. Some other facilities comprise: air conditioning with individual control per room, electric under floor heating in bathrooms, water under floor heating in living room, kitchen and bedrooms, gas heater for water,  alarm system, video entry phone, heated swimming pool, outdoor Jacuzzi and filter for portable water. title: La Quinta Golf, Project for modern villa in La Quinta
description:
Villa for sale in La Quinta Golf, Benahavis Newly designed project for a modern concept villa in La Quinta situated on a 1607sqm plot, at approximately 7kms from Puerto Banus and 10 kms from Marbella with all kind of professional and commercial services. This family house is surrounded by villas set in a quiet and green environment next to the golf course of La Quinta, one of the numerous and prestigious golf areas in Costa del Sol. The villa is expected to be completed in 2017, which gives your a fantastic chance to work closely with the developer to create a personalized, modern home from the very beginning. The villa will have two levels plus basement. The amount of rooms could be changed from 3 to 5. The lower ground level has been pre planned for installation of wine cellar, gymnasium, sauna and separate apartment. Preliminary plans of the project are available with the agency.
