title: Los Monteros Playa, Seaside Property Within Tropical Gardens
description: Apartment for sale in Los Monteros Playa, Marbella East Splendid three bedroom apartment in super deluxe development placed front line beach in a quiet and exclusive residential area of Los Monteros. The complex is totally gated and offers 24 hours service with perimeter camera security system, direct access to one of the best beaches in Marbella, beautifully landscaped gardens with lakes, waterfalls, streams with bridges and fabulous swimming pool for adults as well as another one for children, both of them facing the sea.  The property with high ceilings and generous dimensions situated on the first floor boasts elegant entrance hall with marble columns featuring guest toilet and a wardrobe. An enormous lounge with a fire place leads out to partly covered terrace with sea and garden views. The eat-in kitchen has granite work tops, state-of-the-art appliances, adjacent laundry room and a terrace. The master bedroom with a dressing room and a bathroom with travertine marble-panelled walls including a Jacuzzi and a separate shower cubicle opens to the main terrace. Additionally the apartment includes 2 parking spaces and storage, piped music system, electric shutters, a safe, a video entry phone, alarm system, marble floors, A/C hot & cold, under floor heating with individual control per room and aluminium carpentry with double glazed windows. title: Las Brisas, Villa in the Golf Valley with amazing mountain views
description: Villa for sale in Las Brisas, Nueva Andalucia East facing villa designed on two floors and a basement with classic Andalusian style. Complementing this unique property are the breathtaking views over the mountain.  Located in a quiet site in the heart of the Golf Valley, the main level of this villa consists of an entrance hall with a guest toilet, large living room with a fireplace, a fully fitted eat-in kitchen featuring wood worktops and AEG appliances and a guest bedroom with ensuite bathroom and a dressing room. All rooms open to the spacious covered terrace. Upstairs there are three bedrooms, one with west orientation, the other two east facing and each one  of them with an open terrace. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with Jacuzzi, a separate shower cubicle and double basins. The 131sqm basement includes a laundry room with natural light, machinery room, store rooms, spacious games-TV room and a staff bedroom suite.   The villa has been built to the highest specifications and latest technological fittings such as A/C (hot and cold), central vacuum cleaner, video entry phone, under floor heating, alarm system, satellite TV, marble and Merbau wooden flooring, and wooden double glazed windows. title: Monte Mayor Golf, Florentine Style Villa
description: Villa for sale in Monte Mayor Golf, Benahavis Completed in August 2006, this property promises to be a unique home for those seeking tranquillity and privacy. Nestled in the hills, 1 km away from Estepona, this Florentine style home, built to the highest standards and with extreme attention paid to detail, enjoys spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea, mountains and golf course. The grand entrance hall leads into an elegant salon with a French antique fireplace, dining room and surround sound cinema room. The Bulthaup kitchen includes all high-end appliances such as Gaggenau and a separate laundry room. The master suite features a magnificent bathroom, two walk-in closets and an office. There is a VIP suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, and two further bedrooms each with en-suite bathroom. There is a basement with spa with massage area, sauna and gym and two self contained apartments both with a bedroom, a bathroom, a living room and kitchen; the larger of the two has an additional dressing room plus a layroom, laundry, bodega and office. The marble pool, with cascade, is preheated and surrounded by tropical gardens to insure a sense of privacy. title: Cortijo Blanco, Walking Distance to the Beach
description: Villa for sale in Cortijo Blanco, San Pedro de Alcantara This 3 storey villa was built within the well established community of Cortijo Blanco near the town of San Pedro de Alcantara, walking distance to the beach and promenade. The property enjoys a private swimming pool which could be heated with solar panels and private well kept garden. The house is accessed through an antique door that opens to the entrance hall with high wooden sloped ceiling which leads to the lounge with a main seating area arranged around a large fireplace. Off lounge terrace is enclosed and overlooks the garden with a barbecue area covered by pergola with grape leaves that shade on warm summer evenings. A separate dining room is situated to the left of the lounge and is adjacent to the fully fitted eat-in kitchen which has secondary exit to the front yard. There is one bedroom with a shower room on this level. The upper level boasts 3 bedroom suites. The master one is in the middle and features wooden flooring, a dressing room, a safe box, a bath tub and a shower. The uncovered terrace overlooks the garden and the surrounding areas. Two other bedrooms are also fitted with wooden flooring, and bath tubs each. In the basement two more bedrooms with great capacity cupboards and shower rooms are situated. This level offers lots of possibilities for development. It could be used as staff accommodation with lounge or just for storage. The villa is complemented by a mature garden with a private swimming pool, a garage for two cars, air conditioning with individual regulation, double glazed wooden carpentry, solar panels for hot water, gasoil under floor heating throughout, marble flooring throughout except in the kitchen and terraces. Well located property ideal for those who want to be near the beach with sea promenade and close to all kind of amenities. title: Condado de Sierra Blanca, Property With Sea Views Within Gated Complex
description: Apartment for sale in Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile Fabulous first floor 3 bedroom apartment set in Condado de Sierra Blanca, five star complex on the hill side of the emblematic La Concha mountain in Marbella. It is just 2kms away from the Marbella centre (distances are approximate) with all kind of amenities and services. The apartment enjoys breathtaking sea views encompassing Gibraltar and the coast of Africa. The community enjoys two magnificent swimming pools, one with rectangular shape for swimming and the other one just for relaxing. The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, a guest toilet a lounge/dining room with a fire place, 3 bedrooms and a kitchen. The master bedroom opens onto the terrace shared with the living room and enjoys an en-suite interior bathroom with a separate shower, two hand wash basins and a separate toilet. There are two further bedrooms sharing a bathroom. Currently one of them is converted into an office. There is a very spacious kitchen with breakfast area. This south facing apartment enjoys an ample covered terrace, a parking space suitable for two cars and a large storage room. Marble floors throughout, under floor heating in bathrooms, a fireplace in the living room, a safe box in the master bedroom, cold and hot air conditioning, sound and TV installation, double glazed windows with electric shutters, alarm system, Lutron lighting control in living room are some of the features of this spacious property. title: Apartment for sale in Santa Maria, Marbella East. Apartment in Green Hill
description:
Luxury apartments set in a quiet and green area. Located in a complex with 6 community swimming pools and well main- tained gardens in a quiet part of Elviria, one of Marbella’s most sought after residential areas.
The stylish apartment complex of Santa Maria Green Hills derives its name from its setting in a wooded valley in Elviria, on the east side of Marbella.
The luxury apartments look out over a canopy of protected umbrella pine stretching out into the hills and towards the nearby sea.
Peaceful, secluded and private, Santa Maria Green Hills has a tranquillity about it that belies its central location within just a few minutes of the shops,
restaurants and cafes of three nearby commercial centres. A short drive away to sandy beaches, protected stretches of dunes, trendy beach clubs and laid-back ‘chiringuito’ beach bars. Easy access to the coastal roads also brings Marbella’s town centre to within 10 minutes, with Malaga international airport just 25 minutes away.
Also on your doorstep are international schools and private colleges, sporting facilities that include three tennis academies, a choice of 15 top class golf courses within 15 minutes drive and a wide range of recreational facilities – making this a very private and peaceful complex with all amenities on its doorstep.
From the entrance of this stylish gated community to its communal areas, wonderful gardens, and six swimming pools, Santa Maria Green Hills is a development that stands out for its quality.
Designed around a concept of luxury living in a wonderful climate, this is an urbanisation that offers a well thought-out residential environment in which to enjoy Marbella to the full.
Bright and spacious 2 and 3-bedroom apartments: ground floor, mid floor and panoramic penthouses featuring marble floors and bathrooms, quality kitchens with granite work surfaces and Balay appliances, dual air conditioning and heating, and large terraces just made for year-round relaxing and entertaining.
From most apartments there are countryside, green and sea views as far as Gibraltar and Africa.

title: Las Dunas Park, Ultra Luxury Duplex Penthouse Apartment in Beachfront Complex
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Las Dunas Park, Estepona This is a stunning penthouse duplex apartment boasting fabulous sea and garden views from all main rooms.  Exquisitely decorated by their present owners the south facing apartment is situated in Las Dunas Park, next to Health House Las Dunas 5 star hotel and just a short drive away from Estepona town.  Las Dunas Park is an exclusive and secure development in a privileged beachfront location. The property consists of a gracious and luminous entrance hall that leads straight to the living room with a wood-burning fireplace, concealed lighting and to a fully fitted kitchen with Smeg appliances, ice cube maker, and granite counters and flooring. There are two bedrooms, one is highlighted by two feature columns, with fitted wardrobes that opens to a private terrace and has an interior bathroom ensuite while the other has a shower room ensuite and opens to the main terrace. A guest toilet completes this level. The master bedroom, located in the upper floor features a vaulted ceiling and has doors to two terraces and an imposing and large bathroom with a bath tub, separate shower, two hand wash basins and a separate toilet and a laundry room. Exceptionally high quality specifications include marble counters in bathrooms, cream and white marble flooring, air conditioning, under floor heating and electric shutters in bedrooms, alarm system, satellite T.V., a safe, and Technal double glazed aluminium windows. title: Villa for sale in Marbella Golden Mile. New project in the Golden Mile
description:
This exclusive new development is located within a 2 minute walk away from the sandy beaches and a 10 minute walk to Puerto Banus with its luxury yachts, great restaurants, bars, designer boutiques and beach clubs. Just a few minutes by car to downtown Marbella and the golf valley Nueva Andalucia.

	An incredible new project of 9 brand new contemporary villas in a highly desired beachside location. Built and finished to the highest specifications.

	The ground floor contains a guest toilet, guest bedroom en-suite, kitchen with cooking island and breakfast area and a spacious living-dining area with lounge and fireplace. From the living area you will have direct access to the terraces, private garden and the pool. Perfect for al fresco wining and dining.

	On the first floor you will find 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The master suite and 1 guest bedroom will have access to the upstairs terrace.

	An expansive roof terrace with pool, bar and chill out area with panoramic views to the sea will be perfect to entertain the guests.

	On the lower floor, which will have natural lightning and ventilation, will be home to a garage, service bedrooms and bathroom, as well as a pre-installation for cinema, games room, wine cellar and fitness room.

	The complex will have Junior and Senior villas.

title: La Zagaleta, Commanding Views of Coastline
description:
More images       A Personal Comment from Diana Morales 
A beautiful and well maintained garden is the frame of one of the best sited villas in La Zagaleta estate. No doubt the owners who built the house in 2001 must have done a thorough search to find this plot which offers fabulous views of the sea and hills around. The villa is perfect for a couple with guests or visiting family. The guest bedrooms are in a private wing on the ground floor and also in the basement which because of the slope of the plot has direct access to the gardens whilst the master suite occupies the upper floor and has a large open private terrace. When the couple is alone in the house, the guests' wings can be easily closed off and they use their master suite upstairs and the reception rooms on the ground floor so they house is more intimate and manageable.  The large covered terraces on the ground floor has folding glass doors thus making it posible to use them during the whole year. It's a delight to sit here on a winter day to enjoy the views over the garden and swimming pool and bask in the sun.
  Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Completed in 2001, with unobstructed views of the sea  and located in one of the highest points in La Zagaleta and no doubt one of the best plots within the estate. Main level: entered from the entrance hall with a guest toilet and imposing butterfly staircase, the drawing room has a fireplace and extensive doors to terrace. The dining room with a bow window is served by the kitchen with marble counters, centre island and Gaggenau appliances. The opposite side of the house includes an office which opens both to terrace and driveway, and two bedroom suites, one with a marbled walled bathroom, dressing area and an ample terrace.The entrance to the master bedroom on the upper floor is through double doors and the oversized master bathroom features a round whirlpool in bay window and a walk-in shower. There is a dressing area with mirrored wardrobes doors and a huge open terrace with views. On the lower garden level there is the guest accommodation offering a dining room-kitchenette, a bedroom with a dressing area and an ensuite shower room. There is also a spacious sitting room with exit to terrace. This solid and elegant home includes free-form horizon-less pool, satellite T.V., automatic sprinklers, under floor heating throughout, 3-car garage, carport, air conditioning in bedrooms,  PVC windows with mosquito nets and double glazing.  Exclusive marble flooring, concealed lighting throughout, impressive entrance gate and driveway. title: La Zagaleta, Magnificent Hillside Retreat
description:
Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Set within the prestigious La Zagaleta development, internationally renowned for its first-class facilities and spectacular situation, is found this haven of peace and tranquillity. The villa benefits from stunning views of the natural surroundings, the Serrania de Ronda mountains and stretching towards the coast. The property features covered and uncovered south-facing terraces with outdoor BBQ and sink, a large private garden with pool, and outdoor sunken jacuzzi.
The main accommodation is spread over one level, and comprises an entrance hall, flowing through to a large split-level living/dining room, with feature fireplace and vaulted ceiling, with doors to the terraces and garden. Elegant kitchen, with breakfast table, guest cloakroom with David Marshall basin. A staircase from here leads up to the solarium and gym. In the west wing is found the master suite, with dressing and luxurious en suite bathroom, as well as two further bedroom suites, one currently used as an office. An independent apartment is located on the lower ground floor, comprising kitchen, living room, bedroom and en suite bathroom, and private terraces. The apartment also has independent access to the property.
The villa, designed by Baldrich and Tobal, was entirely renovated by the current owners and is decorated throughout in a classic and attractive style to the highest specifications, featuring marble and terracotta floors, under floor heating, integrated entertainment system, air conditioning hot and cold and state-of-the-art alarm system, including video entry phone. Large storage space and boiler room on lower ground floor. title: Marbella Club Golf Resort, Absolutely Peaceful
description: Villa for sale in Marbella Club Golf Resort, Benahavis Gorgeous frontline golf villa located within the Marbella Club Golf Resort at approximately 20kms from Puerto Banus boasting an elevated position with views of the valleys, the golf course and the sea.  An entrance drive and spacious entrance hall welcome you to the property. The entrance hall leads onto the large living room with a gas fire place and doors to the covered terrace. There is a sitting room with another gas fire place which leads to the spacious kitchen with centre island and breakfast area connected to the outdoor dining zone with log burnt fire place. There is an office and a guest suite with wooden floors and shower on this level.   The first floor comprises two guest suites with individual shower rooms and a master bedroom suite with spacious open plan bathroom, a fire place and terrace with sea views and an adjoining dressing area.  At semi-basement level there is a wine cellar, games room, sauna with shower, sitting area with bar, guest toilet, 2 car garage and the fifth bedroom with a shower room. The outside areas of the house offer great entertainment spaces with various covered terraces, BBQ area, lovely landscaped gardens with pool and fish pond. Automatic irrigation, garden and exterior lighting, double carport, air-conditioning hot and cold, wooden carpentry and under-floor heating are some additional features. title: Las Brisas, Contemporary House within Walking Distance to Golf Course
description:
Villa for sale in Las Brisas, Nueva Andalucia Well-situated, sleek contemporary villa for sale in Las Brisas which comprises at entrance level a hallway, with high ceiling and cupboards,
leading into various areas of the house. On one side there is an open-plan kitchen, a fully fitted with high quality appliances, a separate laundry room and direct access  to the garden and on the other side of the hall is the combined and spacious living and dining room with large windows allowing for plenty of light as well as beautiful views of the garden and pool area. There are also two bedrooms on this level, each with an ensuite bathroom, individual terrace and fabulous views.  The lower level boasts a fantastic spa area with sauna, a cinema/games
room with an additional area for a small gym, a wine cellar, a bar
and a guest cloakroom. There are two good size double bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms and a single en-suite bedroom, with a private entrance and pre-installation for a kitchenette, ideal as staff or guest accommodation. Outside, the garden features a private pool surrounded by ample sunbathing space, a grassed area and a covered terrace. The luxury resort of Casablanca Beach has a privileged location: on the beach, next to a beautiful new promenade full of traditional fish restaurants and wide beaches between San Pedro with Marbella.A 10 minutes walk from the center of San Pedro de Alcantara and 30 minutes from Puerto Banus.
The resort enjoys the tranquility of the sea and is within walking distance of all the infrastructure needed for daily living, such as shops, banks, restaurants, sports centers.
With an original architecture in its construction were used premium materials: marble, natural stone, wood. The apartments have large terraces, two bedrooms, one of them en suite and another independent bathroom. It has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast area. And 2 parking spaces. The public areas have a beautiful lake shaped pool and 6,000 square meters of tropical gardens with direct access to the promenade and beach.

title: Penthouse for sale in Mansion Club, Marbella Golden Mile. Exclusive penthouse with sea views in the lavish green paradise of Man
description:
This splendid penthouse is located in the luxurious urbanization of Mansion Club, a gated development, just minutes away from the Marbella Club Hotel and Puente Romano Beach Resort, Marbella’s centre, the beach, Puerto Banus and a few steps of the well known Buchinger Clinic.

	This exclusive development is set amidst lush gardens, elegantly landscaped with more than 300 species of tropical plants and enhanced by excellent modern facilities, including a social club, bar-restaurant, gymnasium, sauna, Turkish baths and heated swimming pool.

	The property features an ample wide living/dining area with double hight ceiling which opens through sliding doors to a spacious terrace covered with a pergola, ideal for entertaining friend and family. 

	The luminous  master bedroom has a dressing area and a en suite bathroom with a bath tub and two hand wash basins featuring a panoramic window. We find also other two spacious rooms sharing a full bathroom.

	The kitchen is fully fitted with Siemens appliances, a bar area and a laundry room. The penthouse is equipped with underfloor heating, air conditioning, a garage space for one car and a store room.

The development is designed with luxury and seclusion in mind and offers the most breathtaking views to both the mountains and the Mediterranean, whilst still within a short drive to the many nightspots and shops.

This property, in the main floor, comprises: an entrance hall, living/dining area with fireplace, direct access to the covered porch, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast area and access to the patio with barbecue near the pool.

This Villa, in addition, still has the possibility of building 30% more!

	The swimming pool area has got all modern facilities that include showers, dressing room and an outdoor entertainment area with lounge set in a lovely pavilion.

title: Villa for sale in Guadalmina Alta, San Pedro de Alcantara. A Secret Frontline Golf villa in Guadalmina Alta
description:
If you ever dream to live and enjoy golf every day, walking from your own door to the golf course, come with us a visit this precious spot right in the middle of one of the most prestigious golf courses in Marbella, the Real Club de Golf Guadalmina, with two 18 holes courses – North and South – suitable for experienced players and a 9 holes for beginners. 

	Settle at the end of a secluded street and built on a hill with views to the golf course, the villa benefits from the luxuriant greenery of the lanes that guards the privacy of house and the two swimming pools, one looking to the ample living room of the west terrace and the other in the back garden. The dining rooms look over the east terrace and its ideal for brunch or evening dinners.

	The guest rooms lead directly to the swimming pool of the west terrace and the master bedroom with the bathroom in suite has views the golf course.

	In the basement, right by the east garden, we can find an independent apartment with a sitting – room and a bathroom in suite, a cellar and the garage.

	But this property it has a very special bonus; it includes an independent plot of 903 m2, next to the main building that can be built or it can remain as an extra garden or sports area.

	Whether you enjoy classic well built villas in prime locations or you desire to develop your own project, come and visit us.

title: Villa for sale in Guadalmina Baja, San Pedro de Alcantara. Brand New Modern Style Villa in Guadalmina Baja
description:
Two brand new four-bedroom villas are being built on this perfectly situated plot situated in one of the most consolidated urbanizations in Marbella, Guadalmina Baja in close proximity to a first class bilingual international school, two 18-hole championship golf course, shops, restaurants and only a 3-minute walk to the beach.

	The villas will be built in accordance with the latest European Standards and using only the best quality materials en environment friendly technology including: high quality secure aluminum double glazed windows, porcelain flooring, water under-floor heating on ground floor habitable areas and bathrooms, all bathrooms with electric under floor heating; air conditioning by air zone for both hot and cold options with individual controls; fully fitted wardrobes with hidden hinges, soft closing mechanisms and seamless joints  and internal doors with a height of 2.30 m.

	Keeping in line with the clean modern style of the villas the external terraces where necessary will have the protection of safety glass hand railings.

	Furthermore there will be solar power energy systems and circulation hot water pumps with water softeners, individual salt water swimming pool, gas powered featured fireplace, color video intercom system which can activate and open external doors and or gates into the villa, home intelligent systems to  control lighting and blinds, hydro massage spa, pre-installation of alarm system, and open basement giving you the option of various types of finishes and design layout.

	These villas will be finished in Summer 2016 and can allow certain alterations.

	Interested in seeing the project and construction please make an appointment with us for viewing.

title: La Dama de Noche, Penthouse Near Puerto Banus
description:
Penthouse for sale in La Dama de Noche, Nueva Andalucia Set in over 70,000m2 of manicured gardens, sports facilities, communal pools and its very own golf course, La Dama de Noche is a residential development consisting of 14 buildings with one, two, three and four bedroom apartments and penthouses with spectacular views towards the golf course and the Sierra Blanca Mountains. This superb complex not only provides on-site sports facilities but is within easy reach of the most prestigious golf courses on the Golf Valley with over 70 golf courses around Costa del Sol to choose from. Tennis clubs, equestrian clubs and yachting clubs are just minutes away. Local amenities such as shops, bars, restaurants, health clinics and Marbella’s glamorous marina, Puerto Banus, are just 3km away. La Dama de Noche is also conveniently connected via the coastal motorway which can take you to Malaga International Airport in 45 minutes and to the Costa del Sol’s major resorts.  This east facing penthouse comprises lounge/dining room, one bedroom with separate bathroom to the right of the lounge and a second bedroom with en-suite marble bathroom to the left. A fully fitted kitchen completes the accommodation. An extensive south east facing open terrace with mountain and garden views has lots of place for entertainment. The penthouse features fully fitted kitchens, built-in wardrobes, double glazing, heating and air conditioning, marble floors throughout, satellite TV, video entry phone, utility room and private parking space in the underground communal garage. title: La Zagaleta, Great Family Property
description: Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Enchanting and very private villa with mountain views, nestled amidst the prestigious estate of La Zagaleta which offers first-class leisure and sports facilities that include two golf courses, equestrian centre, heliport and a stylish club house featuring restaurant and bar, swimming pool area, sitting areas and billiards room. It is the perfect address for families who enjoy sports and a natural environment. This stunning villa is situated in a tranquil location. It is enclaved over a plot of 6.938sqm and is distributed over four levels with a total built area of 2.184,20sqm. The ground level comprises an entrance hall with double staircase, guest toilet, spacious living room with fireplace, dining room, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast area and gas and electric areas for cooking, wine cellar, BBQ and US electric appliances, two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The first floor hosts the master suite with his and her bathrooms, dressing rooms and private terrace with golf views. There are two more double en-suite bedrooms. In the upper basement, there is the large garage which can comfortably house 4 cars. It also features a cinema / bar, a fully panelled billiard saloon, music room/two bedrooms with two bathrooms, a wine cellar (with a separate air conditioning unit), the spa area with gym, large sauna and Turkish bath, a bathroom and the indoor pool with Jacuzzi. The laundry is also on this level. The staff area consists of two bedrooms and bathrooms with a sitting room and open plan kitchen.  The lower basement features three guest suites with kitchen. There is a room currently used as a kids play room which could easily be converted into a party room with a disco floor. The roof area offers heated pool with jacuzzi and jet stream, BBQ and sunbathing area. The garden has been landscaped and features waterfalls, fountains, streams and lakes, a glass bottomed pergola and a thatched chiringuito. title: Penthouse for sale in El Mirador del Paraiso, Benahavis. Penthouse in El Mirador del Paraiso
description:
Beautiful and elegant penthouse in the urbanization Mirador del Paraíso in Benahavis. It has three bedrooms, three bathrooms and a guest toilet, a wonderful terrace and sea and golf views. Both urbanization and this property they are made with excellent finishes and details like a private elevator that comes from the garage to the property or floor heating throughout the house, plus hot / cold air conditioning. This property is in perfect condition. Built in 2008. The price includes two parking spaces and two storage rooms. 
Mirador del Paraiso is a gated community with security by professionals guards, which include villas, large townhouses and luxurious apartments. It is only a few minutes from the golf courses of El Paraiso and Atalaya and 10 minutes from Puerto Banus and the beach. It is an ideal place to live all year round or enjoy holiday at any time.

description:
ituated within an exclusive Luxury complex consisting of more than 25.000 m2 of landscaped gardens, breathtaking views of the Mediterranean sea, swimming pools, 2477 security surveillance, maintenance service and assured privacy…

	Finishing touches of the highest quality: two, three and four bedroomed apartments or duplex properties including either three, four or five bathrooms beautifully tiled in Mediterranean style marble fittings, fitted hydro-massage bath tubs, spacious as well as spectacular views from the balconies and terraces, some measuring over 200 m2. All apartments contain a completely fitted SIEMENS kitchen and come with underfloor heating throughout the apartment, DAIKIN hot/cold air conditioning, all exterior double glazed carpentry woodwork manufactured from treated Iroko wood. Attic units contain a private fitted jacuzzy within the balcony, a private roof garden, two space car park garage and storage room. Completely finished and ready to move into.

	Within a privileged location Lomas del Rey is located within the exclusive Marbella Golden Mile, in front of Puente Romano and 800 metres from the beach, simply 3 minutes from the famous port of Puerto Banús and 5 minutes from Marbella town centre. Direct access/exit to the main motorway (exit 181B Nagüeles) exists and is only 10 minutes from eight popular golf courses. Complete with “First Occupational Licence”.

	This nice 3 bedroom apartment in Lomas del Rey, Marbella Golden Mile. This community offers 24 hour security.

	The apartment has a large and very bright living-dining room with direct access to a private terrace. 

	There are 2 bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes and two bathrooms. The master bedroom has also a direct access to the terrace. There is a fully fitted kitchen. The property has air conditioning, marble floors, underfloor heating, alarm and central heating.

title: La Zagaleta, Elegant Villa with Breathtaking Panoramic Views
description:
Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Spectacular villa in the exclusive estate of La Zagaleta, on the hills of Marbella with 24 hours security, offering five star leisure facilities such as equestrian centre, heliport, two golf courses and a stylish club house with swimming pool area, restaurant, lounge areas and billiards room.  This property in particular is set in the most elevated area of the estate enjoying breathtaking panoramic views across the coastline. This elegant villa is distributed over three levels:
The ground floor offers two large reception areas, an open plan living area, three bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and several covered terraces.  The upper level of the property hosts two master bedroom suites and a study.
The lower level offers a games room with bar, wine cellar, cinema, spa, gymnasium and a bedroom suite. Furthermore there is a garage for fours cars and two golf buggies. Set within extensive lush gardens with heated swimming pool and BBQ area. title: El Paraiso, Villa opposite El Paraiso Golf Course
description:
More images   Villa for sale in El Paraiso, Estepona This rustic style south facing villa was built in 1993. Set in a 2550 m2 private plot, the property is fenced and offers a large driveway, as well as a parking area for four cars. The villa is surrounded by a mature and fully irrigated garden with plants, bushes, trees and lighting featuring an irregular shaped pool of approximately 80m2.  Built with a classical traditional exterior. The carpentry was made of Oregon pine wood. Detaching some of the villa qualities, we find a mahogany-lined office; indoor ceramic floors with wood inlaid at the reception areas, combined in the kitchen with decorated tiles and in the terrace with marble inlay.
Bathrooms offer marble floors and walls and bedrooms with parquet, with the exception of the master bedroom which is carpeted. The lounge comprises a double height ceiling with exposed beams, giving a great sense of space, and a garden access through four doors. The kitchen is very spacious, with access to the dining room and to the entrance hall, which is fully equipped and enjoys a breakfast area. On one side of the house, with separate entrance, there is a guest apartment boasting a living room, a bedroom and a bathroom.
The villa also includes central heating with thermostat and air conditioning. On the upper floor and in the guest house, there are air conditioning split units. It offers as well two water tanks of 60 cubic meters. The property is sold unfurnished. title: La Cerquilla, Modern Villa with Panoramic Sea Views
description: Villa for sale in La Cerquilla, Nueva Andalucia This elegant villa, designed by Tobal Arquitectos, is set on an elevated corner plot, offering impressive panoramic views over the golf course and the sea. Set in La Cerquilla, an exclusive residential area of Nueva Andalucia, just a few minutes away from Puerto Banus, Marbella, all kinds of amenities, such as international schools, commercial centres, restaurants and the beach. Accessed by a beautiful drive way with Portuguese stones, entering into a double height entrance hall with staircase and guest cloakroom offering lovely views over to the sea. Continuing into a south facing living room with wood burning fireplace with access to a covered terrace and the private garden, from where you can enjoy impressive uninterrupted views over the golf, Gibraltar and the sea. Sitting – dining room separated from the gourmet kitchen only with a beautiful gas fired fireplace. The spacious kitchen with large windows and access to the terrace and BBQ area is well-equipped with Gaggenau appliances, working island and has an adjacent laundry room. Three double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, built-in cupboards and two sharing a nice private terrace complete this level. On the upper level are two bedroom suites including the master bedroom with his and her dressing area and bathrooms, as well as a private south facing terrace with sea views. The fifth bedroom also has a nice private balcony and bathroom en-suite. The basement features a staff accommodation with kitchenette and en-suite shower bath, a storage room, wine cellar, room for gym, 3 car garage, machinery room, home cinema and an indoor pool with sauna and shower, as well as another shower easily reached from the private garden and outdoor pool. The extensive, flat and well kept grounds are illuminated. There is a surround sound system throughout the interior and exterior of the property. Built to high standards and detailed craftsmanship, with many special features such as American Walnut wooden doors and window frames, laminated bullet proof glass windows, alarm system, domotic system, under floor heating and a beautiful mix of marble and wooden flooring. title: Los Altos de los Monteros, Duplex Penthouse With Fantastic Views of the Coast
description:
More images   Duplex Penthouse for sale in Los Altos de los Monteros, Marbella East Fantastic duplex penthouse with breathtaking views over the coastline and mountains, located in Los Monteros Hill Club, an exclusive 65-unit in six buildings residential development with panoramic views of the entire coast located in the hills above Los Monteros residential area, to the east of Marbella. Three golf courses, the best beaches and the centre of Marbella are all at a short driving distance. Constructed in a unique architectural style on a sunny mountain plateau this development, that was completed in October  2007, features an imposing cascade pool with a large waterfall, a sauna and changing rooms for men and ladies, gym and tennis court. 
In order to maintain peace and quiet, cars entering the main gate drive straight into the underground garage. The penthouse consists of a large living dining room with fireplace offering spectacular views over the sea, leading out to covered south facing terrace.  Fully fitted kitchen with Gaggenau and Siemens appliances and laundry room. Two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes sharing one bathroom on this level. 
The master suite with exit to a lovely sun terrace with private shower and jacuzzi, with en suite bathroom with jacuzzi bath, two hand wash basins, bidet, w.c. and walk in shower are on the upper floor, with a very spacious walk in wardrobe plus an additional bedroom. Additional features include under floor heating in the whole apartment, A/C hot and cold, 2 garage spaces and one store room, set in a tranquil setting with fabulous views over the coast. title: Marbella Club Golf Resort, Commanding Views from Hilltop Position
description: Villa for sale in Marbella Club Golf Resort, Benahavis Handsome wooden appointments and other fine millwork highlight this spacious inviting home consisting of an enchanting entrance patio with a fountain surrounded by a beamed arched gallery that leads through the entrance hall with a cloakroom to the drawing room with an adjoining dining room. Off the living room is the large covered terrace with fireplace. A perfect setting for lively entertaining. The covered beamed terrace off the spacious kitchen and dining room features a barbecue. A bedroom suite with direct access to the garden and a study/library with a fireplace complete this level.  Affording dramatic sea views, the spacious master suite features a bedroom with vaulted beamed ceiling and a fireplace, and a wall of fitted wardrobes leads to the master bathroom. Also on this level there is a romantic bedroom suite with an east-facing balcony and a further bedroom with a shower room. There is also a one bedroom self-contained independent guest apartment with fabulous views. Basement (about 200sq.m.) with a wine cellar, sitting area for wine tasting, guest toilet with shower and stairs to garden and pool. Equipped cinema room with bar and two small store rooms. Both master bathroom and kitchen were renovated and fitted by Clive Christian. There is also a laundry room by the kitchen with Miele washer and dryer, deep freezer and chill cabinet. In addition, there is a guest toilet with shower. 3 car garage with automatic doors. Designed by a well known architect in typical Andalusian style, with a beautifully well-laid garden, the villa also includes terracotta flooring throughout, beautifully carved wooden doors, French wooden double glazed windows throughout, underfloor heating throughout the house and air conditioning in bedrooms. Two golf memberships to the resort’s golf course are included in the offer.  18 hole golf course. Club house and a fabulous riding centre. Security. description: More images   Villa for sale in El Herrojo, Benahavis Spectacular six bedroom south facing elegant villa, built by the owner to the highest standards and located in the prestigious, gated and 24 hour secure, frontline golf community of El Herrojo Alto. The accommodation consists of: An antique entrance door leading to a grand entrance hall, a guest cloakroom and a hallway leading to an office and two bedroom suites one of which has a private terrace and open breathtaking views. Off the entrance hall is a large fully fitted NASA kitchen, a modern informal lounge and an enormous formal lounge and dining area with high ceilings and French doors to a covered terrace and private mature landscaped gardens with pool.  Upstairs there is the master bedroom suite with separate dressing area and large private terrace and one bedroom guest suite.  Downstairs there are two further bedroom suites, staff accommodation, a sauna, a gym, a home cinema room, a laundry room, a store room and a garage for 5 cars. title: La Zagaleta, Andalusian Retreat
description:
A Personal Comment from Pia Arrieta 
This is undoubtedly the true idea of a personal paradise in Marbella! From the moment our team stepped through the door we appreciated the thought and attention to detail which the owner has given to this property by creating so many enchanting spaces that exude style and refinement. Very rarely does one feel right “at home” when visiting a property, but this property did exactly that to us! With its lovely fireplace in the entrance hall or lovely kitchen in which one can imagine hanging out with friends and family, the property offers a very homely atmosphere. This home definitely stands out in one of the most luxurious and private estates in Marbella thanks to its unique design, refined taste and privileged setting and I strongly recommend visiting it.  Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Nestled amid a tranquil expanse of greenery in Marbella’s most highly sought after area of La Zagaleta this Andalusian style property was conceived by famous local architect as an oasis of well being for the enjoy of the life. La Zagaleta offers first-class leisure and sports facilities that include two golf courses, equestrian centre, heliport and a stylish club house featuring restaurant and bar, swimming pool area, sitting areas and billiards room. It is the perfect address for families who enjoy sports and a natural environment. The villa, situated close to the club house, features an entrance courtyard with a pond which leads through a covered porch to a double height foyer with a fireplace.
The house is built over two levels plus basement comprises on the ground floor a lounge with a fire place and vaulted ceilings, separate formal dining room with adjacent eat-in kitchen and a TV room. A guest cloakroom and two double bedrooms, one with bathroom and the other with a shower room, complete this level. The first floor accessed through a staircase, features two more bedrooms, one with dressing area, jacuzzi, shower and terrace with mountain and golf views,and the other one with built-in wardrobes, a shower and TV room. The basement houses a wine cellar, a storage, sauna, jacuzzi, shower, toilet, gymnasium, laundry, additional kitchen, bedroom and shower. Under floor heating with gasoil and electric, air conditioning, heated swimming pool, 2 car garage and carport for 2 cars are some other noticeable details. title: La Zagaleta, Marvellous Home In La Zagaleta
description: Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Set within the prestigious La Zagaleta development, internationally renowned for its first-class facilities and spectacular situation, this haven of peace and tranquillity is found. A long elegant driveway leads to a forecourt large enough to park several cars. The house is spacious with high ceilings and splendid sea views. This very comfortable and well equipped home is distributed around a traditional andalusian courtyard with fountain in the middle and offers spectacular views of the Mediterranean Coast, mountains and the natural surroundings. The accommodation spreads over two levels, comprising an entrance hall, a living room with fireplace and separate dining room with exit to the terrace covered with pergola. Fully fitted kitchen with terrace perfect for breafast, a pantry, an office and shower room (which could be used like an additional bedroom suite) occupy the western wing of the villa. Three bedroom suites with golf views are situated in the eastern side. One of the guest bedrooms shares terrace with the lounge.  The lower level offers laundry room, gardener cloakroom, cellar, machinery room and large sitting room with a bedroom suite. The latters lead out to the open poolside area and garden.  The villa is built according to the highest specifications and decorated in a classic style featuring terracotta floors, gasoil under floor heating throughout and electric in bathrooms, air conditioning hot and cold and alarm system including video entry phone.  Beautiful mature gardens with private swimming pool. All set within the exclusive La Zagaleta estate with lakes, golf courses, equestrian centre, helipad and two 18-hole golf courses. title: Casasola, South facing villa
description: Villa for sale in Casasola, Estepona This south facing villa is situated in a quiet area of Casasola, next to Guadalmina and within walking distance to the beach, paddle tennis club and the Guadalmina shopping centre with shops, cafes, boutiques, restaurants and professional services such as doctors, lawyers and interior designers. Just a short distance from a good range of services such as a prestigious private school, approximately 10kms to Marbella and 5kms to Puerto Banus and 23 kms to the centre of Estepona. The property was recently renovated and now features comfortable layout distributed over 2 levels. A long drive leads to the wooden entrance door which gives access to the spacious ground level comprising lounge/dining room and open plan fully equipped kitchen, all with exit to the garden and pool. The house features open fireplace, wooden flooring, guest toilet and 4 bedroom suites. In the western wing there is one bedroom suite with independent entrance door and stairs to the first floor with a second bedroom suite, and in the eastern side there is a third bedroom suite with direct access to the garden. The master suite with open style bathroom and shower is situated on the upper floor, enjoying a private terrace with views of the surroundings and the pool.  The villa is quite private due to its mature garden and old-grown trees and the first level is ideal for people with limited mobility. title: El Madroñal, Rustic Villa With Sea Views In the Middle of Nature
description:
Villa for sale in El Madroñal, Benahavis Charming villa situated in El Madroñal, a pine cork forested residential area of private estates called El Madroñal. Close to San Pedro and to the coast and at only 40 minutes’ drive to Ronda and to the Málaga airport.   This lovely home is settled on a well situated plot with magnificent views to the coastline and the mountains. The extensive plot allows for further construction or extending the existing house. A long drive leads to an ample courtyard for parking yet with two garage spaces and carport for 2 vehicles.  The interiors comprise a spacious entrance hall with a guest toilet, a guest bedroom with a bathroom, a living room with a fireplace and a dining room, both with exit to the covered porch and the garden. There is also an enclosed and covered terrace with a fireplace and sitting area in the eastern wing of the house and a fully equipped kitchen with dining and sitting area warmed by a fireplace in the western side. The kitchen leads out to outdoor dining zone and features adjoining laundry, pantry and a separate entrance door. A large master bedroom with vaulted wooden beamed ceilings, a dressing room and a bathroom complete the ground level. Terracotta stairs lead up from the hall to the upper floor distributed into a second master suite with balconies overlooking the coast and with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom with a bath tub, shower and private uncovered terrace with sea views.  The top floor comprises a fourth bedroom with a shower and an office area.
In addition the main house has attached a separate accommodation consisting of a fully fitted kitchen with dining table and two bedrooms sharing a bathroom. Throughout the villa there are high ceilings, air conditioning, terracotta flooring and open spaces. There is a possibility of extending the house.  The outdoor comprises free shaped heated swimming pool, well-kept garden and orchard. title: La Zagaleta, Rustic Style Villa in La Zagaleta
description:
Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Beautiful villa set in the well known and secure La Zagaleta Golf & Country Club, built in a traditional Andalusian style, with terracotta flooring, impressive vaulted ceilings, featuring south west facing terraces enjoying beautiful views of the surrounding countryside and mountains. Built over three floors all connected via a private lift. The interiors are immaculately presented with tasteful furniture and finishes. The property is accessed through a security door which reveals a beautiful entrance hall. Two staircases or the private lift lead down to the main floor, consisting of the large living room with fireplace, guest cloakroom, storage room, dining room and fully fitted kitchen. The living and dining room as well as the kitchen have access to a covered south west facing terrace with fantastic views over the countryside. A TV room and three double bedrooms all with en suite bathrooms and walk in wardrobes are situated on the lower level with access to another terrace, leading down to the pool and garden.  On the garden level you find a very large basement- ideal for a games room, gym or a guest apartment, with access to the private garden and the swimming pool, and a machinery room. There are many special features in this house such as under floor heating in the whole house, a private lift, video entry, pre-installation for a heated pool, covered and open terraces ideal for al-fresco entertaining.  There is also a car port for 2 – 3 cars. 
Set within a tranquil and private setting, enjoying the golf course, club house, helicopter platform and exceptional security of La Zagaleta Golf & Country Club. title: Rio Verde Playa, Beachside Marbella's Golden Mile Villa
description: Villa for sale in Rio Verde Playa, Marbella Golden Mile This beautifully presented, recently renovated villa is located in a prime position in the Golden Mile beachside. At approximately 200m from the beach and 500m from Puerto Banus this property built over two levels consists of an entrance hall, fully fitted Bulthaup sizeable kitchen with central island and Siemens electric appliances. The lounge with a fire place and dining area on split levels, three bedrooms suites, one with direct access to the garden and two others with views of the private courtyard, a laundry room and a guest bathroom with jacuzzi complete the ground floor. The upper level features two more bedroom suites. One of them is a master bedroom with dressing room and spacious bathroom with separate shower and a bath tub.  The outdoor area comprises large mature garden with heated swimming pool with electric cover, Turkish hammam, shower and toilet. Tiles on the floor, air conditioning with heat pump, marble bathrooms, outdoor parking for 3 cars, alarm system, electric shutters in the master bedroom and living room and video entry phone are some additional features. title: Marbella Centro, Beachside Apartment

title: Sotogrande Playa, Majestic New Villa
description: Villa for sale in Sotogrande Playa, Sotogrande Ideally situated in an elevated position within the prestigious and highly sought-after area of ‘Kings and Queens’, close to the Royal Sotogrande golf course. The villa has been designed by the renowned local architect Roberto Mendoza and built to the highest standards.  The accommodation includes on the ground floor an entrance hall, a lounge (7,75m x 5,52m) with two sets of double sliding glazed doors that open to both the dining room and the family room. Sliding doors open also to the covered terrace and rear garden, an indoor solar heated swimming pool (12,30m x 7 m), a pool shower room, SieMatic fully-fitted kitchen with breakfast area, utility room, pantry and self contained guest-suite. Double garage and extensive parking.  Pool equipment room and garden store room.  The first floor consists of a landing, front terrace, master bedroom suite with private terrace, dressing room and Jacuzzi, and two further bedroom suites, one with a dressing room. All bedrooms have en suite bathrooms. Additional specifications include high quality UPVc double glazed windows, air-conditioning and heating in all major rooms, decorative wrought iron security grill to all windows. Extensive marble flooring. There is also a share available in the Sotogrande golf club at 25.000 euros. title: Los Granados Golf, Outstanding Property Within Finest Location
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Los Granados Golf, Nueva Andalucia Beautiful property in the heart of the golf valley, with open 180 degree views of the gardens, pool and Las Brisas golf course. Located within an exclusive complex of only 55 apartments, with 24 hour security, manicured gardens, free form pool, interior heated pool, gymnasium, his and hers saunas, changing rooms, events room and Jacuzzi. At only a short stroll to Las Brisas Golf Club, 5min drive to Puerto Banus and 10min to Marbella town centre. The property is located on the top floor and is built over 2 levels. Both levels are connected via elevator and stairs. The lower level comprises an ample living/dining room with electric fire place leading on to a large west facing terrace with fantastic views over the pool and gardens. The kitchen was totally renovated and is fully fitted and equipped with Gaggenau and Siemens appliances, with adjoining laundry and pantry area, and enjoys a breakfast area and large windows giving it lots of light. There are 4 bedrooms on this level, all en-suite. Two of the bedrooms including the master one have exit to the main terrace. One of the bedrooms has access to a private balcony.  Upstairs there is a lounge with installation for home cinema, which can be easily turned into a fourth bedroom, with use of a guest toilet which can also be turned into a full bathroom to service this bedroom. This level comprises spectacular terraces to enjoy the views and relax, as well as a heated plunge pool with adjoining shower area.  The property also includes a garage for 2 cars and ample storage room with double doors to drive in a golf buggy. title: El Mirador del Paraiso, Magnificent Villa in Established Area
description: Villa for sale in El Mirador del Paraiso, Benahavis Traditional style, high quality, south facing villa, with garden and sea views in the horizon, situated within the gated community with 24hrs security of El Mirador del Paraiso. El Paraiso is one of the most established and tranquil residential areas dominated by villas and town houses built around the El Paraiso Golf Club, a few minutes drive to the coast, the village of Benahavis and Marbella.  The house is built over 2 levels. The entrance level is distributed into a gabled ceiling lounge/dining room with a fireplace leading onto a nice covered terrace. To the left of the entrance hall and connected to the lounge there is a family room and a guest bedroom suite with a marble shower room. A fully fitted kitchen with granite worktops, Miele appliances and breakfast corner leads out to a charming covered dining area fused with the garden.  The right hand side wing houses a guest cloakroom, second guest bedroom with shower and a master suite accented with vaulted wooden ceilings, dressing room, marble bathroom with jacuzzi and private terrace overlooking the swimming pool and the sea in the horizon.  The lower floor is distributed into a fourth bedroom suite, 2 car garage, wine cellar, shower room and a cinema room with billiard table and bar. This entertainment space has exit to the poolside area which comprises heated pool, hot tub and decked thatched lounge with fridge. Other features include marble floors with electric under floor heating throughout, air conditioning with heat pump individually controlled, Sonos sound system, alarm system and electric shutters. description:
More images   Villa for sale in Marbella Centro, Marbella Town Beautiful Villa set in the heart of Marbella within walking distance to all types of amenities, shops and restaurants.

title: La Mairena, Excellent Villa with Views
description: Villa for sale in La Mairena, Marbella East Custom built for its present owner the villa is bathed with light from dawn till sunset. Orientated mainly to the southeast it enjoys views to the sea and mountain from its wraparound terraces. It also has views of the towns of Mijas and Fuengirola at a distance. The house is accessed through double doors opening to the entrance hall with a guest toilet and a staircase that leads to the upper level. The living room, on this level, enjoys an elegant black marble fireplace, a dining area and a large covered terrace. The luminous kitchen is completely fitted and equipped with high quality Porcelanico floors, granite worktops, a centre island and Siemens and Miele appliances. An informal dining area with access to a relaxing terrace, adjoins. There is an ample pantry and laundry room. There is a guest suite on this level, with an entrance hall that eventually can be used as a single bedroom.The master bedroom, also with a large open terrace, is on the upper level and has a walk-in closet, a complete en-suite bathroom and a small office. There is a leisure-games room with snooker table in the lower level featuring a double height window with lovely views to an old cork tree. A two-car garage, a shower room and a separate and independent self-contained apartment with a living room, an open plan kitchen, and two bedrooms, each with en-suite shower room, complete this level. There are also white aluminium double glazed windows, 8.000 l. water tank, gas fired boiler for hot water, electric shutters, and plenty of fitted wardrobes throughout the villa. title: La Alqueria, Villa with Panoramic Sea Views
description: Villa for sale in La Alqueria, Benahavis Atractive villa set in a fantastic elevated position enjoying panoramic views towards the sea, Morocco and Gibraltar. Conveniently situated at 2km from the coast, just 15 minutes drive from Estepona and 10 minutes to Puerto Banús and Marbella. The surrounding area is also home to three golf courses. The villa offers an entrance area leading on to a spacious living room with a fireplace and access to a southwest facing private terrace offering views towards the sea and the hills. The master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom has access to the off living room’s terrace. One double bedroom with en-suite bathroom and another bedroom used as an office are also found on this floor, as well as a fully fitted kitchen imported from Germany with laundry room and terrace. The garden level consists of two independent apartments, one with a spacious living room with kitchen and access to the garden with a swimming pool through a southwest facing covered terrace and two bedrooms each with en-suite bathroom, one of the bathroom with a sauna, a shower and a bathtub. The other apartament also has a kitchen, a living room and a bedroom with a bathroom ensuite. There is a garage for 2 cars and a machinery room.  Spacious solarium covering the whole upper floor with three solar panels and enough space for a Jacuzzi offering beautiful views over the valley, golf and sea. Additional features include air-conditioning hot and cold, under floor heating, sauna, solar panels, heated pool, satellite T.V., alarm system, double glazed windows and marble flooring throughout. title: El Madroñal, Elegant South-East Facing Villa In El Madroñal
description: Villa for sale in El Madroñal, Benahavis This sunny, southeast facing villa, stands in a prestigious gated community, and the approach to the property, which stands on a hillside with magnificent views to the coast, is from a private estate road and through hand made iron gates.  A high wall forms a courtyard with a fountain and protects the front of the house which is on three levels. The upper floor contains three individually styled double bedrooms all with distant sea views, en suite bathrooms and ample wardrobe space. The master bedroom has a vaulted ceiling, two dressing rooms and overlooks a private terrace. The middle floor leads to the beautiful, rustic style sitting room with an open fire place which, in turn, leads to the delightful, formal dining room. There is a spacious second family room opening onto a terrace where seating overlooks the pool. The kitchen is a paradox of country style and contemporary comfort, equipped with all modern appliances and opening onto an extensive terracotta tiled terrace room. Another door leads to the study. The lower floor is a large self-contained apartment with a double bedroom, a living room, a fully fitted kitchen and a bathroom, ideal for guests or live-in staff. This opens onto the large private swimming pool and terrace.  There is a pretty, mature, well maintained garden with an abundance of plants and fruit trees. The property also has off road parking behind electrically operated gates and a three-car garage with a laundry area and log store. Many of the rooms have ceiling fans and air conditioning. title: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile. Brand new contemporary Penthouse
description:
Amazing 4 bedroom  duplex penthouse fully renovated in the prestigious complex of Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile. 
Enjoying a  panoramic sea and mountain views, this property comprises, on entrance level: living and dining room with fireplace and access to a large south-facing terrace with fantastic Mediterranean Sea views; contemporary open-plan Bulthaup kitchen with Gaggenau appliances; en-suite bedroom with access to the large terrace; 2 further bedrooms sharing a complete bathroom, one of them has direct access to the terrace; guest toilet; storage. 
Upstairs: en-suite master bedroom with dressing area and access to a sunny open terrace with Jacuzzi.
Extra features include: underfloor heating in bathrooms; Jasno electric shutters; Lutron LED lighting system with dimmers; brand-new A/C hot and cold system; sound system throughout; and pre-installation of alarm system. Option to purchase 1 parking space and 1 storage in the underground level. 
Optional furniture by Pedro Peña throughout. 
A stunning brand-new contemporary penthouse within a 24-hour secured urbanisation.

The property has a bright and large living room, dining room, fully fitted kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a games room, garage for 2 cars and a private swimming pool. title: Villa for sale in Bel Air, Estepona. Contemporary villa
description: Contemporary villa located in a tranquil residential area of the New Golden Mile situated only a short drive away from various hotels, restaurants, supermarkets or the nearest golf courses and beaches. Started in the early nineties the villa was completed in 2006 and offers a yellow and white marble entrance hall, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, marble living room with dining area and green fireplace, office, fully fitted kitchen connected to a television room, closed in terrace, covered terrace, lounge area on the top floor as well as a huge basement offering plenty of storage space, a guest cloakroom, a dining area with barbecue corner, storage space and parking for at least 4 cars. The pink master bedroom is en suite with dressing area and spectacular bathroom with round jacuzzi bath and separate shower. All bedrooms have access to terraces. Designed by the arquitect-owner, this octagonal villa is finished to fine quality standards and fitted with central gas heating, central music system, electric blinds, solar panels for water heating, and satellite television, and telephone, alarm and water tank for emergency situations. Finally this villa enjoys an automatically irrigated and illuminated garden featuring a swimming pool with fountain and barbecue corner with summer dining. Villa for sale in Bel Air, Estepona and features a swimming pool (Private), a garage (Private) and a garden (Private).. title: Bel Air, Family Villa in Quiet Area
description:
More images   Villa for sale in Bel Air, Estepona An attractive family villa, set within a quiet area, at the entrance of Los Flamingos Golf Course, between the towns of San Pedro and Estepona, yet not too far from the beach and commercial centre with bars, restaurants and supermarkets as well as golf courses and tennis centre. The villa welcomes you with a luminous entrance hall with double height ceilings which leads on to a spacious living/dining room with direct access to the garden. There is a fully fitted kitchen and separate dining / breakfast room and a beautiful porch ideal for outside living in the winter months, one office space and a double bedrooms and bathroom are on this level.
The first floor consists of the master bedroom with en suite bathroom with shower and jacuzzi bath, walk in wardrobe and private terrace, two further double bedrooms both with private terraces sharing one bathroom and a lovely sitting area with terrace giving this floor lot of light and charm. On the upper level you find another sitting room with 3 terraces ideal for an office, or relaxing area. Large private garden with swimming pool, barbecue area and fruit trees. There is spacious garage space plus parking space at the entrance of the house. The garage which includes a kitchen, bathroom, fireplace and storage room has potential to be converted into a cinema room, gym or similar. title: Mansion Club, Luminous Duplex Penthouse in Mansion Club
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Mansion Club, Marbella Golden Mile This southeast facing apartment is located in Mansion Club, a gated development, just minutes away from Marbella centre, the beach, Puerto Banus and neighbouring the well known Buchinger Clinic. This exclusive development is set amidst lush gardens, elegantly landscaped with more than 300 species of tropical plants and enhanced by excellent modern facilities, including a social club, bar-restaurant, gymnasium, sauna, Turkish baths and heated swimming pool.  The accommodation consists of a small entrance hall leading to a very wide living/dining area. The living features a ceiling-to-floor window which opens through sliding doors to a spacious terrace covered with a pergola, ideal for summer dining. The kitchen is fully equipped with Siemens appliances, a serving hatch-informal bar area and has an adjacent laundry area. There are two bedrooms. The master one comes  with a dressing area on the way to the en-suite interior bathroom with a bath tub and two hand wash basins featuring a skylight. There is an spacious solarium on the upper level with a covered barbecue area and fantastic views to the mountain and the coast. The duplex penthouse is equipped with underfloor heating, air conditioning, a garage space for one car and a store room. Fantastic penthouse frontline to the Las Brisas Golf. Located in Granados complex with mature gardens and security 24h. Furthermore the comunity has a large pool, indoor pool, gym and a meeting room. title: Los Granados Golf, Stunning Front Line Golf Duplex Penthouse
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Los Granados Golf, Nueva Andalucia Beautiful property in the heart of the golf valley, with open 180 degree views of the gardens, pool and Las Brisas golf course. Located within an exclusive complex of only 55 apartments, with 24 hour security, beautifully manicured gardens, free form pool, interior heated pool, gymnasium, his and hers saunas, changing rooms, events room and Jacuzzi. At only a short stroll to Las Brisas Golf Club, 5min drive to Puerto Banus and 10min to Marbella town centre. The property is located on the top floor and is built over 2 levels. The lower level comprises and ample living/dining room which leads on to a large west facing terrace with fantastic views. The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped, with adjoining laundry area, and enjoys a breakfast area and large windows giving it lots of light. There are 3 bedrooms on this level, all en-suite. The master bedroom has exit to the main terrace. One of the bedrooms has access to a private balcony. A guest toilet completes this level. Upstairs there is a room which can be easily turned into a fourth bedroom, which has use of a guest toilet which can also be turned into a full bathroom to service this bedroom. This level comprises spectacular terraces from which to enjoy the views and relax as well as a heated plunge pool with adjoining shower area. This upper level has its own independent access which is ideal for guests. Garage for 2 cars. Ample storage room with double doors to drive in a golf buggy. title: La Reserva de Alcuzcuz, Smart and Modern
description: Apartment for sale in La Reserva de Alcuzcuz, Benahavis This first floor unique property is a fusion of two separate apartments which were refurbished and converted into one three-bedroom unit. Due to its south orientation and elevated location within a gated urbanization of 55 smart homes, the apartment offers sea and golf views of Los Arqueros golf course and sun during all day round. The complex was built protected by the mountain slope and it is totally fenced with Casares stone and with checkpoint entrance.  The accommodation consists of a spacious living room with dining and sitting areas. Sliding aluminium windows open to a spacious teak floored terrace with fantastic views over the golf course towards the sea. The equipped kitchen has an adjoined laundry room. The south facing master bedroom has a luminous and smart en-suite bathroom with jacuzzi bath and shower, a dressing area and exit to the terrace. Two other bedrooms are situated in the eastern wing of the property. One has a shower en-suite and leads out to the open terrace and the other enjoys a separate bathroom. Additional features include two parking spaces and one store-room in the underground garage, electric shutters, air conditioning, electric underfloor heating in bathrooms with own thermostat and double glazed aluminium windows. title: Las Brisas, Lovely Villa in Tranquil Area
description: Villa for sale in Las Brisas, Nueva Andalucia Beautiful family villa, located in a cul-de-sac, in a quite and tranquil area but within walking distance to a shopping centre with restaurants, pharmacy and bars, and within a very short distance to Puerto Banus, the beach, international schools, several golf courses and other amenities.The villa is set on a flat plot with well kept gardens and a private pool with beautiful views towards la Concha mountain, enjoying sun all day. Built with top qualities in 2007, the house consists of an entrance hall with guest cloakroom, fully fitted kitchen and dining room and a large living room with fireplace and exit to two covered terraces and the private garden. On the first floor there are 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a study room, sharing one bathroom with shower and bath, an office and the master bedroom with walk-in wardrobes and en suite bathroom with hydro massage shower and bath. From the 2 bedrooms – ideal for children- there is access to an attic with high vaulted wooden ceilings currently being used as a games room that can be easily converted into another bedroom. The basement offers a garage for 2 cars, laundry room and bedroom with space to build a bathroom for staff accommodation. Additional features include wooden double glazed doors, terracotta and wooden flooring, A/C units hot and cold, radiators, alarm and music system and automatic sprinkler system in the garden. title: Los Granados del Mar, Apartment Overlooking The Mediterranean Within Secure Community
description: Apartment for sale in Los Granados del Mar, Estepona Beach front apartment facing the sea and the entire coast towards Gibraltar and Africa, set between Marbella and Estepona in the New Golden Mile area, within a luxurious development with generous and landscaped garden with two outdoor swimming pools and a Social Club boasting an indoor heated swimming pool, a gymnasium, changing rooms with sauna, a Turkish bath and a massage room, as well as a large living area with bar. The apartment set on the first floor welcomes us with an entrance hall leading to a spacious lounge /dining room with direct access out to the sunny covered terrace overlooking the sea. The property features a fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances including American style fridge-freezer, microwave, oven, a cook top and adjoining laundry area with washing machine and tumble dryer. A master bedroom with a dressing area and a white marble bathroom equipped with Jacuzzi and walk-in shower shares the south facing terrace with the lounge. The second bedroom with fitted cupboards and a shower room has an independent terrace overlooking the garden and communal areas. The third one boasts built-in wardrobes of exclusive design and a double marble bathroom with a bath tub. Equipped with the most modern qualities as far as security, intelligent home automation system, under floor heating, air conditioning, electric blinds, marble flooring, garage and storage space to name a few, this property is an excellent place where to enjoy a quality of life reserved to the few, in one of the best beach-front locations on the Coast. title: Bahía del Velerín, Beachfront Corner Apartment
description: Apartment for sale in Bahía del Velerín, Estepona Located in a forty-unit exceptional development in the New Golden Mile, between Las Dunas and Kempinski, both five stars Grand Luxe hotels, and literally on the beach front with a beach bar, next to the beautiful communal swimming pool which is currently updated to become a heated pool. Within walking distance to the high-class shopping centre Laguna Village, with a wide range of exclusive shops, unique restaurants and a trendy beach club. This elegant front line beach corner apartment is built to the highest standards and recently has been reformed to improve its quality. It now has newly modified kitchen, refurbished marble bathroom and terrace. The property consists of an entrance hall that leads directly to the spacious living-dining room and access to the terrace facing the communal garden and the sea. There are two bedrooms and two bathrooms, the main bedroom is en-suite and has a jacuzzi and exit to the covered terrace with sea views.  With south orientation, the property enjoys 24 hour security guards, burglar alarm with infra-red sensors in each room, double glazed windows with heat treated wooden frames, ivory cream marble floors, beautiful fully fitted Siematic kitchen, air conditioning (hot & cold), Jacuzzi in master bathroom, elevator from garage and storeroom to apartment and sea, garden and pool views. title: Los Granados Golf, Stunning Front Line Golf Apartment
description: Apartment for sale in Los Granados Golf, Nueva Andalucia Beautiful property in the heart of the golf valley, with open views of the gardens, pool, Las Brisas golf course and the sea in the distance. Located within an exclusive complex of only 55 apartments, with 24 hour security, beautifully manicured gardens, free form pool, interior heated pool, gymnasium, his and hers saunas, changing rooms, events room and Jacuzzi. At only a short stroll to Las Brisas Golf Club, 5min drive to Puerto Banus and 10min to Marbella town centre. This well looked after property is located on the first floor and offers beautiful views over the community pool, the golf and the sea. It comprises an entrance hall, a spacious living/dining room which leads onto a large west facing terrace with fantastic views over the golf, pool area and the sea. The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped, with adjoining laundry area, and enjoys a breakfast area and large windows giving it lots of light. There are 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes all with en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom has exit to the main terrace. One of the bedrooms has access to a private balcony with lovely views over the La Concha mountain.   Garage for 2 cars, space for a golf buggy and storage space are included in this offering. title: Alcazaba Beach, Duplex Penthouse with Stunning Sea Views
description: More images   Penthouse for sale in Alcazaba Beach, Estepona Light and airy duplex penthouse, situated within the renowned Alcazaba Beach complex, and located in the fourth and last phase, completed beginning 2007. Well-established development located by the seaside and a short distance of Estepona town.  The site slopes gently down to the sea and covers 12.300 m2 of mature sub-tropical gardens with palm trees which create a paradise- like atmosphere. The community offers 7 swimming pools one of which is heated, 6 tennis courts, three Beach clubs, 24-hour security and a centralised alarm system. All the staircases have their own lift. Two underground parking and two storerooms are also included in the price. The ground floor comprises an entrance hall, kitchen and laundry room, both fully fitted and equipped, as well as the spacious and bright living/dining room, with access to the main terrace. 2 bedrooms are also to be found on this floor, along with 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom is found on the first floor with double height ceilings, with dressing area, en suite bathroom, and a large solarium- terrace with south orientation and lovely views to the sea and Gibraltar, as well as another terrace on the back. The apartment also offers air conditioning hot and cold throughout, electric under floor heating in the whole apartment, water tank, alarm system and satellite TV, two parking spaces and a store room. There is marble flooring throughout except kitchen and terraces.
