title: Jardines Colgantes, Apartment with Amazing Terrace with Sea Views
description:
Apartment for sale in Jardines Colgantes, Marbella Golden Mile Unique and desirable uphill apartment with an extensive terrace, panoramic sea views and a private splash pool together with a sitting area are some of the features of this property located in Jardines Colgantes, an award-winning Moorish style luxury complex located in Marbella Hill Club.
The complex benefits from night time security guards and barriers during the week and 24 hours on weekends.
The south facing apartment comprises of an entrance hall with a guest toilet and a wardrobe, a large reception room with sitting area, dining area and a fully fitted kitchen that opens to an enclosed and lovely patio. The master suite opens to the terrace and has a wall of fitted wardrobes and an en-suite integrated bathroom. The second and third bedrooms share a marble bathroom, one has a window with a south orientation and the other has access to the open terrace.
The apartment also has marble floors, air conditioning hot and cold and a detached garage for one car. title: Cabo Bermejo, Gracious Apartment in New Golden Mile Beachfront Complex
description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Cabo Bermejo, Estepona Sunny and elegant garden apartment situated in what is probably one of the best positions of this luxurious beachfront, gated complex offering 24 hour security, exotic gardens, artificial lakes, cascade swimming pools, and a gymnasium. The apartment, unlike many of the ground floor apartments, is very private and secure. Finished to the finest of standards, the property is fitted with underfloor heating, air conditioning hot & cold, alarm, smoke detector, satellite TV and marble floors throughout.  The apartment includes an entrance hall with a fitted kitchen with granite work tops, laundry room. Straight ahead is the spacious lounge with access to two terraces, one facing south, the other facing east and shared with the master bedroom. There are two further bedrooms, one with an en suite bathroom, the other with a separate shower room. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with Jacuzzi bath tub, two double basins, and a built-in safe.  Also included is a large parking space for one car and a storage room in the underground garage. title: Las Tortugas de Aloha, Stunning Sea Views
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Las Tortugas de Aloha, Nueva Andalucia Gorgeous modern duplex penthouse apartment with one the best views in Nueva Andalucía. The privilege position of the property, the outdoor hot tub in the upper terrace and the floor-to-ceiling windows are all designed to show off the magnificent views of the Golf Valley. This immaculate property has been decorated by a prestigious local interior designer following owner’s directions. This south facing penthouse features on the ground floor an en-suite bedroom plus another bedroom and a separate bathroom, a bright  fully furnished kitchen with all the electric appliances that opens to the spacious living area this with exit to a terrace with panoramic views. The upper floor has the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom with a custom made walk in shower, plus a bathtub embedded in a bay window. There is a generous terrace with stunning views and two different areas, the spa area with an outdoor shower and in the chill out zone. The air conditioning is regulated independently on each floor, with two separate machines recently installed; there are also heating panels throughout the apartment, plus underfloor heating in the bathrooms.  The building is equipped with a lift and the development is gated and has a large pool area for residents. The property is offered with two garages spaces and one storage room. title: Los Naranjos, Mediterranean Villa near Golf area
description: More images   Villa for sale in Los Naranjos, Nueva Andalucia This mediterranean style villa is located in Nueva Andalucía, within a closed residential complex only a short drive from Puerto Banús with all its international restaurants and shopping facilities. The entrance hall leads to the spacious living/dining area with open fireplace and access to the covered terrace, the large kitchen and to one bedroom en suite. The first floor is accessed via a staircase featuring the master suite with its own terrace, offering fantastic views to the surroundings and from the upper floor to the sea. The lower part of the villa features three further bedrooms and two bathrooms. Each bedroom has direct access to the beautifully well-kept garden with a large swimming pool. The fifth bedroom is located on the main level. Further characteristics are: marble floors, wooden floors in 3 bedrooms, electric underfloor heating in all bathrooms, AC hot/cold and a large garage with basement for one to two cars. The kitchen, worth 15.000 € and included in the price, has not been installed yet. title: Elviria, Charming Villa with Sea Views
description: Villa for sale in Elviria, Marbella East Nice family villa with views down the golf course to the sea. Set in a well established area just at approx. 22 km. from Puerto Banus marina, at 2,3 km.  down to one of the nicest beaches of the area.  As you enter, straight ahead there is the cosy living room with fireplace leading out to south facing terrace and the garden and adjacent dining room with another fireplace. To the right there is a fully fitted kitchen with laundry room and storage room. To the left there is a guest bathroom and one bedroom with access to the terrace – ideally all on one floor without steps. On the upper floor you find the master bedroom with en suite bathroom and walk-in wardrobe. There are a further two guest bedrooms both with their own bathrooms. All of the rooms have access to a large south facing terrace offering beautiful views over the valley and golf course down to the sea.  The villa enjoys a nice flat garden surrounding the house, with private pool and barbecue area. Car port for 2 cars which can easily be turned into a garage plus parking for more cars. title: Condado de Sierra Blanca, Apartment with breathtaking views
description:
Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile This fantastic corner ground floor 3 bedroom apartment is situated in Condado de Sierra Blanca, five star complex on the hill side of the emblematic La Concha mountain in Marbella. It is just 2kms away from the Marbella centre (distances are approximate) with all kind of amenities and services. The apartment enjoys breathtaking sea views encompassing Gibraltar and the coast of Africa. The community enjoys two magnificent swimming pools, one with rectangular shape for swimming and the other one just for relaxing. The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, a guest toilet, a lounge/dining room with a fire place, a master bedroom suite with interior bathroom with a separate shower, bath tub, two hand wash basins and a separate toilet and two more bedrooms which share a bathroom. Both the lounge and the master suite open onto the south facing semi covered terrace with tiled and decked area with exit to the communal garden and pools.
A parking space suitable for two cars and a large storage room with direct access by lift in the underground garage are also included. All the bedrooms offer built-in wardrobes. Under floor heating, air conditioning with heat pump, double glazing, terracotta flooring, parking and storage room. description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Los Flamingos, Benahavis Apartment situated overlooking the splendid 18 hole golf course of Los Flamingos on Marbella´s new Golden Mile. At 10 minutes drive from  Puerto Banus and 30 minutes to sophisticated Sotogrande marina, the development is also only minutes away from the beach. Los Flamingos Golf Resort boasts 4 golf courses, one of which plays host to the PGA championships. The development includes just 54 luxury apartments with extensive use of glass and large terraces. The extensive communal grounds are fully landscaped and feature two large swimming pools and ponds. Owners will benefit from a FREE 10 year membership of the on-site golf club. The apartment features natural stone and cream marble and include a fireplace, a fully fitted kitchen with SMEG appliances, Starck bathroom fittings, a Jacuzzi bathtub, under floor heating, air conditioning, parking and storage rooms. title: Guadalmina Alta, Golf Views From The Terrace
description: Apartment for sale in Guadalmina Alta, San Pedro de Alcantara This sunny and quiet first line golf apartment is located in a Guadalmina Alta development, built in 2003, refurbished in 2015 and featuring green communal areas and a large swimming pool. The property is walking distance to San Pedro de Alcantara, Hotel Barceló and golf club of Guadalmina with its fantastic facilities. The apartment has an entrance hall that leads to the delightfully decorated living/ dining room with access to a south facing terrace overlooking the golf course with the lake and a communal pool. A master bedroom suite shares the terrace with the lounge and has an en-suite marble bathroom with natural light. Two other double bedrooms each with en-suite bathroom share another separate east facing terrace, also with golf views. The kitchen is completely furnished and has a serving hatch opening out to the dining area. The offer also includes parking space for one car in the communal garage and storage, central air conditioning, gas central heating including the terrace, cream marble flooring and double glazed white aluminium windows, electric awnings and shutters in living room and master bedroom and cameras in the development and security service during 24 hours. title: La Virginia, Enchanting Ground Floor Apartment
description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in La Virginia, Marbella Golden Mile Located in the most charming deliciously decadent “pueblo” style community with a small church, just a couple of minutes by car from Marbella centre. International community of only 68 neighbours, with almost all year round residence. With southeast orientation this rustic style property enjoys terracotta flooring, a fireplace, alarm system and high quality white PVC double glazed windows.   This apartment, totally renovated in 2005, consists of an ample entrance hall that leads to the 30 m² living room with a fireplace.  The fully renovated and luminous kitchen is on the right hand side of the hall, has an eat-in area and opens to a courtyard offering rare outdoor living – sits twelve -, next to a stream. Off the living room there is a hallway that leads to a bedroom with wardrobes, stucco painted walls and a window with views to the patio. There is a separate shower room just across. The master bedroom ceiling has been painted by an artist. It has a dressing area and a shower room en-suite. The accommodation comprises spacious lounge with a fire place and dining area connected with the open plan fully fitted kitchen with exit to the backside terrace, a guest toilet, and two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The lounge and one of the bedrooms lead out to the sizeable uncovered terrace with panoramic views of the sea and the surroundings.  The property also features air conditioning and alarm system. Two garage spaces and a storage are also included in price. title: Alcazaba Beach, Apartment in Frontline Beach Complex
description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Alcazaba Beach, Estepona This two bedroom garden apartment is situated within the renowned Alcazaba Beach complex, a well-established development located by the seaside and a short distance of Estepona town.  The site slopes gently down to the sea and covers 12.300 m2 of mature sub-tropical gardens with palm trees which create a paradise-like atmosphere. The community offers 7 swimming pools one of which is heated, 6 tennis courts, three Beach clubs, 24-hour security and a centralised alarm system.  The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, kitchen with laundry room, both fully fitted and equipped, as well as the spacious and bright living/dining room with access to the main terrace and further communal garden and pool. There are 2 bedrooms along with 2 bathrooms, and a thrid bedroom can be created. The master bedroom shares terrace with the lounge and has dressing area and separate bathroom en-suite.  The apartment also offers air conditioning hot and cold throughout and alarm system. There is marble flooring throughout except kitchen and terraces. title: Santa Maria, Apartment in Quiet Area in Elviria
description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Santa Maria, Marbella East Beautiful and very private ground floor apartment set in a gated urbanization in Elviria near Santa Maria Golf Resort, offering mature landscaped gardens and four swimming pools. The development Manantial de Santa María is set between the most outstanding beaches, restaurants and Marbella’s lively town centre. It is an ideal place for golfers, holiday makers, families and beach lovers. Just a few minutes’ walk from the urbanisation is the Santa Maria Golf Course and Clubhouse. Furthermore the centre of Elviria with its variety of shops, supermarkets, restaurants and bars is within walking distance. The beach is just over a kilometer away and can be easily accessed either on foot or by car.  The property with its private entrance area consists of a spacious living-dining room with a fire place, fully fitted kitchen with Mexican granite worktops and wooden cupboards equipped with Bosch electric appliances, three bedrooms and three bathrooms. Two of the bedrooms have their private enclosed terraces and bathrooms en-suite. Off the lounge there is a nice covered terrace with exit to the private garden.  Exterior and interior alarm, air conditioning, electric radiators, 2 underground garages and 2 storages are included in the offering. title: Los Capanes del Golf, Excellent Value! New Golf Apartment
description:

The apartment consists of a large corridor leading on to a bright and south facing living room with exit to the terrace with views to the beach and sea. title: Ancon Sierra, Apartment in Gated Community
description: Apartment for sale in Ancon Sierra, Marbella Golden Mile A superb apartment ideally located just a short drive from the Puente Romano 5 star hotel and beaches. El Ancon Sierra Phase IV is a luxury, gated and secure complex of apartments, divided into six buildings with a total of 81 units. The apartments are built around an attractive plaza, and underneath is the underground garage with private parking spaces and store rooms for the residents. Beautifully landscaped gardens and grounds. There are two large swimming pools for the apartments, and a heated one in the garden of the El Ancón Sierra Club House, which together with the bar and restaurant, are for the exclusive use of residents and their guests. There is also a gymnasium on the premises.  The entrance hall leads to the living room with dining area. To the right of the hall there is a fully equipped brand new kitchen with white cabinetry. The living room and the master bedroom open to a spacious terrace. Both the master bedroom and the second bedroom are en-suite. The offering also includes a one car garage and a storeroom, air conditioning (hot and cold) and marble flooring throughout. title: Las Cancelas, Sunny Townhouse with Views
description: Town House for sale in Las Cancelas, Marbella Town Completed in 2001, in a quiet position, this sunny east west facing townhouse is ideally located just 3 minutes drive from Marbella town centre and the beach.  The spacious townhouse comprises an entrance hall with a guest toilet, leading to the sunny living room (which at present is used as an office) with exit to a covered terrace and onto garden with a fountain, and a fully fitted kitchen with a covered laundry area. On the upper floor there is the master west facing bedroom with an en suite bathroom and a spacious terrace with sea and mountains views. There are two further bedrooms on this level, each with a balcony with sea views, sharing a bathroom with marbled walls. The third level consists of a spacious terrace with views to the sea and Gibraltar, a large sitting room and a store room. title: Xarblanca, Spacious Townhouse near Marbella Centre
description: Town House for sale in Xarblanca, Marbella Town This townhouse is conveniently situated above Marbella, within walking distance to a public school, bars and supermarket and within only a minute drive to the centre of Marbella and the beach. Set on a corner plot giving space and privacy with a beautiful mature private garden and swimming pool, a covered terrace and Moroccan decoration this three story townhouse is an ideal family home. The main floor consists of en entrance hall with guest W/C, fully fitted kitchen with breakfast area, a storage room, laundry room and a spacious living room with fireplace and exit to the south west facing covered terrace and the garden. On the upper floor there are 2 bedrooms; one with a separate bathroom; and the master bedroom with bathroom en suite. There used to be three bedrooms and could easily be changed back. There is an attic ideal for storage room, but it can be turned into a fourth bedroom with lovely views towards the sea. title: La Cartuja del Golf, Exquisite Penthouse near Golf
description: Penthouse for sale in La Cartuja del Golf, Estepona An immaculate duplex penthouse apartment situated in a fantastic location within La Cartuja del Golf, a secure gated community with extensive green gardens. It is located next to Atalaya Golf course and just a short drive to the beach, Puerto Banús and Marbella. The complex offers a club house, 3 swimming pools and paddle tennis. Light, space and a good layout and large terraces make it ideal for year-round living. It offers all the comforts of a house and has abundant light and excellent sun exposure through large east and west facing windows. On the lower floor is the entrance hall and corridor that lead to a spacious living/dining room with fireplace. The living room opens to a large terrace with garden views. Two double guest bedrooms with two bathrooms and the fully equipped kitchen with adjacent laundry complete the ground level. The upper floor houses a master bedroom suite with dressing area and marble bathroom. It also features a covered custom made sitting area and large solarium. It is sold unfurnished. In all, a beautiful home full of charm. title: Marbella Centro, Beachside Apartment in Marbella Centre
description: Apartment for sale in Marbella Centro, Marbella Town East facing apartment a few steps from the beach with sea views set next to the beach front of the Marbella Fishermen port within a very short walking distance to the Old Town and city centre, supermarkets, restaurants and all amenities. In a gated urbanisation with concierge service, a communal swimming pool and garden. The development was built in 1995. The apartment comprises of a corridor leading on to a living room with two exits to the terrace with views over the beach and sea. Further on there are two bedrooms, with fitted wardrobes, one with bathroom en suite the other with a separate shower room. A fully equipped kitchen completes the apartment. There are two lifts in the building. Features of the property include A/C hot and cold, marble flooring. One underground garage space and one storage space. title: Dominion Beach, Three level townhouse in Beachside Luxury Development
description: More images   Town House for sale in Dominion Beach, Estepona Lovely south facing townhouse located on a second line beach position in a luxury beachside development with 24 hour security. The development is located at 10 minutes drive from Puerto Banus, bordering 0,5 km of a tranquil beach and offering beautiful and well kept gardens, two swimming pools (one heated) and a beach restaurant opening from Easter until September.  The property consists of an entrance hall leading out to the fully fitted kitchen with laundry to the right, a guest cloackroom straight ahead and a cosy lounge dining room decorated with a fire place and offering direct exit to the terrace and communal garden providing thus great space for outside entertainment. 2 bedrooms en-suite with built-in wardrobes and one of them with access to the front terrace are on the first floor.  The property also enjoys some extra space in the underground level to be used as additional bedroom or games room. On the top there is an open solarium with sea and mountain views, perfect for refreshing summer night parties or enjoying sunset with a glass of wine. Marble flooring throughout, central A/C hot and cold. Communal T.V. satellite with  English, Irish, Spanish, French, German, and Russian channels. Excellent rental potential! title: La Quinta, Spacious Ground Floor Apartment in La Quinta
description: More images   Ground Floor Apartment for sale in La Quinta, Benahavis Lovely ground floor apartment located in a gated and front line golf complex with community gardens and swimming pool. The property enjoys a private covered terrace with a small garden. The apartment comprises an entrance area; a spacious living/dining room with access to the terrace and garden; a fully fitted kitchen; a guest bedroom with separate bathroom; and the master bedroom with wardrobes, access to the terrace and garden and en suite bathroom. Outside parking in the gated complex is available. Additional features include marble flooring throughout, A/ C hot and cold, lift to the apartment and a big store room. Set within a few minutes drive to San Pedro town, La Quinta and the beach. title: Benatalaya, Garden level apartment
description: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Benatalaya, Benahavis This two bedroom ground floor property is situated in the marvellous complex of Benatalaya, highlighted with spectacular gardens, water falls, 5 swimming pools and spa area including an indoor heated pool, gymnasium, sauna, jacuzzi and a tennis court. The complex is 15km from Marbella and approximately 7km from the beach.  The apartment features lounge/dining room, two bedrooms, one of them with en-suite bathroom. Both bedrooms have direct access to the gardens. The lounge leads out to the private garden with views over the surrounding areas and the streets of the urbanization. The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped and has an adjoining laundry. Two under ground garage spaces with storage are also included. Large gardens with direct access to the beach and 2 communal swimming pools are some other delights. Located on a sixth floor, this apartment with east orientation is accessed through an entrance hall. The property offers marble flooring, sea and mountain views, elevator, concierge service in summer. There is a possibility of purchasing an underground garage space in the same complex. description: More images   Penthouse for sale in Bel Air, Estepona Lovely Penthouse Apartment set in a nice urbanisation offering communal gardens and swimming pools. Located between Marbella, San Pedro and Estepona, very near the beach, several commercial centres, golf courses, 5 star hotels with gym and Spa treatments, restaurants and many other amenities. This walk – up, mainly west facing apartment has an entrance hall, fully fitted kitchen with laundry room on the right, that leads directly onto the living room featuring cream marble flooring, a fireplace and access to covered terrace with spiral stairs leading up the solarium from where you can enjoy views towards the sea. The urbanisation is set near supermarkets, tennis clubs and the Los Flamingos Golf Course. title: Aloha Gardens, Walk up Sunny Apartment
description: Apartment for sale in Aloha Gardens, Nueva Andalucia This 2 bedroom walk-up apartment is situated within one of the well established communities of Nueva Andalucia, Aloha Gardens, just at the door of the variety of services such as restaurants, bars, banks and others. The complex which is approximately 4 km away from Puerto Banus offers 24 security, well kept gardens, the outdoor pool, a covered pool (heated in winter), plus a jacuzzi. There is also a tennis court and 2 paddle tennis courts (floodlit at night), fitness room, sauna and jacuzzi.  The property is distributed into a lounge with dining area, a fully fitted kitchen with serving hatch, 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, large open terrace with spiral staircase to the upper terrace with pergola and open panoramic views over the valley and the mountains. Air conditioning with heat pump, satellite TV, marble flooring and one underground car space are also included. description: Apartment for sale in Elviria, Marbella East Hacienda Elviria development is situated in the Eastern part of Marbella within attractive natural environment only 5 minutes to the beach, shops, bars, restaurants, golf courses and international school. title: Linda Vista Baja, Tranquil Paradise
description:
Villa for sale in Linda Vista Baja, San Pedro de Alcantara Contemporary villa 400 meters away from the beach in San Pedro, which offers four bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom.  The property is situated on a landscaped plot of land of almost 800 square metres and has a private swimming-pool and parking for three vehicles. The 250 sqm.  villa includes an impressive 40m solarium with views to the sea. There is a bio-ethanol fireplace in the large living-room and the open plan kitchen provides state-of-the-art appliances. A very large bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a large guest bathroom, an entrance hall with direct access to the living-room complete the ground floor. On the upper floor there are three bedroom suites. High quality specifications will include bathrooms with ivory cream marble tiles in walls and flooring, dark grey PVC double glazed windows, fitted wardrobes with shelving and drawer units in white lacquered MDF, home automation system for light regulation and climate control, polished ivory cream marble flooring throughout except terrace tiles with earthenware tiles, installation of personalized TV aerial with various outlets both inside and outside, video entry-phone with pre-installation for security system and video surveillance, under floor heating by hot water system, hot-cold air conditioning, pre-installation for Jacuzzi in solarium, pre-installation of pool heating system, landscaped garden with automatic watering system, chill-out area next to swimming pool with pergola and pre-installation for barbecue, eating area next to
kitchen with decorative pergola and parking for three cars under pergola. title: Luxury terraced house with pool in front of the beach
description: Spectacular modern architecture townhouse with private pool in front of the beach Cala Mendia (Manacor). Quality materials and privileged location make it a very desirable property, which only very few can possess. The two-story house is divided into three double bedrooms, two bathrooms and a toilet, living room, kitchen and terrace overlooking the garden, pool, beach and sea. It also has a courtyard, parking, garden and pool.130 m2 living area, 410 m2 plot, 10 m2 kitchen, 30 m2 lounge, 15 m2 of terrace at living room level and 20 m2 of terrace at pool level, 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet, Nearly new property, separate kitchen, porcelain tile floor, exterior carpentry of aluminium with double glazing,interior carpentry of white lacquered wood, facing south. The house was built in 2008, is furnished, has air conditioning and heating.

title: Newly renovated town house in Portals Nous
description: This newly renovated town house is located on the hill of Portals Nous and is distributed over three levels. The ground floor consisting of a garage for two cars, laundry area and storage room, the intermediate floor consists of a living/dining room with exit to the garden of approximately 123 sqm and porches of approximately 65 sqm, a beautiful kitchen and a guest WC with a small shower. On the top floor are three double bedrooms and a bathroom and an exit to a roof terrace with sea views. Further more there is hot/cold AC and a beautiful community pool. A great home in one of Mallorca’s most sought after neighbourhoods.

title: Villa for sale in Altos de Puente Romano, Marbella Golden Mile. Villa in Altos de Puente Romano
description:
Villa under construction in one of the most valued areas of the Golden Mile, Altos de Puente Romano, with entrance barrier and 24h security service. 
De design includes, on the main floor, a wide entrance hall, office, living-dining room with direct access to a great porch of 106m2 leading to the pool and garden area, fully equipped kitchen with central island; one bedroom en suite. 
On the top floor, with a large private terrace, we can find the master bedroom with a big bathroom with independent bath and 2 big dressing areas and a second bedroom en suite. 
The basement includes garage for 2 cars, machinery room, laundry area, 2 bedrooms sharing a complete bathroom and a staff bedroom en suite. Must be see

title: La Dama de Noche, Charming apartment at a stone's throw from Puerto Banús
description: Apartment for sale in La Dama de Noche, Nueva Andalucia Lovely west facing 2nd floor apartment located in a gated and secure complex at just 3km from Puerto Banús and 5km from the centre of Marbella.  The property offers a living/dining area, fully fitted kitchen with adjoining laundry room, two bedrooms and two bathrooms and an underground parking space. The community offers 2 large swimming pools, beautifully maintained gardens, 4 tennis courts, children’s playground, 24 hour security service, off-street parking for guests and surveillance cameras.  All this set within a short drive to several golf courses and the centre of Marbella, and within easy walking distance to the golf club Dama de Noche and Puerto Banús. title: El Mirador, Stone Throw from Marbella Centre
description: Villa for sale in El Mirador, Marbella Town With construction completed early in 2002, this conveniently located property has been designed for family living and boasts a well kept garden with a swimming pool. Ready for immediate move-in, this is truly a welcoming abode that is comprised of a ground floor with an entrance hall with  guest shower room that opens up directly ahead to a patio with a fountain and onto the garden. The 33,25 m² living room with a fireplace and beamed ceiling opens to a covered terrace and has an adjacent hexagonal dining room with direct access to a fully-fitted kitchen. The other side of the villa has a totally self contained apartment with a bedroom, a sitting room, a bathroom and a kitchen. A laundry room and a store room complete this level.  The upper floor has a large family room, two bedrooms sharing a bathroom and the master bedroom with an hexagonal full bathroom en suite with Jacuzzi bathtub and a separate shower cubicle and a dressing area. The master suite has a balcony and the family room and the south facing bedroom share a terrace with a pergola. title: Townhouse by the Sea
description: Town House for sale in Marbella Town Absolutely lovely and charming townhouse boasting unequal location within the centre of Marbella, on the very first line of the beach promenade and offering sea views of the bay. Built in the 60s decade and conserving its original materials and spirit. The house is built over two levels plus basement, featuring entrance hall, basic kitchen, lounge with a fire place and exit to the covered terrace with sea views. On the first floor there are three bedrooms which share the bathroom and one guest toilet. The master bedroom includes private covered terrace with views over the sea. In the basement with natural light and ventilation you can find two more bedrooms with one bathroom room, laundry area and storage. The property is in need of refurbishment and is perfect for those who want to be close to all kind of amenities and services in the very centre of Marbella and at 10m from the beach. title: Penthouse for sale in Coto Real, Marbella Golden Mile. Exclusive Area Penthouse Coto Real
description:
Complex located in one of the most exclusive areas of Marbella. Elevated area with incredible views of the sea and Marbella’s famous mountain. This is a tranquil development with 24 hour concierge, communal gardens and swimming pool and located at a short drive to Marbella and Puerto Banus. 
The property comprises of an entrance hall with guest toilet, a living/dining room with an open terrace with beautiful views of the valley down to the coast, a fully equipped kitchen with adjoining laundry room. Also on the lower level there is a master bedroom en-suite with built in wardrobes and access to the main terrace. Upstairs there is a second master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and an east orientated private terrace, two guest bedrooms sharing one bathroom and both with access to their own private east facing balcony. 
The penthouse, sold unfurnished, also includes two parking spaces and a store room.

title: Spacious apartment in the popular area of Portixol
description: This property is located on the seafront in first line at the port of Portixol. All the rooms of this bright apartment are very spacious and are distributed in: living and dining room, three bedrooms, one with bathroom en suite and walk-in closet. The modern kitchen is large and has a storage room. You can enjoy the spectacular panoramic views overlooking the sea and the port of Portixol from almost all rooms, but especially from the  20 sqm terrace. Additionally, this property includes a guest bathroom, gas central heating and it has a very well maintained communal garden with a separate area for dogs, a parking space and store room. With only a small renovation, this could be a top apartment, next to the sea and very close to Palma.

title: Villa for sale in Santa Clara, Marbella East. Modern villa at santa Clara golf
description:
This modern villa is part of an exclusive gated community, currently in construction in the Santa Clara area of Marbella East, close to the beach and the centre, but in a quiet neighbour hood near to some of the Costa del Sol’s top golf courses. 

	The open-plan layout includes a large living room, with glazed wall opening on to the covered terrace overlooking the pool; fully fitted dining kitchen; double bedroom with en-suite bathroom; and a guest cloakroom, all on the ground floor. 

	The upper floor houses the master suite, with walk-in wardrobe, luxury bathroom with bathtub and shower; two additional double bedrooms; a family bathroom; and a large terrace, accessible from all bedrooms. 

	Once completed, the property will have a fully landscaped gardens, an outdoor saltwater swimming pool, and a carport for two vehicles.

title: Duplex for sale in Señorio de Aloha, Nueva Andalucia. Duplex apartment in Nueva Andalucia
description:
This fully renovated 3 beds and 2 baths Duplex apartment is set over 2 floors in a gated and secure development within an easy walking distance of Puerto Banus as well as the beaches.

	You are also close to the Centro Plaza shopping centre where you will find a selection of restaurants, shops, banks, beauty salons and more..The complex is located in the heart of the Golf Valley spoiling the golf players with choices, within a very easy reach of seven excellent golf courses:Los Naranjos Golf Club, Golf la Dama de Noche, Real Club de Golf las Brisas, Aloha Golf Club and La Quinta Golf & Country Club, still within a few minutes walking distance of the luxury and fashionable Puerto Banus .

	The development benefits from 3 large swimming pools, lush tropical gardens and kids pool.

	The apartment enjoys 3 terraces, garden views, beautiful marble floors, air conditioning throughout and it has been renovated to a high standard.

	With a superb rental potential either for long or short term, this is an outstanding opportunity to own a great home in the Spanish sun surrounded by all the local amenities!

title: Villa for sale in Los Altos de los Monteros, Marbella East. Villa in Altos de los Monteros
description:
La Finca de Marbella finds itself ensconced on the western side of Rio Real, just east of Marbella town in a peaceful residential area dominated by gentle olive and pine-clad slopes, beaches, dunes and sea views. This location has the distinction of being highly central and peaceful, thus endowing the private community of villas with the best of both worlds.
The choice of modern contemporary styling may follow the latest market trends, but it is also an integral part of the vision behind the project. La Finca de Marbella is designed to combine a sleek architectural language with a tranquil natural setting surrounded by olive groves. In blending nature and modernity we wish to offer a perfect combination of both, as in the case of a location that is peaceful and secure yet also central and convenient.
Modern, stylish interiors, natural light, spacious bedrooms and large terraces are at the heart of the La Finca concept. There are a variety of kitchen layouts available which allow you to personalise your living area.
La Finca de Marbella is more than just an idea. The concept is the result of years of accumulated experience in the real estate market; the highs, the lows, the trends.
It bridges the gap between apartments and townhouses on the one hand and Marbella’s opulent villas on the other. It combines the freedom and lifestyle of a villa with the practicality and cost of a smaller property in a way not achieved before.
features: Air conditioning, Brand new, Central heating, Covered terrace, Dining room, Double glazing, Electric blinds, Fireplace, Fitted wardrobes, Fully fitted kitchen, Guest room, Guest toilet, Kitchen equipped, Laundry room, Living room, Marble floors, Mountain view, Mountainside, Panoramic view, Private terrace, Sea view

title: Condes de Luque, Brand New Villa
description:
More images   Villa for sale in Condes de Luque, Benahavis Newly built villa in Benahavis, next to La Alqueria and Atalaya golf courses, with magnificent views to the golf and the coast. Solidly built, a charming entrance hall, with an ample guest toilet and a lift to all floors, introduces the living spaces that are graced by elegant details. The cosy drawing room with a fireplace opens to the covered terrace and through sliding doors to the independent dining room, the perfect backdrop for entertaining with its beamed ceiling. The adjoining kitchen with breakfast area and centre island impresses with Gaggenau appliances. There is a convenient bedroom suite on this level, facing southwest with fantastic views to Atalaya Golf course.
Upstairs are the master bedroom with ample and fitted dressing room, ensuite bathroom with Jacuzzi, and a private terrace and two further bedroom suites, all of them with spectacular views. The huge basement includes a garage for two cars, a sauna, a Turkish bath, a shower room, a storage room and the Staff quarters, with a sitting room, a bedroom and ensuite shower room. Boldly scaled detailing, highlighted by the decoration made by Gonzalo Mendiola from Ankara Design, unique wall finishes, excellent marbles, and wooden beams lend exceptional richness to the airy openness of this south facing residence, which is further defined by wide terraces on every level. A lift to all floors, under floor heating, air conditioning, home automation, different alarm systems and an illuminated and irrigated beautifully designed garden with a swimming pool, complete this offering. title: Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis. Extraordinary Property in La Zagaleta
description:
Magnificent property in Benahavis, at one of the best location of La Zagaleta, build with a clean-cut which allows the natural light to flows in each and every part of this house.

	This villa is build on 3 levels, the entrance level contain sitting room with fireplace, living and dinning area, fully fitted kitchen with breakfast zone, guest toilet and one bedroom in suite. On the first floor there are: master bedroom with his/hers dressing area and select bathroom in suite. On the same floor exist another 2 bedrooms with its own bath and wardrobes.

	On the basement floor exists an indoor Spa area, with sauna and Hammam, an unfinished enormous space that may be use as gym or cinema room, wine cellar, machine room and a garage for 4 cars.

	The entire plot of 3206 m2 allows the owners to enjoy the nature, the amazing peacefully golf and mountain panoramic views and the privacy of the pool with Ozone water treatment.

	La Zagaleta gated community offers their own security department 24 hours, 2 top 18-hole private golf courses, unique panoramic views of Gibraltar and the coast of Africa, all of this of only few minutes of Marbella and 60 km from Málaga airport.

title: Hacienda las Chapas, Eight-bedroom Villa In Sought After Area
description: Villa for sale in Hacienda las Chapas, Marbella East Impressive villa situated in the Eastern part of Marbella area at approximately 13 km from Marbella centre and 3km from the nearest Santa Maria Golf course. The villa welcomes its residents with the relaxing sound of the water feature at the entrance and boasts a well maintained green plot with swimming pool and wooden decking.  Built over 3 levels it features double height entrance hall with elegant staircase, TV room, lounge with a fire place and dining room connected with the fully fitted kitchen with separate entrance. The laundry and three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, two of them with dressing rooms and direct access to the garden complete the entrance level.  The lower floor houses two bedrooms sharing a bathroom, currently used as games room and study. Staff quarters with independent entrance, one bedroom suite, lounge and kitchenette are situated on the same level.  On the upper level you can find a master bedroom with dressing area and large bathroom highlighted with vaulted wooden ceilings and jacuzzi. In addition there is a garage for 4 cars, and separate building with gymnasium and guard apartment with bedroom suite, lounge and kitchenette. The poolside area comprises semi covered chill-out zone with partial sea views and BBQ. Other features include electric shutters, air conditioning, radiators central heating and wooden flooring in the bedrooms. title: La Zagaleta, Frontline to the New Golf Course
description: Villa for sale in La Zagaleta, Benahavis Attention to detail is apparent from the moment you set foot on the property. Built on a very private plot with orientation to the west on the front line of the new golf course Los Barrancos, the villa has spectacular views over the greens, fairways and country side; the ninth fairway borders the perimeter of the plot.  Expect to be impressed with the solid Iroko wood entrance door with automatic entry systems, the natural hardwood decking around the overflow swimming pool, superb Clive Christian gourmet kitchen with an island with black solid granite work top and the opulent bathrooms each with Villeroy & Boch fittings and sanitary ware. The villa consists of two bedrooms suites in each side of the entrance hall, a guest toilet, a lounge with three walls of windows, and a separate dining room with direct access to the kitchen on the ground floor.  Downstairs there is a gym which is currently used as a bedroom, steam bath, sauna with toilet and shower, a glassed wine cellar, a games room with bar, a huge sound and cinema room, a laundry room, an office with safe and a guest suite with direct access to the garden. The master bedroom with a fireplace and vaulted ceiling is located in the upper floor, together with another bedroom suite. The master bedroom also features a jacuzzi in the terrace. Electric underfloor heating in the bathrooms and gasoil powered in the rest of the rooms, air conditioning with heat pump with individual control per room, water tanks, staff apartment with separate entrance, 2 car garage and additional exterior parking are some other features of interest. title: Atalaya Golf, New Penthouse near Golf
description: Duplex Penthouse for sale in Atalaya Golf, Estepona A superb duplex penthouse apartment situated in a fantastic location within a secure gated community comprising low rise properties. Located next to Atalaya Golf course and just a short drive to the beach, Puerto Banús and Marbella. The complex offers a swimming pool and attractive gardens.  Light, space, a good layout and large terraces make it ideal for year-round living. It offers all  the comforts of a house and has lots of light and excellent sun exposure through large windows.  On the lower floor is the 3,41 m2. entrance hall that leads to a spacious 39,43 m2.living/dining room with open plan kitchen. The living room opens to a 63,69 m2.terrace. Also on the lower floor are three double guest bedrooms (10,39 m2., 10,42 m2 and 17,27 m2.) one with en-suite bathroom and dressing area and the other two, sharing a bathroom. All bedrooms share a 7,31 m2. terrace. There is a 59,41 m2. solarium accessed from the entrance hall on the lower level. description: Apartment for sale in Bahia Real, Marbella East Bahia Real is located in the eastern part of Marbella within one of the best beach residential areas featuring two swimming pools, children’s playground, private paddle and tennis courts. It boasts green gardens which are a real natural park with 24 hours security barriers at only 12km from Marbella town, and 500m from the beach. This southeast facing ground floor property offers two bedrooms, two bathrooms, both with dressing rooms and marble bathrooms, fully fitted and equipped kitchen with separate utility room. The lounge with a fire place and dining area access to the semi-covered terrace with electric awnings which faces the garden and has sea views. Such features as electric shutters in the lounge, electric awnings in the terrace, fireplace in the lounge, 2 parking spaces in the underground garage, big storage, water heated by gas, electric under floor heating in the bathrooms and kitchen and air conditioning add value to the property. description: Wonderful rustic country house located in Pollensa, near the golf course. An exquisite combination of rustic and modern styles, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere with space and light. It is divided into 2 floors and a basement. Downstairs we find the 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, living room, kitchen and laundry room. From the living room and the kitchen you access a sunny porch overlooking the pool and large garden in which there is a porch barbecue. On the first floor there is hall, a large bedroom with en-suite and dressing room. From this level you can access a terrace with stunning views. In the basement there is a cellar.

title: El Mirador del Paraiso, Unequal Views
description: Villa for sale in El Mirador del Paraiso, Benahavis Unequal coastal views highlight this elegant traditional style property situated on a slope of the mountain within a gated community of private villas and luxurious apartments. The ultimate in technology and materials was used during its construction. All the estate comprises a villa built over 2 levels, an entrance courtyard with a fountain and a secondary building housing a 2 car garage on the upper level and a separate guest accommodation on the ground floor consisting of a living room, a bathroom and sauna. The interiors of the villa include an entrance hall with a guest toilet, a fully fitted kitchen with Siemens electric appliances and pantry. Straight ahead from the hall there is a living room with dining area and log burn fireplace. Off the lounge is a west facing terrace covered with pergola and enjoying far reaching sea views. A master bedroom suite completes this level. It features a wooden floor with marble border, terrace with pergola and sea views, marble bathroom with a bath tub and shower. The lower level houses 3 more bedrooms with built-in cupboards. Two with private bathrooms and exit to the garden and the third one shares a separate shower room with incorporated hammam. This level is completed with a lounge which could be converted into a cinema room with dark automatic curtains. The price also include garage for 2 cars, heated pool, safe boxes in each bedroom, 2000l water tank, air conditioning, solar panels, under floor heating, wooden carpentry and alarm system. title: Los Naranjos Golf, Stylish frontline golf villa facing in Los Naranjos
description:
Villa for sale in Los Naranjos Golf, Nueva Andalucia Totally awesome villa situated on an elevated frontline golf plot within one of the most sought after night guarded communities of Los Naranjos Golf. A golf club is round the corner and the villa is strategically located in Nueva Andalucia with all kind of professional services and commercial and school facilities is just 5 minutes drive away. The property boasts endless golf views from all the levels which seems to be the extension of its own garden. The elegant interiors tastefully decorated begin with the entrance hall with a powder room, a warmed by the fire living room with dining area connected with open style totally equipped kitchen and laundry. The off lounge terrace leads down to the well kept garden with a large swimming pool. On the upper floor there are 3 bedroom suites with fitted cupboards. The master bedroom features a large dressing room and en-suite bathroom with double vanity and a bath tub. All the bedrooms share the wrap around uncovered terrace with spectacular far reaching golf views.  The ground level houses two more bedroom suites and a multi-function area which could be used either like a separate apartment with living and sleeping zones, or like a second living or games room with kitchenette opening to the pool area. This floor also features a sauna/wellness or sports area with outdoor cool-down.  All of the spaces have direct access to the garden and pool with a decked area. This gorgeous property was built using the best contemporary materials and keeping in mind its traditional arquitectural style outside and modern tendencies inside.
1×1 m2 travertine stone flooring, under floor water heating throughout except electric in bathrooms, air conditioning, double glazed windows, perimetrical alarm, log burnt fire place and travertine marble bathrooms grant with added value this villa. 						This private residential apartment is in a fantastic position right on the sea front, 50 metres away from Calo Des Moro beach and the world famous Sunset Strip.Built only a few years ago and totally refurbished for Summer 2010 it has all the modern facilities required for a comfortable stay with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.The ground floor has a lounge/diner with large plasma TV & DVD,fully fitted American kitchen,twin bedroom and bathroom and opens to a long private garden that goes all the way down to the sea. The cool lower ground floor has a further 3 bedrooms - a double, a twin and a single - and a bathroom. The best thing about this pad is it's close proximity to all the famous sunset bars such as Cafe Mambo,Cafe Del Mar,Kanya and Savannah yet just far enough away to get some peace and quiet when you are chilling out around the swimming pool or in the large garden that leads straight to the sea. If you want to be cool yet close to the action then this is definitely for you.						Enquire About This Property
features: Beachfront,Sea Views,Basement,Kitchen Diner,Communal Pool,Excellent Condition,Fully Fitted Kitchen,Front Garden,Air Conditioning,Allocated Parking,Telephone,Communal Entrance

title: Apartment for sale in Las Cañas Beach, Marbella Golden Mile. Beachfront Penthouse in Las Cañas, next to Marbella city centre
description:
This apartment for sale in a first line beach complex is located in the luxurious urbanization Las Cañas Beach on Marbella promenade next to the famous restaurant Trocadero in the heart of the Golden Mile.

	It’s without doubt an amazing place and an excellent area, the complex has gardens and swimming pool by the sea, as well as 24-hour security, all in an privileged place and well located, near Marbella center.

	This exclusive and luxurious apartment is south-facing with breathtaking sea views from its covered terrace. The property has a lot of light and its rooms are very spacious.

title: Valle del Sol, Sunny 5-bedroom Villa Set in a Tranquil Site
description:
Villa for sale in Valle del Sol, San Pedro de Alcantara Spacious villa with flat illuminated garden with a private swimming pool. Located in Valle del Sol, right next to Guadalmina Alta with several golf courses, a commercial centre with bars, restaurants, pharmacy and different shops, San Pedro only a minute away and only 10 minutes drive to either Marbella, the beaches or Estepona. The villa offers air conditioning units, shutters, alarm system, built-in wardrobes, covered and open terraces, a carport for three cars, a swimming pool with detached summer dining area with ladies and gentlemen guest toilets and an illuminated adjoining football field. The villa welcomes the visitor with a covered porche which opens to the entrance hall leading through double doors to the large living room with split level and to the dining area. The fully fitted kitchen is also very large and has a dining area and a separate utility room and laundry room. A guest toilet complete this level. Stairs go down to the basement which has a bedroom suite with a built-in wardrobe, a store room, a sauna a large discotheque, and a large restaurant-like room with a bar. On the upper floor there are four bedrooms, two with a bathroom ensuite. One is currently used as a gym, all of them with access to an open terrace. The main bedroom, has a dressing area and onyx marble bathroom with round bathtub and a separate shower room cubicle. 
 Villa for sale in Valle del Sol, San Pedro de Alcantara, with 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 3 en suite bathrooms, 1 toilets, the property was built in and has a swimming pool (Private), a garage (Carport) and a garden (Private). Regarding property dimensions, it has 434.12 m² built, 1551 m² plot, 385.84 m² interior, 48.28 m² terrace.   This property, with orientation S, has the following facilities: Fully fitted kitchen, Fireplace, Sauna, Storage room, Alarm, Dining room, Mountainside, Guest toilet, Kitchen equipped, Living room, Automatic irrigation system, Bars, Fitted wardrobes, Air conditioning, Garden view, Pool view and Close to Golf. Large glass doors opening up to the 65 sqm outside area with terrace-garden and a pool. Upstairs you will find 60 sqm distributed over three bedrooms and two bathrooms. title: Apartment for sale in Marina de Puente Romano, Marbella Golden Mile. Newly Renovated Modern Apartment in Marina de Puente Romano
description:
Lovely newly renovated modern apartment situated directly on the Golden Mile in the exclusive urbanization of Marina de Puente Romano in the Andalusian Garden, 

	This splendid south-facing apartment is very luminous and ideally located in Puente Romano, only a few minutes walk from the beach and its splendid promenade that leads all the way until Marbella to the east and San Pedro to the west.

	It has an open plan layout with a small entrance hall, leading to an open kitchen looking onto the living room with dining table and direct access to a splendid sunny covered terrace, which overlooks the community gardens and pool, and in the distance the Mediterranean Sea.

	The master bedroom has an en suite bathroom and there are two more twin-bedded bedrooms with a second bathroom to share.

	All in all an ideal apartment to rent with all the things you may need such as air-conditioning cold/hot, a washing machine, a dryer and a fully equipped kitchen with dish washer. 

	It is right next to the Puente Romano tennis club and the 5-star Leading Hotel of the World “Puente Romano Beach hotel & Spa” and all they have to offer.

	Marbella town center is only a short drive as is Puerto Banús and its bustling nightlife.
features: Air conditioning, Alarm, Amenities near, Brand new, Central heating, Covered terrace, Dining room, Fitted wardrobes, Front line beach, Fully fitted kitchen, Fully furnished, Gym, Internet - Wifi, Laundry room, Lift, Living room, Marble floors, Pool view, Private terrace, Sea view, Security service 24h, Storage room, Tennis / paddle court, Transport near

title: Apartment for sale in Marina de Puente Romano, Marbella Golden Mile. Apartment at Marina Puente Romano
description:
A exquisitely design and totally refurbished apartment  in Marina Puente Romano – right on the Marbella promenade -, conceived to enjoy holidays all year round, classic, elegant  with all the amenities of Puente Romano Hotel at your hand.

	We are received by a comfortable ample living room with an integrated open plan kitchen and a wall to wall French window leading into a charming terrace where to seat and relax.

	The apartment consists into two bedrooms; master bedroom en suite and the other one has a complete bathroom. Master bedroom with direct access to the terrace.
The bright living area and the open plan kitchen are the rest of the apartment with direct access as well to the terrace.

	All in all, the perfect spot to have an escapade any time!  

	The price includes a parking space and a storage room.

title: Sierra Blanca, Modern Aesthetic in Sierra Blanca
description: Semi Detached Villa for sale in Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile Striking and contemporary design semi-detached villa with oriental aesthetic situated in the most prestigious residential area of Marbella, Sierra Blanca. This corner property is nestled within the recently built complex of Meisho Hills, with communal indoor pools and spa area. Lovely views encompass the coastline, Gibraltar and African mountains beyond. The lush and protected natural surroundings of the development ensure total privacy.  It is only minutes away from the city centre, Puerto Banús and several golf courses.  During its construction the finest selection of materials has been used throughout combining wood, stone, marble, with modern conveniences such as under floor heating, air conditioning, home automation system and top of the range fully equipped kitchen with Miele, Liebherr, Samsung appliances. The layout offers on the ground floor: an entrance area flowing directly into the living room with a fire place, dining area connected with the fully equipped kitchen with adjacent laundry, guest toilet and one bedroom with bathroom en-suite. A wrap around terrace connects all the rooms and offers an infinity pool with sea views. The wooden stairs and an elevator lead up to the first floor where two more bedroom suites are situated. The guest bedroom outfitted with built-in cupboards, a bathroom with extra large shower and two terraces. The master bedroom is graced with south facing terrace with frontal sea views and a bathroom with double vanity, jacuzzi and shower.  A large solarium accessed both via elevator and the winding staircase is the crown jewel of the villa. Its 360 degree views are breathtaking and amazing equally towards the sea and the mountain which seems unreal due to its beauty. The communal basement is place to 3 private enclosed garages, pool machinery room and large storage. Added values of this property are air conditioning, under floor heating, wooden and marble floors, high quality appliances, home automation system, elevator and private pool. title: Villa for sale in Cabopino, Marbella East. Villa frontline golf in Cabopino
description:
Classical style frontline golf villa for sale in Cabopino, Marbella East, occupying an expansive plot directly overlooking the golf course with total privacy, and walking distance from the exclusive Cabopino port.

	This grand villa is distributed over two levels plus a semi basement, of which the ground level comprises an impressive entrance hall with feature staircase, a spacious living room with log fireplace, a high quality fitted kitchen with dining room, en suite guest bedroom and guest cloakroom.

	A cosy terrace surrounds the exclusive property, with direct access to the mature landscaped garden and private swimming pool. Upstairs offers three further en suite bedrooms, including the large master with dressing area and a sunny terrace. 

	The basement, which features a triple garage, also provides opportunities to create additional bedrooms, a games room, home cinema, etc.

description: This great townhouse of some 119 sqm has recently been renovated in 2015. On the entrance level you will find a nice living room in open plan distribution with the modern kitchen and dining area. Sliding glass doors open up to the 25 sqm terrace/ garden. There is also a bathroom and storage room plus easy access to the parking. Upstairs you will find the two bedrooms, one facing the street and the other one with a terrace facing the garden. The bedrooms share the second bathroom. Possibility to build a roof terrace for a cost of around 25.000€.

title: Villa Batistica · San Juan
description:
Modern Blakstad luxury villa with lush terraced gardens with mature olive and citrus trees and grass lawns. This quality property near the village of San Juan consists of 300.000 m2 private valley, enjoying spectacular hilltop views and total privacy.
The main house features a fully equipped high tech kitchen/dining room in open plan. Outside, the kitchen balcony, is perched above the garden. There is also a large living area with fireplace.
On the first floor there are two double bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, which share a large balcony with breath-taking views across the valley and the sea. Mallorca can be seen on the horizon on clear days.
The Casita / guesthouse across the courtyard, has two further double en suite bedrooms and a second kitchen. The Casita opens out to a private pagoda garden and sun terrace. 
The remaining three en suite bedrooms are in the Garden Room away from the main house – and they have their own access, private deck and pagoda garden. 
The saltwater pool includes a shallow children’s pool and is surrounded by teak decking and luxurious sun loungers and parasols. The pool bar is well equipped and includes a fridge freezer, wine chiller, coffee machine, dishwasher and Webber barbecue.

title: Villa Brazil · First line
description:

title: Villa Brazil · First line
description:
Charming first line villa near Cala Vadella with own private access to a rocky beach in a small cove.
Of course this has amazing views of the sea and the sunset.
On the top level of the house there is a living room, a dining room and a large kitchen with access to a large terrace.
On the lower level there are two bedrooms with a nice bathroom between – both with access to a terrace facing the sea.
By the entrance there is a staircase with access to the roof terrace with possibility of a chill-out.
On the right side of the house is a small plunge pool.
There is a storage room that could be turned into an additional small bedroom with shower.
Air conditioning in all rooms.
In Ibiza it is extremely rare to find such a property with this kind of location.

title: Villa Rana · Jesus
description:
Villa with a private garden and pool in Jesus only few minutes away from Ibiza town.
The villa features spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen and three double spacious bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and television.
In addition there is a separate guest house with two bedroom and two bathrooms. 
The garden has many palm trees and near the swimming pool (6x12m) there is an extra bathroom with a shower and a toilet.
On the ground floor by the main entrance you have the living room, furnished with a large sofa in the center and equipped with a fireplace, flat screen satellite TV and a music system for iPhone and iPad.
The dining area has a large solid wood table and seating for 8 people.
The fully equipped kitchen, includes fridge freezer, five-ring gas hob, separate wall oven, microwave, dishwasher, blender, toaster, juicer, etc. On the ground floor you also find one double bedroom with independent access to the garden and pool and an en-suite bathroom.  
On the first floor there are two double bedrooms with their own bathrooms. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath.
The other bedroom has also a bathroom with a shower. This bedroom has a view of Ibiza town and a private rooftop terrace equipped with table and chairs and four sun loungers.  
The last two bedrooms are in a guest house which is accessed from the outside. The first guest suite has a bathroom with a walk-in shower. The other guest bedroom has a en-suite bathroom also a walk-in shower.

title: Blakstad Finca Gall · San Lorenzo
description:
This stately late Blakstad build luxury finca is one of the truly unique properties on the island of Ibiza. The estate of 22.000m² is located in a very attractive location between Santa Gertrudis and San Lorenzo.
The property is very private and enjoys a breathtaking view of the countryside, the hills and the sea in the background. An impressive and beautiful park-like garden surrounds this very roomy classic Blakstad country villa.
The finca has very high ceilings throughout and consists of a large living area with kitchen, and six large bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. Downstairs there is a large heated 200m² basement, which is ready to be used for further bedrooms, cinema room, gym.
This is a very special property and needs to be seen.

title: Apartment for sale in Benatalaya, Benahavis. Modern contemporary resort close of Atalaya Golf
description:
40 apartments and penthouses of luxurious contemporary style in one of the best areas of the New Golden Mile of the Costa del Sol.

	Between Marbella and Estepona, in the heart of Atalaya Alta, this complex is located in one of the most incredible areas, completely surrounded by nature, but yet only a few minutes from all the necessary services, restaurants, beaches, golf courses, schools, and other amenities. It is an idyllic place where we can enjoy breathing fresh air and tranquility, and also enjoying a natural environment without sacrificing luxury or services offered by the area.

	It is a private residential complex of 40 apartments and penthouses, superior quality, distributed in 4 blocks of low density. The 10,500 Sqm of land have made possible to have a complex with stunning gardens, pool of saline chlorination and a revolutionary new concept of “Exterior Sports Zone & Leissure”. 

	Distributed in apartments of 2 and 3 bedrooms of contemporary modern design, open kitchens, huge terraces o and high qualities making this resort one of the best contemporary options of the Costa del Sol.

Modern luxury villa with stunning views of the sea located first line high on the west coast enjoying sunsets every night.
The villa in Na Xemena enjoys unparalleled views over the North of the Island, the sea and even the main land of Spain.
This super villa has everything. A rooftop bar with sunsets 365 days a year. 6 double bedrooms and bathrooms + 1 staff apartment, a wine cellar and nice open living area with state of the art kitchen and amazing views of course. Outside there is an impressive landscaped garden and of course a nice swimming pool.

title: Marbella Hill Club, Townhouse in Marbella Hill Club
description:
Town House for sale in Marbella Hill Club, Marbella Golden Mile Built on a gently sloping hill in the exclusive Marbella Hill Club, this southeast facing property enjoys wonderful sea and mountain views. The entrance paves the way to a lounge with a fireplace and a terrace with wonderful sea views. The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped and has direct access to the semi covered terrace shared with the lounge. There are also indoor and outdoor dining areas and a guest toilet. The terrace stairs lead down to the private pool and further garden and also to the communal gardens and swimming pool. Stairs from the lounge lead up to the living room with a bedroom and a shower room. On the pool level there are two bedrooms, one is en-suite with a fire place and the other one has exit to the pool area.  On the garden level, you can find a cosy apartment with a kitchenette and a bedroom with bathroom. There is also a utility room and sauna. 
In addition the house counts with one car garage, video entry phone and air conditioning. Marbella Hill Club is an elegant residential estate at the foothills of La Concha Mountain. Only five minutes drive to Marbella town, next to the Nagüeles Forest Reserve and only ten minutes drive to Puerto Banús. title: Kempinski, Beachfront Apartment in 5* Hotel
description: Apartment for sale in Kempinski, Estepona The Kempinski Hotel Bahia Estepona is located on the Costa del Sol, just outside the town of Estepona and only 15 minutes from Marbella. The resort boasts one kilometre of beautiful beach and panoramic views over the coast of Malaga, the rock of Gibraltar and the African coastline.  The Kempinski Hotel Bahía Estepona is the perfect place for anyone seeking a combination of peace and refined luxury. Private owners have access to all the facilities of the hotel services which includes concierge, choice of restaurants, pool attendants, free internet desk, wellness & beauty Spa, Kids Club, a gym, a tennis court, a golf desk, a beach club in summer), baby sitting, and room cleaning. 20% discount in all hotel restaurants and hotel food consumed. The Private Wing management company rents apartments on a nightly basis, which can account to sizeable profits. The south facing apartment comprises an entrance hall with a guest toilet  and a fully equipped large kitchen to the left. The living room straight ahead with adjoining dining room and direct access to the partly covered terrace with frontal sea views is ideal for summer dining. A bedroom situated to the right of the entrance hall has a bathroom en-suite, a separate toilet with w.c. and bidet, a bathtub and a separate shower cubicle shares the terrace with the living room while the other bedroom suite has plenty of built-in wardrobes and a window with sea views. The property features air conditioning, marble flooring, fire detectors. title: Condado de Sierra Blanca, Ground Floor Apartment in Peaceful Setting in Marbella
description:
Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Condado de Sierra Blanca, Marbella Golden Mile Located in Condado de Sierra Blanca on the hill of the emblematic La Concha mountain in Marbella and surrounded by natural areas this ground floor apartment enjoys private south facing terrace with lovely sea views. The gated complex has two magnificent swimming pools, one with rectangular shape for swimming and the other recreating a tropical beach for relax. Marble floors throughout except terrace and kitchen, under floor heating in bathrooms, a fireplace in the living room, safe box in the master bedroom, cold and hot central air conditioning, sound installation, double glazed windows, electric shutters, alarm system, Lutron lighting control in living room are some of the features of this spacious two bedroom apartment, that consists of an entrance hall with direct access to the living room with access to the terrace and garden, The master bedroom opens onto the terrace shared with the living room and enjoys an ensuite interior bathroom with a whirlpool bathtub, a separate shower, two hand wash basins and a separate toilet.  There is a guest toilet and a further bedroom with private bathroom which includes a bathtub, a bidet and a hand wash basin. 
There is a spacious kitchen with ceramic tiled flooring and breakfast area. The second bedroom also has a small covered terrace. title: Ground Floor Apartment for sale in Los Flamingos, Benahavis. Ground floor in Four Seasons
description:
This attractive ground floor apartment is situated in Four Seasons complex within the Los Flamingos Golf Resort in Benahavis, a privileged area conveniently situated within minutes by car to San Pedro and Estepona, typical Spanish towns with all amenities. The famous five star hotel Villa Padierna is also close by. The beach is also a a short drive, however the area enjoys peace and tranquility surrounded by mountains. 

	The property comprises an spacious open plan living/dining area with fireplace, leading to a modern large fully fitted kitchen with high end Bosch appliances, a master bedroom with en suite bathroom and a guest bedroom with bathroom. The property also includes a parking space for one car. 

	The apartment has a private garden both at the front and back of the property, the communal grounds are well maintained tropical gardens and include a large impressive pool.

title: Villa Caleta · Sa Caleta
description:
Luxury rustic villa with large pool in Sa Caleta.
The villa is very private, situated on a hill overlooking the sea, Cap des Falco and the beach of Las Salinas and has 3 levels.
There are six double bedrooms, six bathrooms en suite, a large kitchen and a living/dining room with fireplace.
There is a large garden with a green lawn and a beautiful pool surrounded by natural stones with beautiful views to the sea and Formentera.
There is only 1 km from Sa Caleta beach and at 3 km from the airport
Further more there are two terraces, a barbecue, an outdoor shower, a fenced paddle court, fruit trees, beautiful winter garden, an outdoor and an outdoor dining area. There is a garage for 2 cars but private parking for 6 cars.
The villa also has a roof terrace with a view.

title: Monte Mayor Golf, Lovely rustic villa in Monte Mayor Golf and Country Club
description: Villa for sale in Monte Mayor Golf, Benahavis A fantastic rustic style villa with a modern touch nicely settled within a quiet residential estate. Stunning views to the coast and the Mediterranean. This property with a south east orientation offers privacy and tranquillity.  It is spread on 3 levels. The main floor offers a living area with fireplace and direct access to a covered terrace, a dining area, a fully fitted kitchen, a laundry, a guest toilet, a guest bedroom en suite, as well as a garage for two cars. The lower /garden level boasts a master bedroom suite and two guest bedrooms with bathrooms, all with direct access to the garden and pool area. It also enjoys a mature garden with a bar, a barbecue area and covered terraces, a private heated pool, a shower/toilet/changing room and a further storage room. The basement also comprises an entertainment area with a cinema room, an extra room and a storage space. Under floor heating, air conditioning  units, solar panels for water, terracotta flooring, alarm system, automatic irrigation system, sat.tv., shutters in bedrooms, heated mirrors in bathrooms and gated community with 24hrs security complete the features of this villa. title: Apartment Marina Botafoc for sale in Ibiza Town & Ibiza Beaches - Balearic Code  A203889
description: Las Boas is the most emblematic landmark building on the island of Ibiza, located in the best area of ​​the Marina Botafoch. Designed by reknown architect Jean Nouvel, it offers a unique living experience with panoramic views of Dalt Vila, Ibiza’s old town; Formentera and the sea. These are one of a kind, luxury individually finished, designer apartments. The seven balconies in different colors create a very original and exclusive atmosphere. The building itself is surrounded by beautiful gardens, with a magnificent swimming pool at the center. It also offers underground parking, a spa, a gym and a private club for residents. This is a gated community with 24hr. security, just minutes away from Ibiza town, within walking distance of many elegant restaurants including Lio and Ibiza’s trendiest nightlife at Club Pacha. This modern flat of 101 m2 has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It also has a nice living/dinning room, an open fully equipped kitchen. It features an ample 26 m2 terrace with wonderful views of Dalt Vila and the sea.

description: Villa for sale in Atalaya, Estepona Single storey property with an additional basement storage area that is accessed both internally and externally. Practical home which includes expansive storage spaces, internal/ external access to the basement, separate pantry area beside kitchen, hidden  laundry chute to easily move washing from bedrooms to basement-level laundry and  non-slip flooring finishes in bathrooms and swimming pool.
